ayahs.3: Ar-Rahmaanir-Raheem
ayahs.4: Maaliki Yawmid-Deen
ayahs.5: Iyyaaka na'budu wa lyyaaka nasta'een
ayahs.6: Ihdinas-Siraatal-Mustaqeem

ayahs.2: Zaalikal Kitaabu laa raiba feeh; hudal lilmuttaqeen
ayahs.3: Allazeena yu'minoona bilghaibi wa yuqeemoonas salaata wa mimmaa razaqnaahum yunfiqoon
ayahs.4: Wallazeena yu'minoona bimaa unzila ilaika wa maaa unzila min qablika wa bil Aakhirati hum
ayahs.5: Ulaaa'ika 'alaa hudam mir rabbihim wa ulaaa'ika humul muflihoon
ayahs.6: Innal lazeena kafaroo sawaaa'un 'alaihim 'a-anzar tahum am lam tunzirhum laa yu'minoon
ayahs.7: Khatamal laahu 'alaa quloobihim wa 'alaa sam'i-him wa 'alaaa absaarihim ghishaa watunw wa
ayahs.8: Wa minan naasi mainy yaqoolu aamannaa billaahi wa bil yawmil aakhiri wa maa hum
ayahs.9: Yukhaadi'oonal laaha wallazeena aamanoo wa maa yakhda'oona illaaa anfusahum wa maa
ayahs.10: Fee quloobihim mara dun fazaadahumul laahu maradah; wa lahum 'azaabun aleemum bimaa
ayahs.11: Wa izaa qeela lahum laa tufsidoo fil ardi qaalooo innamaa nahnu muslihoon
ayahs.12: Alaaa innahum humul mufsidoona wa laakil laa yash'uroon
ayahs.13: Wa izaa qeela lahum aaminoo kamaaa aamanan naasu qaalooo anu'minu kamaaa aamanas
ayahs.14: Wa izaa laqul lazeena aamanoo qaalooo aamannaa wa izaa khalaw ilaa shayaateenihim
ayahs.15: Allahu yastahzi'u bihim wa yamudduhum fee tughyaanihim ya'mahoon
ayahs.16: Ulaaa'ikal lazeenash tara wud dalaalata bilhudaa famaa rabihat tijaaratuhum wa maa kaanoo
ayahs.17: Masaluhum kamasalillazis tawqada naaran falammaaa adaaa'at maa hawlahoo zahabal laahu
ayahs.18: Summum bukmun 'umyun fahum laa yarji'oon
ayahs.19: Aw kasaiyibim minas samaaa'i feehi zulumaatunw wa ra'dunw wa barq, yaj'aloona asaabi'ahum
ayahs.20: Yakaadul barqu yakhtafu absaarahum kullamaaa adaaa'a lahum mashaw feehi wa izaaa azlama
ayahs.21: Yaaa aiyuhan naasu'budoo Rabbakumul lazee khalaqakum wallazeena min qablikum la'allakum
ayahs.22: Allazee ja'ala lakumul arda firaashanw wassamaaa'a binaaa 'anw wa anzala minassamaaa'i
ayahs.23: Wa in kuntum fee raibim mimmaa nazzalnaa 'alaa 'abdinaa fatoo bi Sooratim mim mislihee
ayahs.24: Fail lam taf'aloo wa lan taf'aloo fattaqun Naaral latee waqooduhan naasu walhijaaratu u'iddat
ayahs.25: Wa bashshiril lazeena aamanoo wa 'amilus saalihaati anna lahum jannaatin tajree min tahtihal
ayahs.26: Innal laaha laa yastahyeee ai yadriba masalam maa ba'oodatan famaa fawqahaa; faammal
ayahs.27: Allazeena yanqudoona 'ahdal laahi mim ba'di meesaaqihee wa yaqta'oona maaa amaral laahu
ayahs.28: Kaifa takfuroona billaahi wa kuntum amwaatan fa ahyaakum summa yumeetukum summa
ayahs.29: Huwal lazee khalaqa lakum maa fil ardi jamee'an summas tawaaa ilas samaaa'i fasaw
ayahs.30: Wa iz qaala rabbuka lil malaaa'ikati innee jaa'ilun fil ardi khaleefatan qaalooo ataj'alu feehaa mai
ayahs.31: Wa 'allama Aadamal asmaaa'a kullahaa summa 'aradahum 'alal malaaa'ikati faqaala ambi'oonee
ayahs.32: Qaaloo subhaanaka laa 'ilma lanaaa illaa maa 'allamtanaaa innaka antal'aleemul hakeem
ayahs.33: Qaala yaaa Aadamu ambi' hum biasmaaa'ihim falammaa amba ahum bi asmaaa'ihim qaala
ayahs.34: Wa iz qulnaa lilmalaaa'i katis judoo liAadama fasajadooo illaaa Ibleesa abaa wastakbara wa
ayahs.35: Wa qulnaa yaaa Aadamus kun anta wa zawjukal jannata wa kulaa minhaa raghadan haisu
ayahs.36: Fa azallahumash Shaitaanu 'anhaa fa akhrajahumaa mimmaa kaanaa fee; wa qulnah bitoo
ayahs.37: Fatalaqqaaa Aadamu mir Rabbihee Kalimaatin fataaba 'alaihi; innahoo Huwat Tawwaabur
ayahs.38: Qulnah bitoo minhaa jamee 'an fa immaa ya'tiyannakum minnee hudan faman tabi'a hudaaya
ayahs.39: Wallazeena kafaroo wa kaz zabooo bi aayaatinaa ulaaa'ika Ashaabun Naari hum feehaa
ayahs.40: Yaa Baneee Israaa'eelaz kuroo ni'matiyal lateee an'amtu 'alaikum wa awfoo bi'Ahdeee oofi bi
ayahs.41: Wa aaminoo bimaaa anzaltu musaddiqal limaa ma'akum wa laa takoonooo awwala kaafirim
ayahs.42: Wa laa talbisul haqqa bilbaatili wa taktumul haqqa wa antum ta'lamoon
ayahs.43: Wa aqeemus salaata wa aatuz zakaata warka'oo ma'ar raaki'een
ayahs.44: Ataamuroonan naasa bilbirri wa tansawna anfusakum wa antum tatloonal Kitaab; afalaa
ayahs.45: Wasta'eenoo bissabri was Salaah; wa innahaa lakabee ratun illaa alal khaashi'een

ayahs.2: Allaahu laaa ilaaha illaa Huwal Haiyul Qaiyoom
ayahs.3: Nazzala 'alaikal Kitaaba bilhaqqi musaddiqal limaa baina yadaihi wa anzalat Tawraata wal Injeel
ayahs.4: Min qablu hudal linnaasi wa anzalal Furqaan; innallazeena kafaroo bi Aayaatil laahi lahum
ayahs.5: Innal laaha laa yakhfaa 'alaihi shai'un fil ardi wa laa fis samaaa'
ayahs.6: Huwal lazee yusawwirukum fil arhaami kaifa yashaaa'; laa ilaaha illaa Huwal 'Azeezul Hakeem
ayahs.7: Huwal lazeee anzala 'alaikal Kitaaba minhu Aayaatum Muh kamaatun hunna Ummul Kitaabi wa
ayahs.8: Rabbanaa laa tuzigh quloobanaa ba'da iz hadaitanaa wa hab lanaa mil ladunka rahmah; innaka
ayahs.9: Rabbanaaa innaka jaami 'un-naasi li Yawmin laa raiba feeh; innal laaha laa yukhliful mee'aad
ayahs.10: Innal lazeena kafaroo lan tughniya 'anhum amwaaluhum wa laaa awlaaduhum minal laahi
ayahs.11: Kadaabi Aali Fir'awna wallazeena min qablihim; kazzaboo bi Aayaatinaa fa akhazahumul laahu
ayahs.12: Qul lillazeena kafaroosatughlaboona wa tuhsharoona ilaa jahannam; wa bi'sal mihaad
ayahs.13: Qad kaana lakum Aayatun fee fi'atainil taqataa fi'atun tuqaatilu fee sabeelil laahi wa ukhraa
ayahs.14: Zuyyina linnaasi hubbush shahawaati minannisaaa'i wal baneena walqanaateeril muqantarati
ayahs.15: Qul a'unabbi 'ukum bikhairim min zaalikum; lillazeenat taqaw 'inda Rabbihim jannaatun tajree
ayahs.16: Allazeena yaqooloona Rabbanaaa innanaaa aamannaa faghfir lanaa zunoobanaa wa qinaa
ayahs.17: Assaabireena wassaa diqeena walqaaniteena walmunfiqeena walmus taghfireena bil as-har
ayahs.18: Shahidal laahu annahoo laa ilaaha illaa Huwa walmalaaa'ikatu wa ulul 'ilmi qaaa'imam bilqist;
ayahs.19: Innad deena 'indal laahil Islaam; wa makhtalafal lazeena ootul Kitaaba illaa mim ba'di maa
ayahs.20: Fa in haaajjooka faqul aslamtu wajhiya lillaahi wa manit taba'an; wa qul lillazeena ootul Kitaaba
ayahs.21: Innal lazeena yakfuroona bi Aayaatil laahi wa yaqtuloonan Nabiyyeena bighairi haqqinw wa
ayahs.22: Ulaaa'ikal lazeena habitat a'maaluhum fid dunyaa wal Aaakhirati wa maa lahum min naasireen
ayahs.23: Alam tara ilal lazeena ootoo naseebam minal Kitaabi yud'awna ilaa Kitaabil laahi liyahkuma
ayahs.24: Zaalika bi annahum qaaloo lan tamassanan naaru illaaa ayyaamam ma'doodaatinw wa
ayahs.25: Fakaifa izaa jama'naahum li Yawmil laa raiba fee wa wuf fiyat kullu nafsim maa kasabat wa hum
ayahs.26: Qulil laahumma Maalikal Mulki tu'til mulka man tashaaa'u wa tanzi'ul mulka mimman tashhaaa'u
ayahs.27: Toolijul laila fin nahaari wa toolijun nahaara fil laili wa tukhrijul haiya minalmaiyiti wa tukhrijul
ayahs.28: Laa yattakhizil mu'minoonal kaafireena awliyaaa'a min doonil mu'mineena wa mai yaf'al zaalika
ayahs.29: Qul in tukhfoo maa fee sudoorikum aw tubdoohu ya'lamhul laah; wa ya'lamu maa fis samaawaati
ayahs.30: Yawma tajidu kullu nafsim maa'amilat min khairim muhdaranw wa maa 'amilat min sooo'in
ayahs.31: Qul in kuntum tuhibboonal laaha fattabi' oonee yuhbibkumul laahu wa yaghfir lakum
ayahs.32: Qul atee'ul laaha war Rasoola fa in tawallaw fa innal laaha laa yuhibbul kaafireen
ayahs.33: Innal laahas tafaaa Aadama wa Noohanw wa Aala Ibraaheema wa Aala Imraana 'alal 'aalameen
ayahs.34: Zurriyyatam ba'duhaa mim ba'd; wallaahu Samee'un 'Aleem
ayahs.35: Iz qaalatim ra atu 'Imraana Rabbi innee nazartu laka maa fee batnee muharraran fataqabbal
ayahs.36: Falammaa wada'at haa qaalat Rabbi innee wada'tuhaaa unsaa wallaahu a'lamu bimaa wada'at
ayahs.37: Fataqabba lahaa Rabbuhaa biqaboolin hasaninw wa ambatahaa nabaatan hasananw wa
ayahs.38: Hunaaalika da'aa Zakariyyaa Rabbahoo qaala Rabbi hab lee mil ladunka zurriyyatan taiyibatan
ayahs.39: Fanaadat hul malaaa'ikatu wa huwa qaaa'imuny yusallee fil Mihraabi annal laaha yubashshiruka
ayahs.40: Qaala Rabbi annaa yakoonu lee ghulaamunw wa qad balaghaniyal kibaru wamraatee 'aaqirun
ayahs.41: Qaala Rabbij 'al leee Aayatan qaala Aaayatuka allaa tukalliman naasa salaasata ayyaamin illa
ayahs.42: Wa iz qaalatil malaaa'ikatu yaa Maryamu innal laahas tafaaki wa tahharaki wastafaaki 'alaa
ayahs.43: Yaa Maryamu uqnutee li Rabbiki wasjudee warka'ee ma'ar raaki'een
ayahs.44: Zaalika min ambaaa'il ghaibi nooheehi ilaik; wa maa kunta ladaihim iz yulqoona aqlaamahum
ayahs.45: Iz qaalatil malaaa'ikatu yaa Maryamu innal laaha yubashshiruki bi Kalimatim minhus muhul
ayahs.46: Wa yukallimun naasa filmahdi wa kahlanw wa minassaaliheen
ayahs.47: Qaalat Rabbi annaa yakoonu lee waladunw wa lam yamsasnee basharun qaala kazaalikil laahu
ayahs.48: Wa yu'allimuhul Kitaaba wal Hikmata wat Tawraata wal Injeel
ayahs.49: Wa Rasoolan ilaa Baneee Israaa'eela annee qad ji'tukum bi Aayatim mir Rabbikum annee
ayahs.50: Wa musaddiqal limaa baina yadaiya minat Tawraati wa liuhilla lakum ba'dal lazee hurrima
ayahs.51: Innal laaha Rabbee wa Rabbukum fa'budooh; haazaa Siraatum Mustaqeem
ayahs.52: Falammaaa ahassa 'Eesaa minhumul kufra qaala man ansaaree ilal laahi qaalal Hawaariyyoona
ayahs.53: Rabbanaaa aamannaa bimaaa anzalta wattaba'nar Rasoola faktubnaa ma'ash shaahideen

ayahs.1: Yaaa aiyuhan naasut taqoo Rabbakumul lazee khalaqakum min nafsinw waahidatinw wa
ayahs.2: Wa aatul yataamaaa amwaalahum wa laa tatabad dalul khabeesa bittaiyibi wa laa ta'kulooo
ayahs.3: Wa in khiftum allaa tuqsitoo fil yataamaa fankihoo maa taaba lakum minan nisaaa'i masnaa wa
ayahs.4: Wa aatun nisaaa'a sadu qaatihinna nihlah; fa in tibna lakum 'an shai'im minhu nafsan fakuloohu
ayahs.5: Wa laa tu'tus sufahaaa'a amwaalakumul latee ja'alal laahu lakum qiyaamanw-warzuqoohum
ayahs.6: Wabtalul yataamaa hattaaa izaa balaghun nikaaha fa in aanastum minhum rushdan fad fa'ooo
ayahs.7: Lirrijaali naseebum mimmaa tarakal waalidaani wal aqraboona wa lin nisaaa'i naseebum
ayahs.8: Wa izaa hadaral qismata ulul qurbaa walyataamaa walmasaakeenu farzuqoohum minhu wa
ayahs.9: Walyakhshal lazeena law tarakoo min khalfihim zurriyyatan di'aafan khaafoo 'alaihim falyattaqul
ayahs.10: Innal lazeena ya'kuloona amwaalal yataamaa zulman innamaa ya'kuloona fee butoonihim
ayahs.11: Yooseekumul laahu feee awlaadikum liz zakari mislu hazzil unsayayn; fa in kunna nisaaa'an
ayahs.12: Wa lakum nisfu maa taraka azwaajukum il lam yakul lahunna walad; fa in kaana lahunna
ayahs.13: Tilka hudoodul laah; wa mai yuti'il laaha wa Rasoolahoo yudkhilhu Jannaatin tajree min tahtihal
ayahs.14: Wa mai ya'sil laaha wa Rasoolahoo wa yata'adda hudoodahoo yudkhilhu Naaran khaalidan
ayahs.15: Wallaatee ya'teenal faahishata min nisaaa'ikum fastash-hidoo 'alaihinna arba'atam minkum fa in
ayahs.16: Wallazaani ya'tiyaanihaa minkum fa aazoohumaa fa in taabaa wa aslahaa fa a'ridoo 'anhumaaa;
ayahs.17: Innamat tawbatu 'alallaahi lillazeena ya'maloonas sooo'a bijahaalatin summa yatooboona min
ayahs.18: Wa laisatit tawbatu lillazeena ya'maloonas saiyiaati hattaaa izaa hadara ahadahumul mawtu
ayahs.19: Yaaa aiyuhal lazeena aamanoo laa yahillu lakum an tarisun nisaaa'a karhan wa laa
ayahs.20: Wa in arattumustib daala zawjim makaana zawjin wa aataitum ihdaahunna qintaaran falaa
ayahs.21: Wa kaifa ta'khuzoonahoo wa qad afdaa ba'dukum ilaa ba'dinw wa akhazna minkum meesaaqan
ayahs.22: Wa laa tankihoo maa nakaha aabaaa'ukum minan nisaaa'i illaa maa qad salaf; innahoo kaana
ayahs.23: Hurrimat 'alaikum umma haatukum wa banaatukum wa akhawaatukum wa 'ammaatukum wa
ayahs.24: Walmuhsanaatu minan nisaaa'i illaa maa malakat aimaanukum kitaabal laahi 'alaikum; wa uhilla
ayahs.25: Wa mal lam yastati' minkum tawlan ai yankihal muhsanaatil mu'minaati famimmaa malakat
ayahs.26: Yureedul laahu liyubai yina lakum wa yahdiyakum sunanal lazeena min qablikum wa yatooba
ayahs.27: Wallaahu yureedu ai yatooba 'alaikum wa yureedul lazeena yattabi 'oonash shahawaati an
ayahs.28: Yureedul laahu ai yukhaf fifa 'ankum; wa khuliqal insaanu da'eefaa
ayahs.29: Yaaa aiyuhal lazeena aamanoo laa ta'kulooo amwaalakum bainakum bilbaatili 'illaaa an takoona
ayahs.30: Wa mai yaf'al zaalika 'udwaananw wa zulman fasawfa nusleehi Naaraa; wa kaana zaalika 'alal
ayahs.31: In tajtaniboo kabaaa'ira maa tunhawna 'anhu nukaf fir 'ankum saiyiaatikum wa nudkhilkum
ayahs.32: Wa laa tatamannaw maa faddalal laahu bihee ba'dakum 'alaa ba'd; lirrijaali naseebum mimmak
ayahs.33: Wa likullin ja'alnaa ma waaliya mimmaa tarakal waalidaani wal aqraboon; wallazeena 'aqadat
ayahs.34: Arrijaalu qawwaamoona 'alan nisaaa'i bimaa fad dalallaahu ba'dahum 'alaa ba'dinw wa bimaaa
ayahs.35: Wa in khiftum shiqaaqa baini himaa fab'asoo haka mam min ahlihee wa hakamam min ahlihaa;
ayahs.36: Wa'budul laaha wa laa tushrikoo bihee shai'anw wa bilwaalidaini ihsaananw wa bizil qurbaa
ayahs.37: Allazeena yabkhaloona wa ya'muroonan naasa bilbukhli wa yaktumoona maaa aataahu
ayahs.38: Wallazeena yunfiqoona amwaalahum ri'aaa'an naasi wa laa yu'minoona billaahi wa laa bil
ayahs.39: Wa maazaa 'alaihim law aamanoo billaahi wal Yawmil Aakhiri wa anfaqoo mimmaa razaqahumul
ayahs.40: Innal laaha laa yazlimu misqaala zarratinw wa in taku hasanatany yudaa'ifhaa wa yu'ti mil
ayahs.41: Fakaifa izaa ji'naa min kulli ummatim bishaheedinw wa ji'naabika 'alaa haaa'ulaaa 'i Shaheeda
ayahs.42: Yawma'iziny yawad dullazeena kafaroo wa'asawur Rasoola law tusawwaa bihimul ardu wa laa
ayahs.43: Yaaa aiyuhal lazeena aamanoo laa taqrabus Salaata wa antum sukaaraa hatta ta'lamoo ma
ayahs.44: Alam tara ilal lazeena ootoo naseebam minal Kitaabi yashtaroonad dalaalata wa yureedoona an
ayahs.45: Wallaahu a'lamu bi a'daaa'i-kum; wa kafaa billaahi waliyyanw wa kafaa billaahi naseera
ayahs.46: Minal lazeena haadoo yuharrifoonal Kalima 'am mawaadi'ihee wa yaqooloona sami'naa wa
ayahs.47: Yaaa aiyuha lazeena ootul Kitaaba aaminoo bimaa nazzalnaa musadiqallimaa ma'akum min
ayahs.48: Innal laaha laa yaghfiru ai yushraka bihee wa yaghfiru maa doona zaalika limai yashaaa'; wa
ayahs.49: Alam tara ilal lazeena yuzakkoona anfusahum; balil laahu yuzakkee mai yashaaa'u wa laa

ayahs.1: Yaaa aiyuhal lazeena aamanoo awfoo bil'uqood; uhillat lakum baheematul an'aami illaa maa
ayahs.2: Yaaa aiyuhal lazeena aamanoo laa tuhilloo sha'aaa 'iral laahi wa lash Shahral Haraama wa lal
ayahs.3: Hurrimat 'alaikumul maitatu waddamu wa lahmul khinzeeri wa maaa uhilla lighiril laahi bihee
ayahs.4: Yas'aloonaka maazaaa uhilla lahum; qul uhilla lakumuttaiyibaatu wa maa'allamtum minal
ayahs.5: Alyawma uhilla lakumut taiyibaatu wa ta'aamul lazeena ootul Kitaaba hillul lakum wa
ayahs.6: Yaaa aiyuhal lazeena aamanoo izaa qumtum ilas Salaati faghsiloo wujoohakum wa Aidiyakum
ayahs.7: Wazkuroo ni'matal laahi 'alaikum wa meesaaqahul lazee waasaqakum biheee iz qultum
ayahs.8: Yaaa aiyuhal lazeena aamaanoo koonoo qawwaa meena lillaahi shuhadaaa'a bilqist, wa laa
ayahs.9: Wa'adal laahul lazeena aamanoo wa 'amilus saalihaati lahum maghfiratunw wa ajrun 'azeem
ayahs.10: Wallazeena kafaroo wa kazzaboo bi Aayaatinaaa ulaaa'ika Ashaabul Jaheem
ayahs.11: Yaa aiyuhal lazeena aamanuz kuroo ni'matallaahi 'alaikum iz hamma qawmun ai yabsutooo
ayahs.12: Wa laqad akhazal laahu meesaaqa Banee Israaa'eela wa ba'asnaa minhumus nai 'ashara
ayahs.13: Fabimaa naqdihim meesaa qahum la'annaahum wa ja'alnaa quloobahum qaasiyatai
ayahs.14: Wa minal lazeena qaalooo innaa nasaaraaa akhaznaa meesaaqahum fanasoo hazzam mimmaa
ayahs.15: Yaaa Ahlal kitaabi qad jaaa'akum Rasoolunaa yubaiyinu lakum kaseeram mimmmaa kuntum
ayahs.16: Yahdee bihil laahu manit taba'a ridwaanahoo subulas salaami wa yukhrijuhum minaz zulumaati
ayahs.17: Laqad kafaral lazeena qaalooo innal laaha huwal maseehub nu Maryam; qul famany-yamliku
ayahs.18: Wa qaalatil Yahoodu wan Nasaaraa nahnu abnaaa'ul laahi wa ahibbaaa'uh; qul falima
ayahs.19: Yaaa Ahlal Kitaabi qad jaaa'akum Rasoolunaa yubaiyinu lakum 'alaa fatratim minar Rusuli an
ayahs.20: Wa iz qaala Moosaa liqawmihee yaa qawmiz kuroo ni'matal laahi 'alaikum iz ja'ala feekum
ayahs.21: Yaa qawmid khulul Ardal Muqaddasatal latee katabal laahu lakum wa laa tartaddoo 'alaaa
ayahs.22: Qaaloo yaa Moosaaa innaa feehaa qawman jabbaareena wa innaa lan nadkhulahaa hattaa
ayahs.23: Qaala rajulaani minal lazeena yakhaafoona an'amal laahu 'alaihimad khuloo 'alaihimul baab, fa
ayahs.24: Qaaloo yaa Moosaaa innaa lan nadkhulahaa abadam maa daamoo feehaa fazhab anta wa
ayahs.25: Qaala Rabbi innee laaa amliku illaa nafsee wa akhee fafruq bainanaa wa bainal qawmil
ayahs.26: Qaala fa innahaa muhar ramatun 'alaihim arba'eena sanah; yateehoona fil ard; falaa taasa 'alal
ayahs.27: Watlu 'alaihim naba abnai Aadama bilhaqq; iz qarrabaa qurbaanan fatuqubbila min ahadihimaa
ayahs.28: La'im basatta ilaiya yadaka litaqtulanee maaa ana bibaasitiny yadiya ilaika li aqtulaka inneee
ayahs.29: Inee ureedu an tabooo'a bi ismee wa ismika fatakoona min As-haabin Naar; wa zaalika
ayahs.30: Fatawwa'at lahoo nafsu hoo qatla akheehi faqatalahoo fa asbaha minal khaasireen
ayahs.31: Faba'asal laahu ghuraabai yabhasu fil ardi liyuriyahoo kaifa yuwaaree saw'ata akheeh; qaala
ayahs.32: Min ajli zaalika katabnaa 'alaa Banee Israaa'eela annahoo man qatala nafsam bighairi nafsin aw
ayahs.33: Innamaa jazaaa'ul lazeena yuhaariboonal laaha wa Rasoolahoo wa yas'awna fil ardi fasaadan ai
ayahs.34: Illal lazeena taaboo min qabli an taqdiroo 'alaihim fa'lamooo annnal laaha Ghafoorur Raheem
ayahs.35: Yaaa aiyuhal lazeena aamanut taqul laaha wabtaghooo ilaihil waseelata wa jaahidoo fee
ayahs.36: Innal lazeena kafaroo law anna lahum maa fil ardi jamee'anw wa mislahoo ma'ahoo liyaftadoo
ayahs.37: Yureedoona ai yakhrujoo minan Naari wa maa hum bikhaari jeena minhaa wa lahum 'azaabum
ayahs.38: Wassaariqu wassaariqatu faqta'oo aidiyahumaa jazaaa'am bimaa kasabaa nakaalam minal laah;
ayahs.39: Faman taaba mim ba'di zulmihee wa aslaha fa innal laaha yatoobu 'alaih; innal laaha Ghafoorur
ayahs.40: Alam ta'lam annal laaha lahoo mulkus samaawaati wal ardi yu'az zibu many-yashaa'u wa
ayahs.41: Yaaa ayyuhar Rasoolu laa yahzunkal lazeena yusaa ri'oona fil kufri minal lazeena qaaloo
ayahs.42: Sammaa'oona lilkazibi akkaaloona lissuht; fa in jaaa'ooka fahkum bainahum aw a'rid anhum wa
ayahs.43: Wa kaifa yuhakkimoonaka wa 'indahumut Tawraatu feehaa hukmul laahi summa yatawallawna
ayahs.44: Innaaa anzalnat Tawraata feehaa hudanw wa noor; yahkumu bihan Nabiyyoonal lazeena
ayahs.45: Wa katabnaa 'alaihim feehaaa annan nafsa binnafsi wal'aina bil'aini wal anfa bilanfi wal uzuna bil
ayahs.46: Wa qaf fainaa 'alaaa aasaaarihim bi 'Eesab ni Maryama musaddiqal limaa baina yadaihi minat
ayahs.47: Walyahkum Ahlul Injeeli bimaaa anzalal laahu feeh; wa mal lam yahkum bimaaa anzalal laahu fa
ayahs.48: Wa anzalnaa ilaikal Kitaaba bilhaqqi musaddiqallimaa baina yadaihi minal Kitaabi wa
ayahs.49: Wa anih kum bainahum bimaaa anzalal laahu wa laa tattabi' ahwaaa'ahum wahzarhum ai
ayahs.50: Afahukmal jaahiliyyati yabghoon; wa man ahsanu minal laahi hukmal liqawminy yooqinoon
ayahs.51: Yaaa aiyuhal lazeena aamanoo laa tattakhizul Yahooda wan nasaaraaa awliyaaa'; ba'duhum
ayahs.52: Fataral lazeena fee quloobihim maraduny yusaari'oona feehim yaqooloona nakhshaaa an
ayahs.53: Wa yaqoolul lazeena aamanooo ahaaa'ulaaa'il lazeena aqsamoo billaahi jahda aimaanihim
ayahs.54: Yaa aiyuhal lazeena aamanoo mai yartadda minkum 'an deenihee fasawfa ya'tillaahu biqawminy
ayahs.55: Innamaa waliyyukumul laahu wa Rasooluhoo wal lazeena aamanul lazeena yuqeemoonas
ayahs.56: Wa mai yatawallal laaha wa Rasoolahoo wallazeena aamanoo fa inna hizbal laahi humul
ayahs.57: Yaaa aiyuhal lazeena aamanoo laa tattakhizul lazeenat takhazoo deenakum huzuwanw wa
ayahs.58: Wa izaa naadaitum ilas Salaatit takhazoohaa huzu wan'w wa la'ibaa; zaalika biannnahum
ayahs.59: Qul yaaa Ahlal Kitaabi hal tanqimoona minnaaa illaaa an aamannaa billaahi wa maaa unzila
ayahs.60: Qul hal unabbi'ukum bisharrim min zaalika masoobatan 'indal laah; malla'ana hul laahu wa
ayahs.61: Wa izaa jaaa'ookum qaalooo aamannaa wa qad dakhaloo bilkufri wa hum qad kharajoo bih;
ayahs.62: Wa taraa kaseeram minhum yusaari'oona fil ismi wal'udwaani wa aklihimus suht; labi'sa maa
ayahs.63: Law laa yanhaahumur rabbaaniyyoona wal ahbaaru 'an qawlihimul ismaa wa aklihimus suht;
ayahs.64: Wa qaalatil Yahoodu Yadullaahi maghloolah; ghullat aideehim wa lu'inoo bimaa qaaloo; bal
ayahs.65: Wa law anna Ahlal Kitaabi aamanoo wattaqaw lakaf farnaa 'anhum saiyiaatihim wa la
ayahs.66: Wa law annahum aqaamut Tawraata wal Injeela wa maaa unzila ilaihim mir Rabbihim la akaloo
ayahs.67: Yaaa aiyuhar Rasoolu balligh maaa unzila ilaika mir Rabbika wa il lam taf'al famaaa ballaghta
ayahs.68: Qul yaaa Ahlal Kitaabi lastum 'alaa shai'in hattaa tuqeemut Tawraata wal Injeela wa maaa unzila
ayahs.69: Innal lazeena aamanoo wallazeena haadoo was saabi'oona wan Nasaaraa man aamana billaahi
ayahs.70: Laqad akhaznaa meesaaqa Banee Israaa'eela wa arsalnaaa ilaihim Rusulan kullamaa
ayahs.71: Wa hasibooo allaa takoona fitnatun fa'amoo wa sammoo summa taabal laahu 'alaihim summa
ayahs.72: Laqad kafaral lazeena qaalooo innal laaha Huwal maseehub nu Maryama wa qaalal Maseehu
ayahs.73: laqad kafaral lazeena qaalooo innal laaha saalisu salaasah; wa maa min ilaahin illaaa Ilaahunw
ayahs.74: Afalaa yatooboona ilal laahi wa yastaghfiroonah; wallaahu Ghafoorur Raheem
ayahs.75: Mal Maseehub nu Maryama illaa Rasoolun qad khalat min qablihir Rusulu wa ummuhoo
ayahs.76: Qul ata'budoona min doonil laahi maa laa yamliku lakum darranw wa laa naf'aa; wallaahu
ayahs.77: Qul yaaa Ahlal Kitaabi laa taghloo fee deenikum ghairal haqqi wa laa tattabi'ooo ahwaaa'a
ayahs.78: Lu'inal lazeena kafaroo mim Baneee israaa'eela 'alaa lisaani Daawooda wa 'Eesab ni Maryam;
ayahs.79: Kaanoo laa yatanaahawna 'am munkarin fa'alooh; labi'sa maa kaanoo yafa'loon
ayahs.80: Taraa kaseeram minhum yatawallawnal lazeena kafaroo; labi'sa maa qaddamat lahum
ayahs.81: Wa law kaanoo yu'minoona billaahi wan nabiyyi wa maaa unzila ilaihi mattakhazoohum
ayahs.82: Latajidanna ashad dan naasi 'adaawatal lillazeena aamanul Yahooda wallazeena ashrakoo wa
ayahs.83: Wa izaa sami'oo maaa unzila ilar Rasooli taraaa a'yunahum tafeedu minad dam'i mimmmaa
ayahs.84: Wa maa lanaa laa nu'minu billaahi wa maa jaaa'anaa minal haqqi wa natma'u ai yudkhilanaa
ayahs.85: Fa asaabahumul laahu bimaa qaaloo Jannnaatin tajree min tahtihal anhaaru khaalideena

ayahs.1: Alhamdu lillaahil lazee khalaqas samaawaati wal arda wa ja'alaz zulumaati wannoor; summal
ayahs.2: Huwal lazee khalaqakum min teenin summa qadaaa ajalanw wa ajalum musamman 'indahoo
ayahs.3: Wa Huwal laahu fissamaawaati wa fil ardi ya'lamu sirrakum wa jahrakum wa ya'lamu maa
ayahs.4: Wa maa ta'teehim min Aayatim min Aayaati Rabbihim illaa kaanoo 'anhaa mu'rideen
ayahs.5: Faqad kazzaboo bilhaqqi lammaa jaaa'ahum fasawfa ya'teehim ambaaa'u maa kaanoo bihee
ayahs.6: Alam yaraw kam ahlaknaa min qablihim min qarnim makkannaahum fil ardi maa lam numakkil
ayahs.7: Wa law nazzalnaa 'alaika Kitaaban fee qirtaasin falamasoohu bi aideehim laqaalal lazeena
ayahs.8: Wa qaaloo law laaa unzila alaihi malakunw wa law anzalna malakal laqudiyal amru summa laa
ayahs.9: Wa law ja'alnaahu malakal laja'alnaahu rajulanw wa lalabasnaa 'alaihim maa yalbisoon
ayahs.10: Wa laqadis tuhzi'a bi-Rusulim min qablika fahaaqa billazeena sakhiroo minhum maa kaanoo
ayahs.11: Qul seeroo fil ardi summan zuroo kaifa kaana 'aaqibatul mukazzibeen
ayahs.12: Qul limam maa fis samaawaati wal ardi qul lillaah; kataba 'alaa nafsihir rahmah; la yajma
ayahs.13: Wa lahoo maa sakana fillaili wannahaar; wa Huwas Samee'ul Aleem
ayahs.14: Qul aghairal laahi attakhizu waliyyan faatiris samaawaati wal ardi wa Huwa yut'imu wa laa
ayahs.15: Qul inneee akhaafu in 'asaitu Rabbee 'azaaba Yawmin 'Azeem
ayahs.16: Mai yusraf 'anhu Yawma'izin faqad rahimah; wa zaalikal fawzul mubeen
ayahs.17: Wa iny-yamsaskal laahu bidurrin falaaa kaashifa lahoo illaa Huwa wa iny-yamsaska bikhairin fa
ayahs.18: Wa Huwal qaahiru fawqa 'ibaadih; wa Huwal Hakeemul Khabeer
ayahs.19: Qul ayyu shai'in akbaru shahaadatan qulil laahu shaheedum bainee wa bainakum; wa oohiya
ayahs.20: Allazeena aatainaa humul Kitaaba ya'rifoonahoo kamaa ya'rifoona abnaaa'ahum; allazeena
ayahs.21: Wa man azlamu mim manif tara 'alal laahi kaziban aw kazzaba bi Aayaatih; innahoo laa yuflihuz
ayahs.22: Wa yawma nahshuruhum jamee'an summa naqoolu lillazeena ashrakooo ayna shurakaaa'
ayahs.23: Summa lam takun fitnatuhum illaaa an qaaloo wallaahi Rabbinaa maa kunnaa mushrikeen
ayahs.24: Unzur kaifa kazaboo 'alaaa anfusihim, wa dalla 'anhum maa kaanoo yaftaroon
ayahs.25: Wa minhum mai yastami'u ilaika wa ja'alnaa 'alaa quloobihim akinnatan ai yafqahoohu wa feee
ayahs.26: Wa hum yanhawna 'anhu wa yan'awna 'anhu wa iny yuhlikoona illaa anfusahum wa maa
ayahs.27: Wa law taraaa iz wuqifoo 'alan Naari faqaaloo yaa laitanaa nuraddu wa laa nukaz ziba bi Aayaati
ayahs.28: Bal badaa lahum maa kaanoo yukhfoona min qablu wa law ruddoo la'aadoo limaa nuhoo 'anhu
ayahs.29: Wa qaalooo in hiya illaa hayaatunad dunyaa wa maa nahnu bimab'ooseen
ayahs.30: Wa law taraa iz wuqifoo 'alaa Rabbihim; qaala alaisa haazaa bilhaqq; qaaloo balaa wa
ayahs.31: Qad khasiral lazeena kazzaboo biliqaaa'il laahi hattaaa izaa jaaa'at humus Saa'atu baghtatan
ayahs.32: Wa mal hayaatud dunyaaa illaa la'ibunw wa lahwunw wa lad Daarul Aakhiratu khaiyrul lillazeena
ayahs.33: Qad na'lamu innahoo layahzunukal lazee yaqooloona fa innahum laa yukazziboonaka wa
ayahs.34: Wa laqad kuzzibat Rusulum min qablika fasabaroo 'alaa maa kuzziboo wa oozoo hattaaa
ayahs.35: Wa in kaana kabura 'alaika i'raaduhum fa inistata'ta an tabtaghiya nafaqan fil ardi aw sullaman
ayahs.36: Innamaa yastajeebul lazeena yasma'oon; walmawtaa yab'asuhumul laahu summa ilaihi
ayahs.37: Wa qaaloo law laa nuzzila 'alaihi Aayatum mir Rabbih; qul innal laaha qaadirun 'alaaa ai
ayahs.38: Wa maa min daaabbatin fil ardi wa laa taaa'iriny yateeru bijanaahaihi illaaa umamun
ayahs.39: Wallazeena kazzaboo bi Aayaatinaa summunw wa bukmun fiz zulumaat; mai yasha il laahu
ayahs.40: Qul ara'aytakum in ataakum 'azaabul laahi aw atatkumus Saa'atu a-ghairal laahi tad'oona in
ayahs.41: Bal iyyaahu tad'oona fa yakshifu maa tad'oona ilaihi in shaaa'a wa tansawna maa tushrikoon
ayahs.42: Wa laqad arsalnaaa ilaaa umamim min qablika fa akhaznaahum bil ba'saaa'i waddarraaa'i
ayahs.43: Falaw laaa iz jaaa'ahum ba'sunaa tadarra'oo wa laakin qasat quloobuhum wa zaiyana lahumush
ayahs.44: Falammaa nasoo maa zukkiroo bihee fatahnaa 'alaihim abwaaba kulli shai'in hattaaa izaa
ayahs.45: Faquti'a daabirul qawmil lazeena zalamoo; walhamdu lillaahi Rabbil 'aalameen
ayahs.46: Qul ara'aitum in akhazal laahu sam'akum wa absaarakum wa khatama 'alaa quloobikum man
ayahs.47: Qul ara'aitakum in ataakum 'azaabul laahi baghtatan aw jahratan hal yuhlaku illal qawmuz
ayahs.48: Wa maa nursilul mursaleena illaa mubashshireena wa munzireena faman aamana wa aslaha
ayahs.49: Wallazeena kazzaboo bi Aayaatinaa yamassuhumul 'azaabu bimaa kaanoo yafsuqoon
ayahs.50: Qul laaa aqoolu lakum 'indee khazaaa'inul laahi wa laaa a'lamul ghaiba wa laaa aqoolu lakum
ayahs.51: Wa anzir bihil lazeena yakhaafoona ai yuhsharooo ilaa Rabbihim laisa lahum min doonihee
ayahs.52: Wa laa tatrudil lazeena yad'oona Rabbahum bilghadaati wal 'ashiyyi yureedoona W ajhahoo ma
ayahs.53: Wa kazaalika fatannaa ba'dahum biba'dil liyaqoolooo ahaaa'ulaaa'i mannal laahu 'alaihim mim
ayahs.54: Wa izaa jaaa'akal lazeena yu'minoona bi Aayaatinaa faqul salaamun 'alaikum kataba Rabbukum

ayahs.2: Kitaabun unzila ilaika falaa yakun fee sadrika harajum minhu litunzira bihee wa zikraa
ayahs.3: Ittabi'oo maaa unzila 'ilaikum mir Rabbikum wa laa tattabi'oo min dooniheee awliyaaa'a;
ayahs.4: Wa kam min qaryatin ahlaknaahaa fajaaa'ahaa ba'sunaa bayaatan aw hum qaaa'iloon
ayahs.5: Famaa kaana da'waahum iz jaaa'ahum ba'sunaa illaaa an qaalooo innaa kunnaa zaalimeen
ayahs.6: Falanas 'alannal lazeena ursila ilaihim wa lanas 'alannal mursaleen
ayahs.7: Falanaqussanna 'alaihim bi'ilminw wa maa kunnaa ghaaa'ibeen
ayahs.8: Walwaznu Yawma'izinil haqq; faman saqulat mawaa zeenuhoo fa-ulaaa'ika humul muflihoon
ayahs.9: Wa man khaf fat mawaazeenuhoo fa ulaaa'ikal lazeena khasirooo anfusahum bimaa kaanoo bi
ayahs.10: Wa laqad makkannaakum fil ardi wa ja'alnaa lakum feehaa ma'aayish; qaleelam maa tashkuroon
ayahs.11: Wa laqad khalaqnaakum summa sawwarnaakum summa qulnaa lilmalaaa'ikatis judoo li Aadama
ayahs.12: Qaala maa mana'aka allaa tasjuda iz amartuka qaala ana khairum minhu khalaqtanee min
ayahs.13: Qaala fahbit minhaa famaa yakoonu laka an tatakabbara feehaa fakhruj innaka minas
ayahs.14: Qaala anzirneee ilaa Yawmi yub'asoon
ayahs.15: Qaala innaka minal munzareen
ayahs.16: Qaala fabimaaa aghway tanee la aq'udanna lahum Siraatakal Mustaqeem
ayahs.17: Summa la aatiyannahum mim baini aideehim wa min khalfihim wa 'an aimaanihim wa 'an
ayahs.18: Qaalakhruj minhaa maz'oomam madhooraa; laman tabi'aka minhum la amla'anna Jahannama
ayahs.19: Wa yaaa Aadamus kun anta wa zawjukal Jannata fakulaa min haisu shi'tumaa wa laa taqrabaa
ayahs.20: Fawaswasa lahumash Shaitaanu liyubdiya lahumaa maa wooriya 'anhumaa min saw aatihimaa
ayahs.21: Wa qaasamahumaaa innee lakumaa laminan naasiheen
ayahs.22: Fadallaahumaa bighuroor; falammaa zaaqash shajarata badat lahumaa saw aatuhumaa wa
ayahs.23: Qaalaa Rabbanaa zalamnaaa anfusanaa wa illam taghfir lanaa wa tarhamnaa lanakoonanna
ayahs.24: Qaalah bitoo ba'dukum liba'din aduwwunw wa lakum fil ardi mustaqarrunw wa mataa'un

8.name: Innal lazeena aamanoo wa 'amilus saalihaati lahum ajrun ghairu mamnoon
8.title: section 1

ayahs.9: Qul a'innakum latakfuroona billazee khalaqal arda fee yawmaini wa taj'aloona lahooo andaadaa;
ayahs.10: Wa ja'ala feehaa rawaa siya min fawqihaa wa baaraka feehaa wa qaddara feehaaaa
ayahs.11: Summas tawaaa ilas-samaaa'i wa hiya dukhaanun faqaala lahaa wa lil ardi'tiyaaa taw'an aw
ayahs.12: Faqadaahunna sab'a samaawaatin fee yawmaini wa awhaa fee kulli samaaa'in amarahaa; wa
ayahs.13: Fa-in a'radoo faqul anzartukum saa'iqatam misla saa'iqati 'Aadinw wa Samood
ayahs.14: Iz jaaa'at humur Rusulu mim baini aydeehim wa min khalfihim allaa ta'budooo illal laaha qaaloo
ayahs.15: Fa ammaa 'Aadun fastak baroo fil ardi bighairul haqqi wa qaaloo man ashaddu minnaa
ayahs.16: Fa arsalnaa 'alaihim reehan sarsaran feee ayyaamin nahisaatil linuzeeqahum 'azaabal khizyi fil
ayahs.17: Wa ammaa Samoodu fahadinaahum fastahabbul 'ama 'alal huda fa akhazathum saa'iqatul

9.name: Wa inna Rabbaka la Huwal 'Azeezur Raheem
9.title: section 1

ayahs.10: Wa iz naadaa Rabbuka Moosaaa ani'-til qawmaz zaalimeen
ayahs.11: Qawma Fir'awn; alaa yattaqoon
ayahs.12: Qaala Rabbi inneee akhaafu ai yukazziboon
ayahs.13: Wa yadeequ sadree wa laa yantaliqu lisaanee fa arsil ilaa Haaroon
ayahs.14: Wa lahum 'alaiya zambun fa akhaafu ai yaqtuloon
ayahs.15: Qaala kallaa fazhabaa bi Aayaatinaaa innaa ma'akum mustami'oon
ayahs.16: Faatiyaa Fir'awna faqoolaaa innaa Rasoolu Rabbil 'aalameen
ayahs.17: An arsil ma'anaa Baneee Israaa'eel
ayahs.18: Qaala alam nurabbika feenaa waleedanw wa labista feenaa min 'umurika sineen
ayahs.19: Wa fa'alta fa'latakal latee fa'alta wa anta minal kaafireen
ayahs.20: Qaala fa'altuhaaa izanw wa ana minad daaaleen
ayahs.21: Fafarartu minkum lam maa khiftukum fawahaba lee Rabbee hukmanw wa ja'alanee minal
ayahs.22: Wa tilka ni'matun tamun nuhaa 'alaiya an 'abbatta Baneee Israaa'eel
ayahs.23: Qaala Fir'awnu wa maa Rabbul 'aalameen
ayahs.24: Qaala Rabbus samaawaati wal ardi wa maa bainahumaa in kuntum mooqineen
ayahs.25: Qaala liman hawlahooo alaa tastami'oon
ayahs.26: Qaala Rabbukum wa Rabbu aabaaa'ikumul awwaleen
ayahs.27: Qaala inna Rasoolakumul lazee ursila ilaikum lamajnoon
ayahs.28: Qaala Rabbul mashriqi wal maghribi wa maa baina humaa in kuntum ta'qiloon
ayahs.29: Qaala la'init takhazta ilaahan ghairee la aj'alannaka minal masjooneen
ayahs.30: Qaala awalaw ji'tuka bishai'im mubeen
ayahs.31: Qaala faati biheee in kunta minas saadiqeen
ayahs.32: Fa alqaa 'asaahu fa izaaa hiya su'baanum mubeen

10.name: Wa law laa fadlul laahi 'alaikum wa rahmatuhoo wa annal laaha Tawwaabun Hakeem
10.title: section 1

ayahs.11: Innal lazeena jaaa'oo bilifki 'usbatum minkum; laa tahsaboohu sharral lakum bal huwa khairul
ayahs.12: Law laaa iz sami'tumoohu zannal mu'minoona walmu'minaatu bi anfusihim khairanw wa qaaloo
ayahs.13: Law laa jaaa'oo 'alaihi bi-arba'ati shuhadaaa'; fa iz lam yaatoo bishshuhadaaa'i fa ulaaa 'ika
ayahs.14: Wa law laa fadlul laahi 'alaikum wa rahmatuhoo fiddunyaa wal aakhirati lamassakum fee maaa
ayahs.15: Iz talaqqawnahoo bi alsinatikum wa taqooloona bi afwaahikum maa laisa lakum bihee 'ilmunw
ayahs.16: Wa law laaa iz sami'tu moohu qultum maa yakoonu lanaaa an natakallama bihaazaa
ayahs.17: Ya'izukumul laahu an ta'oodoo limisliheee abadan in kuntum mu'mineen
ayahs.18: Wa yubaiyinul laahu lakumul Aayaat; wallaahu 'Aleemun Hakeem
ayahs.19: Innal lazeena yuhibboona an tashee'al faahishatu fil lazeena aamanoo lahum 'azaabun aleemun

ayahs.1: Alif-Laaam-Raa; Kitaabun uhkimat Aayaatuhoo summa fussilat mil ladun Hakeemin Khabeer
ayahs.2: Allaa ta'budooo illal laah; innanee lakum minhu nazeerunw wa basheer
ayahs.3: Wa anis taghfiroo Rabbakum summa toobooo ilaihi yumatti'kum mataa'an hasanan ilaaa ajalim
ayahs.4: Ilal laahi marji'ukum wa Huwa 'alaa kulli shai'in Qadeer
ayahs.5: Alaa innahum yasnoona sudoorahum liyastakhfoo minh; alaa heena yastaghshoona siyaabahum
ayahs.6: Wa maa min daaabbatin fil ardi illaa 'alal laahi rizquhaa wa ya'lamu mustaqarrahaa wa
ayahs.7: Wa Huwal lazee khalaqas samaawaati wal arda fee sittati aiyaaminw wa kaana 'Arshuhoo alal
ayahs.8: Wala'in akharnaa 'anhumul 'azaaba ilaaa ummatim ma'doodatil la yaqoolunna maa yahbisuh;
ayahs.9: Wa la'in azaqnal insaana minnaa rahmatan summa naza'naahaa minhu, innahoo laya'oosun
ayahs.10: Wala'in azaqnaahu na'maaa'a ba'da darraaa'a massat hu la yaqoolanna zahabas saiyiaatu
ayahs.11: Illal lazeena sabaroo wa 'amilus saalihaati ulaaa'ika lahum maghfiratunw wa ajrun kabeer
ayahs.12: Fala'allaka taarikum ba'da maa yoohaaa ilaika wa daaa'iqum bihee sadruka ai yaqooloo law laaa
ayahs.13: Am yaqooloonaf taraahu qul faatoo bi'ashri Suwarim mislihee muftarayaatinw wad'oo manis
ayahs.14: Fa il lam yastajeeboo lakum fa'lamooo annamaaa unzilla bi'ilmil laahi wa al laaa ilaaha illaa
ayahs.15: Man kaana yureedul hayaatad dunyaa wa zeenatahaa nuwaf fi ilaihim a'maa lahum feehaa wa
ayahs.16: Ulaaa'ikal lazeena laisa lahum fil Aakhirati illan Naaru wa habita maa sana'oo feehaa wa
ayahs.17: Afaman kaana 'ala baiyinatim mir Rabbihee wa yatloohu shaahidum minhu wa min qablihee
ayahs.18: Wa man azlamu mimmanif taraa 'alal laahi kazibaa; ulaaa'ika yu'radoona 'alaa Rabbihim wa
ayahs.19: Allazeena yasuddoona 'an sabeelil laahi wa yabghoonahaa 'iwajanw wa hum bil Aakhiratihum
ayahs.20: Ulaaa'ika lam yakoonoo mu'jizeena fil ardi wa maa kaana lahum min doonil laahi min awliyaaa';
ayahs.21: Ulaaa'ikal lazeena khasirooo anfusahum wa dalla 'anhum maa kaanoo yaftaroon
ayahs.22: Laa jarama annahum fil Aakhirati humul akhsaroon
ayahs.23: Innal lazeena aamanoo wa 'amilus saalihaati wa akhbatooo ilaa Rabbihim ulaaa'ika Ashaabul
ayahs.24: Masalul fareeqaini kal a'maa wal asammi walbaseeri wassamee'; hal yastawiyaani masalaa;
ayahs.25: Wa laqad arsalnaa Noohan ilaa qawmihee innee lakum nazeerum mubeen
ayahs.26: Al laa ta'budooo illal laaha inneee akhaafu 'alaikum 'azaaba Yawmin aleem
ayahs.27: Faqaalal mala ul lazeena kafaroo min qawmihee ma naraaka illaa basharam mislanaa wa maa
ayahs.28: Qaala yaa qawmi ara'aitum in kuntu 'alaa baiyinatim mir Rabbee wa aataanee rahmatam min
ayahs.29: Wa yaa qawmi laaa as'alukum 'alaihi maalan in ajriya illaa 'alal laah; wa maaa ana bitaaridil
ayahs.30: Wa yaa qawmi mai yansurunee minal laahi in tarattuhum; afalaa tazak karoon
ayahs.31: Wa laa aqoolu lakum 'indee khazaa'inul laahi wa laaa a'lamul ghaiba wa laa aqoolu innee
ayahs.32: Qaaloo yaa Noohu qad jaadaltanaa fa aksarta jidaalanaa faatinaa bimaa ta'idunaaa in kunta
ayahs.33: Qaala innamaa yaateekum bihil laahu in shaaa'a wa maaa antum bimu'jizeen
ayahs.34: Wa laa yanfa'ukum nusheee in arattu an ansaha lakum in kaanal laahu yureedu ai yughwi
ayahs.35: Am yaqooloonaf taraahu qul inif taraituhoo fa'alaiya ijraamee wa ana bareee'um mimmaa
ayahs.36: Wa oohiya ilaa Noohin annahoo lany-yu'mina min qawmika illaa man qad aamana falaa tabta'is
ayahs.37: Wasna'il fulka bi-a'yuninaa wa wahyinaa wa laa tukhaa tibnee fil lazeena zalamoo; innahum
ayahs.38: Wa yasna'ul fulka wa kullamaa marra 'alaihi mala'um min qawmihee sakhiroo minh; qaala in
ayahs.39: Fasawfa ta'lamoona mai ya'teehi 'azaabuny yukhzeehi wa yahillu 'alaihi 'azaabun muqeem
ayahs.40: Hattaaa izaa jaaa'a amrunaa wa faarat tannooru qulnah mil feehaa min kullin zawjainis naini wa
ayahs.41: Wa qaalar kaboo feehaa bismil laahi majraihaa wa mursaahaa; inna Rabbee la Ghafoorur
ayahs.42: Wa hiya tajree bihim fee mawjin kaljibaali wa naadaa Noohunib nahoo wa kaana fee ma'ziliny
ayahs.43: Qaala sa aaweee ilaa jabaliny ya'simunee minal maaa'; qaala laa 'aasimal yawma min amril
ayahs.44: Wa qeela yaaa ardubla'ee maaa'aki wa yaa samaaa'u aqli'ee wa gheedal maaa'u wa qudiyal
ayahs.45: Wa naadaa noohur Rabbahoo faqaala Rabbi innabnee min ahlee wa inna wa'dakal haqqu wa
ayahs.46: Qaala yaa Noohu innahoo laisa min ahlika innahoo 'amalun ghairu saalihin falaa tas'alni maa
ayahs.47: Qaala rabbi inneee a'oozu bika an as'alaka maa laisa lee bihee 'ilmunw wa illaa taghfir lee wa
ayahs.48: Qeela yaa Noohuh bit bisalaamim minnaa wa barakaatin 'alaika wa 'alaaa umamim mimmam
ayahs.49: Tilka min ambaaa'il ghaibi nooheehaaa ilaika maa kunta ta'lamuhaaaa anta wa laa qawmuka
ayahs.50: Wa ilaa 'aadin akhaahum Hoodaa; qaala yaa qawmi' budul laaha maa lakum min ilaahin
ayahs.51: Yaa qawmi laaa as'alukum 'alaihi ajran in ajriya illaa 'alal lazee fataranee; afalaa ta'qiloon
ayahs.52: Wa yaa qawmis taghfiroo Rabbakum summa toobooo ilaihi yursilis samaaa'a 'alaikum
ayahs.53: Qaaloo yaa Hoodu maa ji'tanaa bibaiyinatinw wa maa nahnu bitaarikeee aalihatinaa 'an qawlika
ayahs.54: In naqoolu illa' taraaka ba'du aalihatinaa bisooo'; qaala inneee ushhidul laaha wash hadooo
ayahs.55: Min doonihee fakeedoonee jamee'an summa laa tunziroon
ayahs.56: Innee tawakkaltu 'alallaahi Rabbee wa Rabbikum; maa min daaabbatin illaa Huwa aakhizum
ayahs.57: Fa in tawallaw faqad ablaghtukum maaa ursiltu biheee ilaikum; wa yastakhlifu Rabbee qawman
ayahs.58: Wa lammaa jaaa'a amrunaa najainaa Hoodanw wallazeena aamanoo ma'ahoo birahmatim
ayahs.59: Wa tilka 'aad, jahadoo bi Aayaati Rabbihim wa 'asaw Rusulahoo wattaba'ooo amra kulli
ayahs.60: Wa utbi'oo fee haazihid dunyaa la'natanw wa Yawmal Qiyaamah; alaaa inna 'Aadan kafaroo
ayahs.61: Wa ilaa Samooda akhaahum Saalihaa; qaala yaa qawmi' budul laaha maa lakum min ilaahim
ayahs.62: Qaaloo yaa Saalihu qad kunta feenaa marjuwwan qabla haazaaa atanhaanaaa an na'bu da maa
ayahs.63: Qaala yaa qawmi ara'aytum in kuntu 'alaa baiyinatim mir Rabbee wa aataanee minhu rahmatan
ayahs.64: Wa yaa qawmi haazihee naaqatul laahi lakum aayatan fazaroohaa taakul feee ardil laahi wa laa
ayahs.65: Fa 'aqaroohaa faqaala tamatta'oo fee daarikum salaasata aiyaamin zaalika wa'dun ghairu
ayahs.66: Falammaa jaaa'a amrunaa najjainaa Saalihanw wal lazeena aamanoo ma'ahoo birahmatim
ayahs.67: Wa akhazal lazeena zalamus saihatu fa asbahoo fee diyaarihim jaasimeena
ayahs.68: Ka al lam yaghnaw feehaaa; alaaa inna Samooda kafaroo Rabbahum; alaa bu'dal li Samood.
ayahs.69: Wa laqad jaaa'at Rusulunaaa Ibraaheema bilbushraa qaaloo salaaman qaala salaamun famaa
ayahs.70: Falammaa ra aaa aidiyahum laa tasilu ilaihi nakirahum wa awjasa minhum kheefah; qaaloo laa
ayahs.71: Wamra atuhoo qaaa'imatun fadahikat fabashsharnaahaa bi Ishaaqa wa minw waraaa'i Ishaaqa
ayahs.72: Qaalat yaa wailataaa 'aalidu wa ana 'ajoozunw wa haaza ba'lee shaikhan inna haazaa lashai'un
ayahs.73: Qaalooo ata'jabeena min amril laahi rahmatul laahi wa barakaatuhoo 'alaikum Ahlal Bayt;
ayahs.74: Falammaa zahaba an Ibraaheemar raw'u wa jaaa'at hul bushraaa yujaadilunaa fee qawmi Loot
ayahs.75: Inna Ibraaheema la haleemun awwaahun muneeb
ayahs.76: Yaaa Ibraaheemu a'rid 'an haazaaa innahoo qad jaaa'a amru Rabbika wa innahum aateehim
ayahs.77: Wa lammaa jaaa'at Rusulunaa Lootan seee'a bihim wa daaqa bihim zar'anw wa qaala haazaa
ayahs.78: Wa jaaa'ahoo qawmuhoo yuhra'oona ilaihi wa min qablu kaanoo ya'maloonas saiyiaat; qaala
ayahs.79: Qaaloo laqad 'alimta maa lanaa fee banaatika min haqq, wa innaka lata'lamu maa nureed
ayahs.80: Qaala law anna lee bikum quwwatan aw aaweee ilaa ruknin shadeed
ayahs.81: Qaaloo yaa Lootu innaa Rusulu Rabbika lai yasiloo ilaika fa asri bi ahlika biqit 'im minal laili wa
ayahs.82: Falammaa jaaa'a amrunaa ja'alnaa 'aaliyahaa saafilahaa wa amtarnaa 'alaihaa hijaaratam min

12.name: Summa ba'asnaahum lina'lama ayyul hizbaini ahsaa limaa labisooo amadaa
12.title: section 1

ayahs.13: Nahnu naqussu 'alaika naba ahum bilhaqq; innahum fityatun aamanoo bi Rabbihim wa
ayahs.14: Wa rabatnaa 'alaa quloo bihim iz qaamoo faqaaloo Rabbunaa Rabbus samaawaati wal ardi lan
ayahs.15: Haaa'ulaaa'i qawmunat takhazoo min dooniheee aalihatal law laa yaatoona 'alaihim bisultaanim
ayahs.16: Wa izi'tazal tumoohum wa maa ya'budoona illal laaha faawooo ilal kahfi yanshur lakum
ayahs.17: Wa tarash shamsa izaa tala'at tazaawaru 'an kahfihim zaatal yameeni wa izaa gharabat
ayahs.18: Wa tahsabuhum ayqaazanw wa hum ruqood; wa nuqallibuhum zaatal yameeni wa zaatash
ayahs.19: Wa kazaalika ba'asnaahum liyatasaaa'aloo bainahum; qaala qaaa'ilum minhum kam labistum
ayahs.20: Innahum iny yazharoo 'alaikum yarjumookum aw yu'eedookum fee millatihim wa lan tuflihooo
ayahs.21: Wa kazaalika a'sarnaa 'alaihim liya'lamooo anna wa'dal laahi haqqunw wa annas Saa'ata laa
ayahs.22: Sa yaqooloona salaasatur raabi'uhum kalbuhum wa yaqooloona khamsatun saadisuhum
ayahs.23: Wa laa taqoolanna lishai'in innee faa'ilun zaalika ghadaa
ayahs.24: Illaaa any yashaaa'al laah; wazkur Rabbaka izaa naseeta wa qul 'asaaa any yahdiyani Rabbee li
ayahs.25: Wa labisoo fee kahfihim salaasa mi'atin sineena wazdaadoo tis'aa
ayahs.26: Qulil laahu a'lamu bimaa labisoo lahoo ghaibus samaawaati wal ardi absir bihee wa asmi'; maa
ayahs.27: Watlu maaa oohiya ilaika min Kitaabi Rabbika laa mubaddila li Kalimaatihee wa lan tajida min
ayahs.28: Wasbir nafsaka ma'al lazeena yad'oona Rabbahum bilghadaati wal'ashiyyi yureedoona
ayahs.29: Wa qulil haqqu mir Rabbikum faman shaaa'a falyu'minw wa man shaaa'a falyakfur; innaaa
ayahs.30: Innal lazeena aamanoo wa 'amilus saalihaati innaa laa nudee'u ajra man ahsana 'amalaa
ayahs.31: Ulaaa'ika lahum Jannaatu 'Adnin tajree min tahtihimul anhaaru yuhallawna feehaa min asaawira
ayahs.32: Wadrib lahum masalar rajulaini ja'alnaa li ahadihimaa jannataini min a'naabinw wa
ayahs.33: Kiltal jannataini aatat ukulahaa wa lam tazlim minhu shai'anw wa fajjarnaa khi laalahumaa
ayahs.34: Wa kaana lahoo samarun faqaala lisaahibihee wa huwa yuhaawiruhoo ana aksaru minka
ayahs.35: Wa dakhala jannatahoo wa huwa zaalimul linafsihee qaala maaa azunnu an tabeeda haaziheee
ayahs.36: Wa maaa azunnus Saa'ata qaaa'imatanw wa la'ir rudittu ilaa Rabbee la ajidanna khairam
ayahs.37: Qaala lahoo saahibuhoo wa huwa yuhaawiruhooo akafarta billazee khalaqaka min turaabin
ayahs.38: Laakinaa Huwal laahu Rabbee wa laa ushriku bi Rabbeee ahadaa
ayahs.39: Wa law laaa iz dakhalta jannataka qulta maa shaaa'al laahu laa quwwata illaa billaah; in tarani
ayahs.40: Fa'asaa Rabeee any yu'tiyani khairam min jannatika wa yursila 'alaihaa husbaanam minas
ayahs.41: Aw yusbiha maaa'uhaaa ghawran falan tastatee'a lahoo talabaa
ayahs.42: Wa uheeta bisamarihee faasbaha yuqallibu kaf faihi 'alaa maaa anfaqa feehaa wa hiya
ayahs.43: Wa lam takul lahoo fi'atuny yansuroonahoo min doonil laahi wa maa kaana muntasiraa

ayahs.1: Alif-Laaam-Meeem-Raa; tilka Aayaatul Kitaab; wallazee unzila ilaika mir Rabbikal haqqu wa
ayahs.2: Allaahul lazee raf'as samaawaati bighairi 'amadin tarawnahaa summas tawaa 'alal 'Arshi wa
ayahs.3: Wa Huwal lazee maddal arda wa ja'ala feehaa rawaasiya wa anhaaraa; wa min kullis samaraati
ayahs.4: Wa fil ardi qita'um muta jaawiraatunw wa jannaatum min a'naabinw wa zar'unw wa nakheelun
ayahs.5: Wa in ta'jab fa'ajabun qawluhum 'a-izaa kunna turaaban 'a-inna lafee khalqin jadeed; ulaaa 'ikal
ayahs.6: Wa yasta'jiloonaka bis saiyi'ati qablal hasanati wa qad khalat min qablihimul masulaat; wa inna
ayahs.7: Wa yaqoolul lazeena kafaroo law laaa unzila 'alaihi Aayatum mir Rabbih; innamaaa anta
ayahs.8: Allaahu ya'lamu maa tahmilu kullu unsaa wa maa tagheedul arhaamu wa maa tazdaad, wa kullu
ayahs.9: 'Aalimul Ghaibi wash shahaadatil Kaabeerul Muta'aal
ayahs.10: Sawaaa'um minkum man asarral qawla wa man jahara bihee wa man huwa mustakhfim billaili
ayahs.11: Lahoo mu'aqqibaatum mim baini yadaihi wa min khalfihee yahfazoonahoo min amril laah; innal
ayahs.12: Huwal lazee yureekumul barqa khawfanw wa tama'anw wa yunshi'us sahaabas siqaal
ayahs.13: Wa yusabbihur ra'du bihamdihee walmalaaa'ikatu min kheefatihee wa yursilus sawaa'iqa fa
ayahs.14: Lahoo da'watul haqq; wallazeena yad'oona min doonihee laa yastajeeboona lahum bishai'in illaa
ayahs.15: Wa lillaahi yasjudu man fis samaawaati wal ardi taw 'anw wa karhanw wa zilaaluhum
ayahs.16: Qul mar Rabbus samaawaati wal ard; qulillaah; qul afattakhaztum min dooniheee awliyaaa'a laa
ayahs.17: Anzala minas samaaa'i maaa'an fasaalat awdiyatum biqadarihaa fahtamalas sailu zabadar
ayahs.18: Lillazeenas tajaaboo lirabbihimul husnaa; wallazeena lam yastajeeboo lahoo law anna lahum
ayahs.19: Afamai ya'lamu annamaaa unzila ilaika mir Rabbikal haqqu kaman huwa a'maa; innamaa
ayahs.21: Wallazeena yasiloona maaa amaral laahu bihee ai yoosala wa yakhshawna Rabbahum wa
ayahs.22: Wallazeena sabarub tighaaa'a W ajhi Rabbihim wa aqaamus Salaata wa anfaqoo mimmaa
ayahs.23: Jannaatu 'adiny yadkhu loonahaa wa man salaha min aabaaa'ihim wa azwaajihim wa
ayahs.24: Salaamun 'alaikum bimaa sabartum; fani'ma 'uqbad daar
ayahs.25: Wallazeena yanqudoona 'Ahdal laahi mim ba'di meesaaqihee wa yaqta'oona maaa amaral laahu
ayahs.26: Allaahu yabsutur rizqa limai yashaaa'u wa yaqdir; wa farihoo bilhayaatid dunyaa wa mal
ayahs.27: Wa yaqoolul lazeena kafaroo law laaa unzila 'alaihi Aayatum mir Rabbih; qul innal laaha yudillu
ayahs.28: Allazeena aamanoo wa tatma'innu quloobuhum bizikril laah; alaa bizikril laahi tatma'innul quloob
ayahs.29: Allazeena aamanoo wa a'amilus saalihaati toobaa lahum wa husnu ma aab
ayahs.30: Kazaalika arsalnaaka feee ummatin qad khalat min qablihaaa umamul litatluwa 'alaihimul lazeee
ayahs.31: Wa law anna Quraanan suyyirat bihil jibaalu aw qutti'at bihil ardu aw kullima bihil mawtaa; bal
ayahs.32: Wa laqadis tuhzi'a bi Rusulim min qablika fa amlaitu lillazeena kafaroo summa akhaztuhum
ayahs.33: Afaman Huwa qaaa'imun 'alaa kulli nafsim bimaa kasabat; wa ja'aloo lillaahi shurakaaa'a qul
ayahs.34: Lahum 'azaabun fil hayaatid dunyaa wa la'azaabul Aakhirati ashaq, wa maa lahum minal laahi
ayahs.35: Masalul Jannatil latee wu'idal muttaqoona tajree min tahtihal anhaaru ukuluhaa daaa'imunw wa
ayahs.36: Wallazeena aatainaa humul Kitaaba yafrahoona bimaa unzila ilaika wa minal Ahzaabi mai
ayahs.37: Wa kazaalika anzalnaahu hukman 'Arabiyyaa; wa la'init taba'ta ahwaaa 'ahum ba'da maa
ayahs.38: Wa laqad arsalnaa Rusulam min qablika wa ja'alnaa lahum azwaajanw wa zurriyyah; wa maa
ayahs.39: Yamhul laahu maa yashaaa'u wa yusbitu wa 'indahooo ummul Kitaab
ayahs.40: Wa im maa nurriyannaka ba'dal lazee na'iduhum aw nata waf fayannaka fa innamaa 'alaikal
ayahs.41: Awalam yaraw annaa na'til arda nanqusuhaa min atraafihaa; wallaahu yahkumu laa mu'aqqiba
ayahs.42: Wa qad makaral lazeena min qablihim falillaahil makru jamee'aa; ya'lamu maa taksibu kullu nafs;
ayahs.43: Wa yaqoolul lazeena kafaroo lasta mursalaa; qul kafaa billaahi shaheedam bainee wa bainakum

14.name: In kullun illaa kazzabar Rusula fahaqqa 'iqaab
14.title: section 1

ayahs.15: Wa maa yanzuru haaa ulaaa'i illaa saihatanw waahidatam maa lahaa min fawaaq
ayahs.16: Wa qaaloo Rabbanaa 'ajjil lanaa qittanaa qabla Yawmil Hisaab
ayahs.17: Isbir 'alaa maa yaqooloona wazkur 'abdanaa Daawooda zal aidi innahooo awwaab
ayahs.18: Innaa sakhkharnal jibaala ma'ahoo yusabbihna bil'ashiyyi wal ishraaq
ayahs.19: Wattayra mahshoorah; kullul lahooo awwaab
ayahs.20: Wa shadadnaa mulkahoo wa aatainaahul Hikmata wa faslal khitaab
ayahs.21: Wa hal ataaka naba'ul khasm; iz tasawwarul mihraab
ayahs.22: Iz dakhaloo 'alaa Daawooda fafazi'a minhum qaaloo laa takhaf khasmaani baghaa ba'dunaa
ayahs.23: Inna haazaaa akhee lahoo tis'unw wa tis'oona na'jatanw wa liya na'jatunw waahidah; faqaala
ayahs.24: Qaala laqad zalamaka bisu 'aali na'jatika ilaa ni'aajih; wa inna kaseeran minal khulataaa'i la-
ayahs.25: Faghafarnaa lahoo zaalik; wa inna lahoo 'indanaa lazulfaa wa husna ma aab
ayahs.26: Yaa Daawoodu innaa ja'alnaaka khaleefatan fil ardi fahkum bainan naasi bilhaqqi wa laa tattabi'il
ayahs.27: Wa maa khalaqnas samaaa'a wal arda wa maa bainahumaa baatilaa; zaalika zannul lazeena
ayahs.28: Am naj'alul lazeena aamanoo wa 'amilus saalihaati kalmufisdeena fil ardi am naj'alul muttaqeena
ayahs.29: Kitaabun anzalnaahu ilaika mubaarakul liyaddabbarooo Aayaatihee wa liyatazakkara ulul albaab
ayahs.30: Wa wahabnaa li Daawooda Sulaimaan; ni'mal 'abd; innahoo awwaab
ayahs.31: Iz 'urida 'alaihi bil'ashiy yis saafinaatul jiyaad
ayahs.32: Faqaala inneee ahbabtu hubbal khairi 'an zikri Rabbee hattaa tawaarat bilhijaab
ayahs.33: Ruddoohaa 'alaiya fa tafiqa mas-ham bissooqi wal a'naaq
ayahs.34: Wa laqad fatannaa Sulaimaana wa alqainaa 'alaa kursiyyihee jasadan summa anaab
ayahs.35: Qaala Rabbigh fir lee wa hab lee mulkal laa yambaghee li ahadin min ba'dee innaka Antal
ayahs.36: Fa sakharnaa lahur reeha tajree bi amrihee rukhaaa'an haisu asaab
ayahs.38: Wa aakhareena muqarraneena fil asfaad
ayahs.39: Haazaa 'ataaa'unaa famnun aw amsik bighairi hisaab

15.name: Wa ja'aloo lahoo min 'ibaadihee juz'aa; innal insaana la kafoorun mubeen
15.title: section 1

ayahs.16: Amit takhaza mimmaa yakhluqu banaatinw wa asfaakum bilbaneen
ayahs.17: Wa izaa bushshira ahaduhum bimaa daraba lir Rahmaani masalan zalla wajhuhoo
ayahs.18: Awa mai yunashsha'u fil hilyati wa huwa fil khisaami ghairu mubeen
ayahs.19: Wa ja'alul malaaa'ikatal lazeena hum 'ibaadur Rahmaani inaasaa; 'a shahidoo khalqahum;
ayahs.20: Wa qaaloo law shaaa'ar Rahmaanu maa 'abadnaahum; maa lahum bizaalika min 'ilmin in hum
ayahs.21: Am aatainaahum Kitaaban min qablihee fahum bihee mustamsikoon
ayahs.22: Bal qaalooo innaa wajadnaaa aabaaa'anaa 'alaaa ummatinw wa innaa 'alaaa aasaarihim
ayahs.23: Wa kazaalika maaa arsalnaa min qablika fee qaryatim min nazeerin illaa qaala mutrafoohaaa
ayahs.24: Qaala awa law ji'tukum bi ahdaa mimmaa wajatdtum 'alaihi aabaaa'akum qaalooo innaa bimaaa

ayahs.1: Ataaa amrullaahi falaa tasta'jilooh; Subhaanahoo wa Ta'aalaa 'ammaa yushrikoon
ayahs.2: Yunazzilul malaaa 'ikata birroohi min amrihee 'alaa mai yashaaa'u min 'ibaadiheee an anzirooo
ayahs.3: Khalaqas samaawaati wal arda bilhaqq; Ta'aalaa 'ammaa yushrikoon
ayahs.4: Khalaqal insaana min nutfatin fa izaa huwa khaseemum mubeen
ayahs.5: Wal an 'amaa khalaqahaa; lakum feehaa dif'unw wa manaafi'u wa minhaa taakuloon
ayahs.6: Wa lakum feehaa jamaalun heena tureehoona wa heena tasrahoon
ayahs.7: Wa tahmilu asqaalakum ilaa baladil lam takoonoo baaligheehi illaa bishiqqil anfus; inna
ayahs.8: Walkhaila wal bighaala wal hameera litarkaboohaa wa zeenah; wa yakhluqu maa laa ta'lamoon
ayahs.9: Wa 'alal laahi qasdus sabeeli wa minhaa jaaa'ir; wa law shaaa'a lahadaakum ajma'een (section
ayahs.10: Huwal lazeee anzala minas samaaa'i maaa'al lakum minhu sharaabunw wa minhu shajarun
ayahs.11: Yumbitu lakum bihiz zar'a wazzaitoona wanna kheela wal-a'naaba wa min kullis samaraat, inna
ayahs.12: Wa sakkhkhara lakumul laila wannahaara wash shamsa walqamara wannujoomu
ayahs.13: Wa maa zara a lakum fil ardi mukhtalifan alwaanuh; inna fee zaalika la Aayatal liqawminy
ayahs.14: Wa Huwal lazee sakhkharal bahra litaakuloo minhu lahman tariyyanw wa tastakhrijoo minhu
ayahs.15: Wa alqaa fil ardi rawaasiya an tameeda bikum wa anhaaranw wa sublulal la 'allakum tahtadoon
ayahs.16: Wa 'alaamaat; wa bin najmi hum yahtadoon
ayahs.17: Afamany yakhluqu kamallaa yakhluq; afalaa tazak karoon
ayahs.18: Wa in ta'uddoo ni'matal laahi laa tuhsoohaa; innal laaha la Ghafoorur Raheem
ayahs.19: Wallaahu ya'lamu maa tusirroona wa maa tu'linoon
ayahs.20: Wallazeena yad'oona min doonil laahi laa yakhluqoona shai'anw wa hum yukhlaqoon

ayahs.1: Subhaanal lazeee asraa bi'abdihee lailam minal Masjidil Haraami ilal Masjidil Aqsal-lazee
ayahs.2: Wa aatainaa Moosal-Kitaaba wa ja'alnaahu hudal-liBaneee Israaa'eel; allaa tat-takhizoo min
ayahs.3: Zurriyyata man hamalnaa ma'a Noohin innahoo kaana 'abdan shakooraa
ayahs.4: Wa qadainaaa ilaa Baneee Israaa'eela fil Kitaabi latufsidunna fil ardi marratain; wa
ayahs.5: Fa-izaa jaaa'a wa'duoolaahumaa ba'asnaaa 'alykum 'ibaadal-lanaaa ulee baasin shadeedin
ayahs.6: Summa radadnaa lakumul karrata 'alaihim wa amdad-naakum-bi amwaalinuw wa baneen; wa
ayahs.7: In ahsantum ahsantum li anfusikum wa in asaatum falahaa; fa izaa jaaa'a wa'dul aakhirati
ayahs.8: 'Asaa rabbukum anyyarhamakum; wa in 'uttum 'udnaa; wa ja'alnaa jahannama lilkaafireena
ayahs.9: Inna haazal Quraana yahdee lillatee hiya aqwamu wa yubashshirul mu'mineenal lazeena

18.name: Wa najjainal lazeena aamanoo wa kaanoo yattaqoon
18.title: section 2

ayahs.19: Wa yawma yuhsharu a'daaa'ul laahi ilan Naari fahum yooza'oon
ayahs.20: Hattaaa izaa maa jaaa'oohaa shahida 'alaihim samu'uhum wa absaaruhum wa julooduhum
ayahs.21: Wa qaaloo lijuloodihim lima shahittum 'alainaa qaaloo antaqanal laahul lazeee antaqa kulla
ayahs.22: Wa maa kuntum tastatiroona ai-yashhada 'alaikum sam'ukum wa laaa absaarukum wa laa
ayahs.23: Wa zaalikum zannukumul lazee zanantum bi-Rabbikum ardaakum fa asbahtum minal
ayahs.24: Fa-iny yasbiroo fan Naaru maswal lahum wa iny-yasta'tiboo famaa hum minal mu'tabeen
ayahs.25: Wa qaiyadnaa lahum quranaaa'a fazaiyanoo lahum maa baina aideehim wa maa khalfahum wa
ayahs.26: Wa qaalal lazeena kafaroo laa tasma'oo lihaazal Quraani walghaw feehi la'allakum taghliboon
ayahs.27: Falanuzeeqannal lazeena kafaroo 'azaaban shadeedanw wa lanajziyannahum aswallazee
ayahs.28: Zaalika jazaaa'u a'daaa'il laahin Naaru lahum feehaa daarul khuld, jazaaa'am bimaa kaanoo bi
ayahs.29: Wa qaalal lazeena kafaroo Rabbanaaa arinal lazaini adal laanaa minal jinni wal insi naj'alhumaa
ayahs.30: Innal lazeena qaaloo Rabbunal laahu summas taqaamoo tatanazzalu 'alaihimul malaaa 'ikatu
ayahs.31: Nahnu awliyaaa'ukum fil hayaatid dunyaa wa fil Aakhirati wa lakum feehaa maa tashtaheee

19.name: Allahu lateefum bi'ibaadihee yarzuqu mai yashaaa'u wa Huwal Qawiyyul 'Azeez
19.title: Section 2

ayahs.20: Man kaana yureedu harsal Aakhirati nazid lahoo fee harsihee wa man kaana yureedu harsad
ayahs.21: Am lahum shurakaaa'u shara'oo lahum minad deeni maa lam ya'zan bihil laah; wa law laa
ayahs.22: Taraz zaalimeena mushfiqeena mimmaa kasaboo wa huwa waaqi'um bihim; wallazeena
ayahs.23: Zaalikal lazee yubash shirul laahu 'ibaadahul lazeena aamanoo wa 'amilus saalihaat; qul laaa
ayahs.24: Am yaqooloonaf tara 'alal laahi kaziban fa-iny yasha' illaahu yakhtim 'alaa qalbik; wa yamhul
ayahs.25: Wa Huwal lazee yaqbalut tawbata 'an 'ibaadihee wa ya'foo 'anis saiyiaati wa ya'lamu maa
ayahs.26: Wa yastajeebul lazeena aamanoo wa 'amilu saalihaati wa yazeeduhum min fadlih; wal
ayahs.27: Wa law basatal laahur rizqa li'ibaadihee labaghaw fil ardi wa laakiny yunazzilu biqadarim maa
ayahs.28: Wa Huwal lazee yunazzilul ghaisa min ba'di maa qanatoo wa yanshuru rahmatah; wa Huwal
ayahs.29: Wa min Aayaatihee khalqus samaawaati wal ardi wa maa bassa feehimaa min daaabbah; wa
ayahs.30: Wa maaa asaabakum min museebatin fabimaa kasabat aydeekum wa ya'foo 'an kaseer
ayahs.31: Wa maaa antum bimu'jizeena fil ardi wa maa lakum min doonil laahi minw wa liyyinw wa laa
ayahs.32: Wa min Aayaatihil ja waarifil bahri kal a'lam
ayahs.33: Iny yashaaa yuskinir reeha fa yazlalna rawaakida 'alaa zahrihi; inna fee zaalika la Aayaatil likulli
ayahs.34: Aw yoobiqhunna bimaa kasaboo wa ya'fu 'an kaseer
ayahs.35: Wa ya'lamal lazeena yujaadiloona feee Aayaatinaa maa lahum min mahees
ayahs.36: Famaa ooteetum min shai'in famataa'ul hayaatid dunyaa wa maa 'indal laahi khairunw wa abqaa
ayahs.37: Wallazeena yajtaniboona kabaaa'iral ismi wal fawaahisha wa izaa maa ghadiboo hum
ayahs.38: Wallazeenas tajaaboo li Rabbihim wa aqaamus Salaata wa amruhum shooraa bainahum wa
ayahs.39: Wallazeena izaa asaabahumul baghyu hum yantasiroon
ayahs.40: Wa jazaaa'u saiyi'atin saiyi'atum misluha faman 'afaa wa aslaha fa ajruhoo 'alal laah; innahoo
ayahs.41: Wa lamanin tasara ba'da zulmihee fa ulaaa'ika maa 'alaihim min sabeel
ayahs.42: Innamas sabeelu 'alal lazeena yazlimoonan naasa wa yabghoona fil ardi bighairil haqq; ulaaa'ika

20.name: Wa law laa fadlul laahi 'alaikum wa rahmatuhoo wa annal laaha Ra'oofur Raheem
20.title: section 2

ayahs.21: Yaaa aiyuhal lazeena aamanoo laa tattabi'oo khutuwaatish Shaitaan; wa many-yattabi'
ayahs.22: Wa laa yaatali ulul fadli minkum wassa'ati ai yu'tooo ulil qurbaa walmasaakeena
ayahs.23: Innal lazeena yarmoonal muhsanaatil ghaafilaatil mu'minaati lu'inoo fid dunyaa wal Aakhirati wa
ayahs.24: Yawma tashhhadu 'alaihim alsinatuhum wa aideehim wa arjuluhum bimaa kaanoo ya'maloon
ayahs.25: Yawma'iziny yuwaf feehimul laahu deenahumul haqqa wa ya'lamoona annal laaha Huwal
ayahs.26: Al khabeesaatu lil khabeeseena wal khabeesoona lil khabeesaati wat taiyibaatu lit taiyibeena
ayahs.27: Yaaa aiyuhal lazeena aamanoo laa tadkhuloo buyootan ghaira buyootikum hatta tastaanisoo wa
ayahs.28: Fa il lam tajidoo feehaaa ahadan falaa tadkhuloohaa hattaa yu'zana lakum wa in qeela
ayahs.29: Laisa 'alaikum junaahun ann tadkhuloo buyootan ghaira maskoonatin feeha mataa'ul lakum;
ayahs.30: Qul lilmu' mineena yaghuuddoo min absaarihim wa yahfazoo furoojahum; zaalika azkaa lahum;
ayahs.31: Wa qul lilmu'minaati yaghdudna min absaarihinna wa yahfazna furoojahunna wa laa yubdeena
ayahs.32: Wa ankihul ayaamaa minkum was saaliheena min 'ibaadikum wa imaa'ikum; iny-yakoonoo
ayahs.33: Wal yasta'fifil lazeena laa yajidoona nikaahan hatta yughniyahumul laahu min fadlih; wallazeena
ayahs.34: Wa laqad anzalnaaa ilaikum Aayaatim mubaiyinaatinw wa masalam minal lazeena khalaw min
ayahs.35: Allaahu noorus samaawaati wal ard; masalu noorihee kamishkaatin feehaa misbaah;
ayahs.36: Fee buyootin azinal laahu an turfa'a wa yuzkara feehasmuhoo yusabbihu lahoo feehaa
ayahs.37: Rijaalul laa tulheehim tijaaratunw wa laa bai'un 'an zikril laahi wa iqaamis Salaati wa eetaaa'iz
ayahs.38: Liyajziyahumul laahu ahsana maa 'amiloo wa yazeedahum min fadlih; wal laahu yarzuqu mai
ayahs.39: Wallazeena kafarooo a'maaluhum kasaraabim biqee'atiny yahsabuhuz zamaanu maaa'an
ayahs.40: Aw kazulumaatin fee bahril lujjiyyiny yaghshaahu mawjun min fawqihee mawjun min fawqihee
ayahs.41: Alam tara annal laaha yusabbihu lahoo man fissamaawaati wal ardi wat tairu saaaf faatim kullun
ayahs.42: Wa lillaahi mulkus samaawaati wal ardi wa ilal laahil maseer
ayahs.43: Alam tara annal laaha yuzjee sahaaban summa yu'allifu bainahoo summa yaj'aluhoo rukaaman
ayahs.44: Yuqallibul laahul laila wannahaar; inna fee zaalika la'ibratal li ulil absaar
ayahs.45: Wallaahu khalaqa kulla daaabbatim mim maaa'in faminhum mai yamshee 'alaa batnihee wa
ayahs.46: Laqad anzalnaaa Aayaatim mubaiyinaat; wallaahu yahdee mai yashaaa'u ilaa Siraatim
ayahs.47: Wa yaqooloona aamannaa billaahi wa bir Rasooli wa ata'naa summa yatawallaa fareequm
ayahs.48: Wa izaa du'ooo ilal laahi wa Rasoolihee li yahkuma bainahum izaa fareequm minhum mu'ridoon
ayahs.49: Wa iny-yakul lahumul haqqu yaatooo ilaihi muz'ineen
ayahs.50: Afee quloobihim maradun amirtaabooo am yakhaafoona any yaheefallaahu 'alaihim wa
ayahs.51: Innamaa kaana qawlal mu'mineena izaa du'ooo ilal laahi wa Rasoolihee li yahkuma bainahum ai
ayahs.52: Wa mai yuti'il laaha wa Rasoolahoo wa yakhshal laaha wa yattaqhi fa ulaaa'ika humul faaa'izoon
ayahs.53: Wa aqsamoo billaahi jahda aimaanihim la'in amartahum la yakhrujunna qul laa tuqsimoo
ayahs.54: Qul atee'ul laaha wa atee'ur Rasoola fa in tawallaw fa innamaa 'alaihi maa hummila wa 'alaikum
ayahs.55: Wa'adal laahul lazeena aamanoo minkum wa 'amilus saalihaati la yastakhlifan nahum fil ardi
ayahs.56: Wa aqeemus Salaata wa aatuz Zakaata wa atee'ur Rasoola la'allakum turhamoon
ayahs.57: Laa tahsabannal lazeena kafaroo mu'jizeena fil ard; wa maawaahumun Naaru wa labi'sal
ayahs.58: Yaaa aiyuhal lazeena aamanoo li yasta'zinkumul lazeena malakat aimaanukum wallazeena lam
ayahs.59: Wa izaa balaghal atfaalu minkumul huluma fal yasta'zinoo kamas ta'zanal lazeena min qablihim;
ayahs.60: Walqawaa'idu minan nisaaa'il laatee laa yarjoona nikaahan fa laisa 'alaihinna junaahun ai
ayahs.61: Laisa 'alal a'maa harajunw wa laa 'alal a'raji harajunw wa laa 'alal mareedi harajun wa laa 'alaa
ayahs.62: Innamal mu'minoonal lazeena aamanoo billaahi wa Rasoolihee wa izaa kaanoo ma'ahoo 'alaaa
ayahs.63: Laa taj'aloo du'aaa'ar Rasooli bainakum ka du'aaa'i ba'dikum ba'daa; qad ya'lamul laahul
ayahs.64: 'Alaaa inna lillaahi maa fis samaawaati wal ardi qad ya'lamu maaa antum 'alaihi wa Yawma

21.name: Wa izaa quri'a 'alaihimul Quraanu laa yasjudoon
21.title: make sajda

ayahs.22: Balil lazeena kafaroo yukazziboon
ayahs.23: Wallaahu a'lamu bimaa yoo'oon
ayahs.24: Fabashshirhum bi'azaabin aleem

ayahs.23: Wa laqad arsalnaa Noohan ilaa qawmihee faqaala yaa qawmi'budul laaha maa lakum min ilahin
ayahs.24: Faqaalal mala'ul lazeena kafaroo min qawmihee maa haazaaa illaa basharum mislukum
ayahs.25: In huwa illaa rajulum bihee jinnatun fatarabbasoo bihee hatta heen
ayahs.26: Qaala Rabbin surnee bimaa kazzaboon
ayahs.27: Fa awhainaaa ilaihi anis na'il fulka bi a'yuninaa wa wahyinaa fa izaa jaaa'a amrunaa wa faarat
ayahs.28: Fa izas tawaita anta wa mam ma'aka 'alal fulki faqulil hamdu lillaahil lazee najjaanaa minal
ayahs.29: Wa qur Rabbi anzilnee munzalam mubaarakanw wa Anta khairul munzileen
ayahs.30: Inna fee zaalika la Aayaatinw wa in kunnaa lamubtaleen
ayahs.31: Summaa anshaana mim ba'dihim qarnan aakhareen
ayahs.32: Fa arsalnaa feehim Rasoolam minhum ani'budul laaha maa lakum min ilaahin ghairuhoo afalaa
ayahs.33: Wa qaalal mala-u min qawmihil lazeena kafaroo wa kazzaboo bi liqaaa'il Aakhirati wa
ayahs.34: Wa la'in at'atum basharam mislakum innakum izal lakhaasiroon
ayahs.36: Haihaata haihaata limaa too'adoon
ayahs.37: In hiya illaa hayaatunad dunyaa namootu wa nahyaa wa maa nahnu bimab'ooseen
ayahs.38: In huwa illaa rajulunif taraa 'alal laahi kazibanw wa maa nahnuu lahoo bimu'mineen
ayahs.39: Qaala Rabbin surnee bimaa kazzaboon
ayahs.40: Qaala 'ammaa qaleelil la yusbihunna naadimeen
ayahs.41: Fa akhazat humus saihatu bilhaqqi faja'alnaahum ghusaaa'aa; fabu'dal lilqaw miz zaalimeen
ayahs.42: Summa anshaanaa mim ba'dihim quroonan aakhareen
ayahs.43: Maa tasbiqu min ummatin ajalahaa wa maa yastaakhiroon
ayahs.44: Summa arsalnaa Rusulanaa tatraa kulla maa jaaa'a ummatar Rasooluhaa kazzabooh; fa
ayahs.45: Summa arsalnaa Moosaa wa akhaahu Haaroona bi Aayaatinaa wa sultaanim mubeen
ayahs.46: Ilaa Fir'awna wa mala'ihee fastakbaroo wa kaanoo qawman 'aaleen
ayahs.47: Faqaaloo annu'minu libasharaini mislinaa wa qawmuhumaa lanaa 'aabidoon
ayahs.48: Fakazzaboohumaa fakaanoo minal muhlakeen
ayahs.49: Wa laqad aatainaa Moosal Kitaaba la'allahum yahtadoon
ayahs.50: Wa ja'alnab na Maryama wa ummahooo aayatannw wa aawainaahumaaa ilaa rabwatin zaati
ayahs.51: Yaaa aiyuhar Rusulu kuloo minat taiyibaati wa'maloo saalihan innee bimaa ta'maloona 'Aleem
ayahs.52: Wa inna haaziheee ummatukum ummatanw waahidatanw wa Ana Rabbukum fattaqoon
ayahs.53: Fataqatta'ooo amrahum bainahum zuburaa; kullu hizbim bimaa ladaihim farihoon
ayahs.55: A-yahsaboona annnamaa numidduhum bihee mimmaalinw wa baneen
ayahs.56: Nusaari'u lahum fil khairaat; bal laa yash'uroon
ayahs.57: Innal lazeena hum min khashyati Rabbihim mushfiqoon
ayahs.58: Wallazeena hum bi Aayaati Rabbihim yu'minoon
ayahs.59: Wallazeena hum bi Rabbihim laa yushrikoon
ayahs.60: Wallazeena yu'toona maaa aataw wa quloobuhum wajilatun annahum ilaa Rabbihim raaji'oon
ayahs.61: Ulaaa'ika yusaari'oona fil khairaati wa hum lahaa saabiqoon
ayahs.62: Wa laa nukallifu nafsan illaa wus'ahaa wa ladainaa kitaabuny yantiqu bilhaqqi wa hum la
ayahs.63: Bal quloobuhum fee ghamratim min haazaa wa lahum a'maalum min dooni zaalika hum lahaa
ayahs.64: Hattaaa izaaa akhaznaa mutrafeehim bil'azaabi izaa hum yaj'aroon
ayahs.65: Laa taj'arul yawma innakum minnaa laa tunsaroon
ayahs.66: Qad kaanat Aayaatee tutlaa 'alaikum fakuntum 'alaaa a'qaabikum tankisoon
ayahs.68: Afalam yaddabbarrul qawla am jaaa'ahum maa lam yaati aabaaa'ahumul awwaleen
ayahs.69: Am lam ya'rifoo Rasoolahum fahum lahoo munkiroon
ayahs.70: Am yaqooloona bihee jinnnah; bal jaaa'ahum bilhaqqi wa aksaruhum lil haqqi kaarihoon
ayahs.71: Wa lawit taba'al haqqu ahwaaa'ahum lafasadatis samaawaatu wal ardu wa man feehinnn; bal
ayahs.72: Am tas'aluhum kharjan fakharaaju Rabbika khairunw wa Huwa khairur raaziqeen
ayahs.73: Wa innaka latad'oohum ilaa Siraatim Mustaqeem
ayahs.74: Wa innnal lazeena laa yu'minoona bil Aakhirati 'anis siraati lanaakiboon
ayahs.75: Wa law rahimnaahum wa kashafnaa maa bihim min durril lalajjoo fee tughyaanihim ya'mahoon
ayahs.76: Wa laqad akhaznaahum bil'azaabi famastakaanoo li Rabbihim wa maa yatadarra'oon
ayahs.77: Hattaaa izaa fatahnaa 'alaihim baaban zaa 'azaabin shadeedin izaa hum feehi mublisoon
ayahs.78: Wa Huwal lazeee ansha a-lakumus sam'a wal absaara wal af'idah; qaleelam maa tashkuroon
ayahs.79: Wa Huwal lazee zara akum fil ardi wa ilaihi tuhsharoon
ayahs.80: Wa Huwal lazee yuhyee wa yumeetu wa lahukh tilaaful laili wannahaar; afalaa ta'qiloon
ayahs.81: Bal qaaloo misla maa qaalal awwaloon
ayahs.83: Laqad wu'idnaa nahnu wa aabaaa'unaa haazaa min qablu in haazaaa illaaa asaateerul
ayahs.84: Qul limanil ardu wa man feehaaa in kuntum ta'lamoon
ayahs.86: Qul mar Rabbus samaawaatis sab'i wa Rabbul 'Arshil 'Azeem
ayahs.87: Sa yaqooloona lillaah; qul afalaa tattaqoon
ayahs.88: Qul mam bi yadihee malakootu kulli shai'inw wa Huwa yujeeru wa laa yujaaru 'alaihi in kuntum
ayahs.89: Sa yaqooloona lillaah; qul fa annaa tus haroon
ayahs.90: Bal atainaahum bil haqqi wa innahum lakaaziboon
ayahs.91: Mat takhazal laahu minw waladinw wa maa kaana ma'ahoo min ilaah; izal lazahaba kullu ilaahim

ayahs.3: Wallazeena hum 'anillaghwimu'ridoon
ayahs.4: Wallazeena hum liz Zakaati faa'iloon
ayahs.5: Wallazeena hum lifuroo jihim haafizoon
ayahs.6: Illaa 'alaaa azwaajihim aw maa malakat aimaanuhum fa innahum ghairu maloomeen
ayahs.7: Famanib taghaa waraaa'a zaalika fa ulaaa'ika humul 'aadoon
ayahs.8: Wallazeena hum li amaanaatihim wa 'ahdihim raa'oon
ayahs.9: Wallazeena hum 'alaa Salawaatihim yuhaafizoon
ayahs.10: Ulaaa'ika humul waarisoon
ayahs.11: Allazeena yarisoonal Firdawsa hum feehaa khaalidoon
ayahs.12: Wa laqad khalaqnal insaana min sulaalatim minteen
ayahs.13: Summa ja'alnaahu nutfatan fee qaraarim makeen
ayahs.14: Summa khalaqnan nutfata 'alaqatan fakhalaqnal 'alaqata mudghatan fakhalaq nal mudghata
ayahs.15: Summa innakum ba'da zaalika la maiyitoon
ayahs.16: Summa innakum Yawmal Qiyaamati tub'asoon
ayahs.17: Wa laqad khalaqnaa fawqakum sab'a taraaa'iqa wa maa kunnaa 'anil khalqi ghaafileen
ayahs.18: Wa anzalnaa minas samaaa'i maaa'am biqadarin fa-askannaahu fil ardi wa innaa 'alaa
ayahs.19: Fa anshaanaa lakum bihee Jannaatim min nakheelinw wa a'naab; lakum feehaa fawaakihu
ayahs.20: Wa shajaratan takhruju min Toori Sainaaa'a tambutu bidduhni wa sibghil lil aakileen
ayahs.21: Wa inna lakum fil an'aami la'ibrah; nusqeekum mimmaa fee butoonihaa wa lakum feehaa

ayahs.1: Sooratun anzalnaahaa wa faradnaahaa wa anzalnaa feehaaa Aayaatin baiyinaatil la'allakum
ayahs.2: Azzaaniyatu wazzaanee fajlidoo kulla waahidim minhumaa mi'ata jaldatinw wa laa taakhuzkum
ayahs.3: Azzaanee laa yankihu illaa zaaniyatan aw mushrikatanw wazzaaniyatu laa yankihuhaaa illaa
ayahs.4: Wallazeena yarmoonal muhsanaati summa lam yaatoo bi-arba'ati shuhadaaa'a fajlidoohum
ayahs.5: Illal lazeena taaboo mim ba'di zaalika wa aslahoo fa innal laaha Ghafoorur Raheem
ayahs.6: Wallazeena yarmoona azwaajahum wa lam yakul lahum shuhadaaa'u illaaa anfusuhum
ayahs.7: Wal khaamisatu anna la'natal laahi 'alaihi in kaana minal kaazibeen
ayahs.8: Wa yadra'u anhal 'azaaba an tashhada arba'a shahaa daatim billaahi innahoo laminal kaazibeen
ayahs.9: Wal khaamisata anna ghadabal laahi 'alaihaaa in kaana minas saadiqeen

25.name: Fantaqamnaa minhum fanzur kaifa kaana 'aaqibatul mukazzibeen
25.title: section 2

ayahs.26: Wa iz qaala Ibraaheemu liabeehi wa qawmiheee innane baraaa'um mimmaa ta'budoon
ayahs.27: Illal lazee fataranee fa innahoo sa yahdeen
ayahs.28: Wa ja'alahaa kalimatan baaqiyatan fee 'aqibihee la 'allahum yarji'oon
ayahs.29: Bal matta'tu haaa'ulaaa'i wa aabaaa'ahum hattaa jaaa'a humul haqqu wa Rasoolun mubeen
ayahs.30: Wa lammaa jaaa'ahumul haqqu qaaloo haazaa sihrunw wa innaa bihee kaafiroon
ayahs.31: Wa qaaloo law laa nuzzila haazal Quraanu 'alaa rajulin minal qaryataini 'azeem
ayahs.32: 'A hum yaqsimoona rahmata Rabbik; Nahnu qasamnaa bainahum ma'eeshatahum fil hayaatid
ayahs.33: Wa law laaa any yakoonan naasu ummatanw waahidatan laja'alnaa limany yakfuru bir
ayahs.34: Wa li buyootihim abwaabanw wa sururan 'alaihaa yattaki'oon
ayahs.35: Wa zukhrufaa; wa in kullu zaalika lammaa mataa'ul hayaatid dunyaa; wal aakhiratu 'inda
ayahs.37: Wa innahum la yasuddoo nahum 'anis sabeeli wa yahsaboona annahum muhtadoon
ayahs.38: Hattaaa izaa jaaa'anaa qaala yaa laita bainee wa bainaka bu'dal mashriqaini fabi'sal qareen
ayahs.39: Wa lai yanfa'akumul Yawma iz zalamtum annakum fil 'azaabi mushtarikoon
ayahs.40: Afa anta tusmi'us summa aw tahdil 'umya wa man kaana fee dalaalin mubeen
ayahs.41: Fa immaa nazhabanna bika fa innaa minhum muntaqimoon
ayahs.42: Aw nuriyannakal lazee wa'adnaahum fa innaa 'alaihim muqtadiroon
ayahs.43: Fastamsik billazeee oohiya ilaika innaka 'alaa Siraatin Mustaqeem
ayahs.44: Wa innahoo la zikrun laka wa liqawmika wa sawfa tus'aloon
ayahs.45: Was'al man arsalnaa min qablika mir Rusulinaaa 'a ja'alnaa min doonir Rahmaani aalihatany
ayahs.46: Wa laqad arsalnaa Moosaa bi aayaatinaaa ilaa Fir'awna wa mala'ihee faqaala innee Rasoolu
ayahs.47: Falamma jaaa'ahum bi aayaatinaaa izaa hum minhaa yadhakoon
ayahs.48: Wa maa nureehim min aayatin illaa hiya akbaru min ukhtihaa wa akhaznaahum bil'azaabi
ayahs.49: Wa qaaloo yaaa ayyuhas saahirud'u lanaa Rabbaka bimaa 'ahida 'indaka innanaa lamuhtadoon
ayahs.50: Falammaa kashafnaa 'anhumul 'azaaba izaa hum yankusoon
ayahs.51: Wa naadaa Fir'awnu fee qawmihee qaala yaa qawmi alaisa lee mulku Misra wa haazihil anhaaru
ayahs.52: Am ana khairun min haazal lazee huwa maheenunw wa laa yakaadu yubeen
ayahs.53: Falaw laa ulqiya 'alaihi aswiratun min zahabin aw jaaa'a ma'ahul malaaa'ikatu muqtarineen
ayahs.54: Fastakhaf fa qawmahoo fa ataa'ooh; innahum kaanoo qawman faasiqeen
ayahs.55: Falammaaa aasafoonan taqamnaa minhum fa aghraqnaahum ajma'een

26.name: Allaahu laaa ilaaha illaa Huwa Rabbul 'Arshil Azeem
26.title: make sajda

ayahs.27: Qaala sananzuru asadaqta am kunta minal kaazibeen
ayahs.28: Izhab bikitaabee haaza fa alqih ilaihim summma tawalla 'anhum fanzur maazaa yarji'oon
ayahs.29: Qaalat yaaa aiyuhal mala'u innee ulqiya ilaiya kitaabun kareem
ayahs.30: Innahoo min Sulaimaana wa innahoo bismil laahir Rahmaanir Raheem

27.name: Bimaa ghafara lee Rabbee wa ja'alanee minal mukrameen
27.title: End Juz 22

ayahs.28: Wa maaa anzalnaa 'alaa qawmihee mim ba'dihee min jundim minas-samaaa'i wa maa kunnaa
ayahs.29: In kaanat illaa saihatanw waahidatan fa-izaa hum khaamidoon
ayahs.30: Yaa hasratan 'alal 'ibaaad; maa ya'teehim mir Rasoolin illaa kaanoo bihee yastahzi 'oon
ayahs.31: Alam yaraw kam ahlak naa qablahum minal qurooni annahum ilaihim laa yarji'oon
ayahs.32: Wa in kullul lammaa jamee'ul-ladainaa muhdaroon
ayahs.33: Wa Aayatul lahumul ardul maitatu ahyainaahaa wa akhrajnaa minhaa habban faminhu ya'kuloon
ayahs.34: Wa ja'alnaa feehaa jannaatim min nakheelinw wa a'naabinw wa fajjarnaa feeha minal 'uyoon
ayahs.35: Li ya'kuloo min samarihee wa maa 'amilat-hu aideehim; afalaa yashkuroon
ayahs.36: Subhaanal lazee khalaqal azwaaja kullahaa mimmaa tumbitul ardu wa min anfusihim wa
ayahs.37: Wa Aayatul lahumul lailu naslakhu minhun nahaara fa-izaa hum muzlimoon
ayahs.38: Wash-shamsu tajree limustaqarril lahaa; zaalika taqdeerul 'Azeezil Aleem
ayahs.40: Lash shamsu yambaghee lahaaa an tudrikal qamara walal lailu saabiqun nahaar; wa kullun fee
ayahs.41: Wa Aayatul lahum annaa hamalnaa zurriyatahum fil fulkil mashhoon
ayahs.42: Wa khalaqnaa lahum mim-mislihee maa yarkaboon
ayahs.43: Wa in nashaa nughriqhum falaa sareekha lahum wa laa hum yunqazoon
ayahs.44: Illaa rahmatam minnaa wa mataa'an ilaa heen
ayahs.45: Wa izaa qeela lahumuttaqoo maa baina aideekum wa maa khalfakum la'allakum turhamoon
ayahs.46: Wa maa ta'teehim min aayatim min Aayaati Rabbihim illaa kaanoo 'anhaa mu'rideen
ayahs.47: Wa izaa qeela lahum anfiqoo mimmaa razaqakumul laahu qaalal lazeena kafaroo lillazeena
ayahs.48: Wa yaqooloona mataa haazal wa'du in kuntum saadiqeen
ayahs.49: Maa yanzuroona illaa saihatanw waahidatan ta'khuzuhum wa hum yakhissimoon
ayahs.50: Falaa yastatee'oona taw siyatanw-wa laaa ilaaa ahlihim yarji'oon
ayahs.51: Wa nufikha fis-soori faizaa hum minal ajdaasi ilaa Rabbihim yansiloon
ayahs.52: Qaaloo yaa wailanaa mam ba'asanaa mim marqadinaa; haaza maa wa'adar Rahmanu wa
ayahs.53: In kaanat illaa saihatanw waahidatan fa-izaa hum jamee'ul ladainaa muhdaroon
ayahs.54: Fal-Y awma laa tuzlamu nafsun shai'anw-wa laa tujzawna illaa maa kuntum ta'maloon
ayahs.55: Inna Ashaabal jannatil Yawma fee shughulin faakihoon
ayahs.56: Hum wa azwaajuhum fee zilaalin 'alal araaa'iki muttaki'oon
ayahs.57: Lahum feehaa faakiha tunw-wa lahum maa yadda'oon
ayahs.60: Alam a'had ilaikum yaa Baneee Aadama al-laa ta'budush Shaitaana innahoo lakum 'aduwwum
ayahs.62: Wa laqad adalla minkum jibillan kaseeraa; afalam takoonoo ta'qiloon
ayahs.65: Al-Yawma nakhtimu 'alaaa afwaahihim wa tukallimunaaa aideehim wa tashhadu arjuluhum
ayahs.66: Wa law nashaaa'u lata masna 'alaaa aiyunihim fasta baqus-siraata fa-annaa yubsiroon
ayahs.67: Wa law nashaaa'u lamasakhnaahum 'alaa makaanatihim famas-tataa'oo mudiyyanw-wa laa
ayahs.68: Wa man nu 'ammirhu nunakkishu fil-khalq; afalaa ya'qiloon
ayahs.69: Wa maa 'allamnaahush shi'ra wa maa yambaghee lah; in huwa illaa zikrunw-wa Qur-aanum
ayahs.70: Liyunzira man kaana haiyanw-wa yahiqqal qawlu 'alal-kaafireen
ayahs.71: Awalam yaraw annaa khalaqnaa lahum mimmaa 'amilat aideenaaa an'aaman fahum lahaa
ayahs.72: Wa zallalnaahaa lahum faminhaa rakoobuhum wa minhaa ya'kuloon
ayahs.73: Wa lahum feehaa manaa fi'u wa mashaarib; afalaa yashkuroon
ayahs.74: Wattakhazoo min doonil laahi aalihatal la'allahum yunsaroon
ayahs.75: Laa yastatee'oona nasrahum wa hum lahum jundum muhdaroon
ayahs.76: Falaa yahzunka qawluhum; innaa na'lamu maa yusirroona wa maa yu'linoon
ayahs.77: Awalam yaral insaanu annaa khalaqnaahu min nutfatin fa-izaa huwa khaseemum mubeen
ayahs.78: Wa daraba lanaa maslanw-wa nasiya khalqahoo qaala mai-yuhyil'izaama wa hiya rameem
ayahs.79: Qul yuh yeehal lazeee ansha ahaaa awwala marrah; wa Huwa bikulli khalqin 'Aleem
ayahs.80: Allazee ja'ala lakum minash shajaril akhdari naaran fa-izaaa antum minhu tooqidoon
ayahs.81: Awa laisal lazee khalaqas samaawaati wal arda biqaadirin 'alaaa ai-yakhluqa mislahum; balaa
ayahs.82: Innamaa amruhooo izaaa araada shai'an ai-yaqoola lahoo kun fa-yakoon

ayahs.3: Natloo 'alaika min naba-i Moosaa wa Fir'awna bilhaqqi liqawminy yu'miinoon
ayahs.4: Inna Fir'awna 'alaa fil ardi wa ja'ala ahlahaa shiya'ai yastad'ifu taaa'ifatam minhum yuzabbihu
ayahs.5: Wa nureedu an namunna 'alal lazeenas tud'ifoo fil ardi wa naj'alahum a'immatanw wa
ayahs.6: Wa numakkina lahum fil ardi wa nuriya Fir'awna wa Haamaana wa junoodahumaa minhum maa
ayahs.7: Wa awhainaaa ilaaa ummi Moosaaa an ardi'eehi faizaa khifti 'alaihi fa alqeehi filyammi wa laa
ayahs.8: Faltaqatahooo Aalu Fir'awna li yakoona lahum 'aduwwanw wa hazanaa; inna Fir'awna wa
ayahs.9: Wa qaalatim ra atu Fir'awna qurratu 'aynil lee wa lak; laa taqtuloohu 'asaaa aiyanfa'anaa aw
ayahs.10: Wa asbaha fu'aadu ummi Moosaa faarighan in kaadat latubdee bihee law laaa arrabatnaa 'alaa
ayahs.11: Wa qaalat li ukhtihee qusseehi fabasurat bihee 'an junubinw wahum laa yash'uroon
ayahs.12: Wa harramnaa 'alaihil maraadi'a min qablu faqaalat hal adullukum 'alaaa ahli baitiny
ayahs.13: Faradadnaahu ilaa ummihee kai taqarra 'ainuhaa wa laa tahzana wa lita'lama anna wa'dal laahi
ayahs.14: Wa lammaa balagha ashuddahoo wastawaaa aatai naahu hukmanw wa 'ilmaa; wa kazaalika
ayahs.15: Wa dakhalal madeenata 'alaa heene ghaflatim min ahlihaa fawajada feeha raju laini yaqtatilaani
ayahs.16: Qaala Rabbi innee zalamtu nafsee faghfir lee faghafaralah; innahoo Huwal Ghafoorur Raheem
ayahs.17: Qaala Rabbi bimaaa an'amta 'alaiya falan akoona zaheeral lilmujrimeen
ayahs.18: Fa asbaha fil madeenati khaaa'ifany yataraqqabu fa izal lazis tansarahoo bil amsi yastasrikhuh;
ayahs.19: Falammaaa an araada ai yabtisha billazee huwa 'aduwwul lahumaa qaala yaa Moosaaa
ayahs.20: Wa jaaa'a rajulum min aqsal madeenati yas'aa qaala yaa Moosaaa innal mala a yaa tamiroona
ayahs.21: Fakharaja minhaa khaaa 'ifany-yataraqqab; qaala Rabbi najjinee minal qawmiz zaalimeen
ayahs.22: Wa lammaa tawajjaha tilqaaa'a Madyana qaala 'asaa Rabbeee ai yahdiyanee Sawaaa'as
ayahs.23: Wa lammaa warada maaa'a Madyana wajada 'alaihi ummatam minannaasi yasqoona wa wajada
ayahs.24: Fasaqaa lahumaa summa tawallaaa ilaz zilli faqaala Rabbi innee limaaa anzalta ilaiya min
ayahs.25: Fajaaa'at hu ihdaahumaa tamshee 'alas tihyaaa'in qaalat inna abee yad'ooka li yajziyaka ajra
ayahs.26: Qaalat ihdaahumaa yaaa abatis taajirhu inna khaira manistaajartal qawiyyul ameen
ayahs.27: Qaala innee ureedu an unkihaka ihdab nataiya haataini 'alaaa an taajuranee samaaniya hijaj; fa
ayahs.28: Qaala zaalika bainee wa bainaka aiyamal ajalaini qadaitu falaa 'udwaana 'alaiya wallaahu 'alaa
ayahs.29: Falammmaa qadaa Moosal ajala wa saara bi ahliheee aanasa min jaanibit Toori naaran qaala li
ayahs.30: Falammaaa ataahaa noodiya min shaati'il waadil aimani fil buq'atil muubaarakati minash
ayahs.31: Wa an alqi 'asaaka falam maa ra aahaa tahtazzu ka annnahaa jaaannunw wallaa mudbiranw wa
ayahs.32: Usluk yadaka fee jaibika takhruj baidaaa'a min ghairi sooo'inw wadmum ilaika janaahaka minar
ayahs.33: Qaala Rabbi innee qataltu minhum nafsan fa akhaafu ai yaqtuloon
ayahs.34: Wa akhee Haaroonu huwa afsahu minnee lisaanan fa arsilhu ma'iya rid ai yusaddiquneee innee
ayahs.35: Qaala sanashuddu 'adudaka bi akheeka wa naj'alu lakumaa sultaanan falaa yasiloona
ayahs.36: Falammaa jaaa'ahum Moosaa bi Aayaatinaa baiyinaatin qaaloo maa haazaaa illaa sihrum
ayahs.37: Wa qaala Moosaa Rabbeee a'alamu biman jaaa'a bilhudaa min 'indihee wa man takoonu lahoo
ayahs.38: Wa qaala Fir'awnu yaaa aiyuhal mala-u maa 'alimtu lakum min ilaahin ghairee fa awqid lee yaa
ayahs.39: Wastakbara huwa wa junooduhoo fil ardi bighairil haqqi wa zannooo annahum ilainaa laa
ayahs.40: Fa akhaznaahu wa junoo dahoo fanabaznaahum fil yammi fanzur kaifa kaana 'aaqibatuz
ayahs.41: Wa ja'alnaahum a'immatany yad'oona ilan Naari wa Yawmal Qiyaamati laa yunsaroon
ayahs.42: Wa atba'naahum fee haazihid dunyaa la'natanw wa Yawmal Qiyaamati hum minal maqbooheen
ayahs.43: Wa laqad aatainaa Moosal Kitaaba mim ba'di maaa ahlaknal quroonal oolaa basaaa'ira linnaasi
ayahs.44: Wa maa kunta bijaanibil gharbiyyi iz qadainaaa ilaa Moosal amra wa maa kunta minash
ayahs.45: Wa laakinnaa anshaanaa quroonan fatataawala 'alaihimul 'umur; wa maa kunta saawiyan feee
ayahs.46: Wa maa kunta bijaanibit Toori iz naadainaa wa laakir rahmatam mir Rabbika litunzira qawmam
ayahs.47: Wa law laaa an tuseebahum museebatum bimaa qaddamat aideehim fa yaqooloo Rabbanaa
ayahs.48: Falammaa jaaa'ahumul haqqu min 'indinaa qaaloo law laa ootiya misla maaa ootiyaa Moosaa;
ayahs.49: Qul faatoo bi Kitaabim min 'indil laahi huwa ahdaa minhu maaa attabi'hu in kuntum saadiqeen
ayahs.50: Fa il lam yastajeeboo laka fa'lam annamaa yattabi'oona ahwaaa'ahum; wa man adallu mimmanit
