ayahs.51: Wa laqad wassalnaa lahumul qawla la'allahum yatazakkaroon
ayahs.53: Wa izaa yutlaa 'alaihim qaaloo aamannaa biheee innahul haqqu mir rabbinaaa innaa kunnaa
ayahs.54: Ulaaa'ika yu'tawna ajrahum marratayni bimaa sabaroo wa yadra'oona bil hasanatis saiyi'ata wa
ayahs.55: Wa izaa sami'ul laghwa a'radoo 'anhu wa qaaloo lanaaa a'maalunaa wa lakum a'maalukum
ayahs.56: Innaka laa tahdee man ahbabta wa laakinn Allaha yahdee mai yashaaa'; wa huwa a'lamu bil
ayahs.57: Wa qaalooo in nattabi'il hudaa ma'aka nutakhattaf min ardinaa; awalam numakkkil lahum
ayahs.58: Wa kam ahlaknaa min qaryatim batirat ma'eeshatahaa fatilka masaakinuhum lam tuskam mim
ayahs.59: Wa maa kaana Rabbuka muhlikal quraa hattaa yab'asa feee ummihaa Rasoolany yatloo 'alaihim
ayahs.60: Wa maaa ooteetum min shai'in famataa'ul hayaatid dunyaa wa zeenatuhaa; wa maa 'indal laahi
ayahs.61: Afamanw wa'adnaahu wa'dan hasanan fahuwa laaqeehi kamam matta'naahu mataa'al hayaatid
ayahs.62: Wa Yawma yunaadeehim fa-yaqoolu aina shurakaaa 'iyal lazeena kuntum taz'umoon
ayahs.63: Qaalal lazeena haqqa 'alaihimul qawlu Rabbanaa haaa'ulaaa'il lazeena aghwainaa
ayahs.64: Wa qeelad 'oo shurakaaa'akum fada'awhum falam yastajeeboo lahum wa ra awul 'azaab; law
ayahs.65: Wa Yawma yunaadeehim fa yaqoolu maazaaa ajabtumul mursaleen
ayahs.66: Fa'amiyat 'alaihimul ambaaa'u Yawma'izin fahum laa yatasaaa'aloon
ayahs.67: Fa ammaa man taaba wa aamana wa 'amila saalihan fa'asaaa ai yakoona minal mufliheen
ayahs.68: Wa Rabbuka yakhuluqu maa yashaaa'u wa yakhtaar; maa kaana lahumul khiyarah; Subhannal
ayahs.69: Wa Rabbuka ya'lamu maa tukinnu sudooruhum wa maa yu'linoon
ayahs.70: Wa Huwal laahu laaa ilaaha illaa Huwa lahul hamdu fil oolaa wal Aakhirati wa lahul hukmu wa
ayahs.71: Qul ara'aitum in ja'alal laahu 'alaikumul laila sarmadan ilaa Yawmil Qiyaamati man ilaahun
ayahs.72: Qul ara'aitum in ja'alal laahu 'alaikumun nahaara sarmadan ilaa Yawmil Qiyaamati man ilaahun
ayahs.73: Wa mir rahmatihee ja'ala lakumul laila wannahaara litaskunoo feehi wa litabtaghoo min fadlihee
ayahs.74: Wa Yawma yunaadeehim fa yaqoolu aina shurakaaa'iyal lazeena kuntum tazz'umoon
ayahs.75: Wa naza'naa min kulli ummatin shaheedan faqulnaa haatoo burhaanakum fa'alimooo annal
ayahs.76: Inna Qaaroona kaana min qawmi Moosaa fabaghaaa 'alaihim wa aatainaahu minal kunoozi
ayahs.77: Wabtaghi feemaaa aataakal laahud Daaral Aakhirata wa laa tansa naseebaka minad dunyaa wa
ayahs.78: Qaala innamaaa ootee tuhoo 'alaa 'ilmin 'indeee; awalam ya'lam annal laaha qad ahlaka min
ayahs.79: Fakharaja 'alaa qawmihee fee zeenatih; qaalal lazeena yureedoonal hayaatad dunyaa yaalaita
ayahs.80: Wa qaalal lazeena ootul 'ilma wailakum sawaabul laahi khairul liman aamana wa 'amila saalihaa;
ayahs.81: Fakhasafnaa bihee wa bidaarihil arda famaa kaana lahoo min fi'atiny yansuroo nahoo min doonil
ayahs.82: Wa asbahal lazeena tamannaw makaanahoo bil amsi yaqooloona waika annal laaha yabsutur
ayahs.83: Tilkad Daarul Aakhiratu naj'aluhaa lillazeena laa yureedoona 'uluwwan fil ardi wa laa fasaadaa;
ayahs.84: Man jaaa'a bilhasanati falahoo khairum minhaa wa man jaaa'a bissaiyi'ati falaa yujzal lazeena
ayahs.85: Innal lazee farada 'alaikal Qur-aana laraaadduka ilaa ma'aad; qur Rabbeee a'lamu man jaaa'a
ayahs.86: Wa maa kunta tarjooo ai yulqaaa ilaikal Kitaabu illaa rahmatan mir Rabbika falaa takoonanna
ayahs.87: Wa laa yasuddunnaka 'an Aayaatil laahi ba'da iz unzilat ilaika wad'u ilaa Rabbika wa laa
ayahs.88: Wa laa tad'u ma'al laahi ilaahan aakhar; laaa ilaaha illaa Hoo; kullu shai'in haalikun illaa W ajhah;

ayahs.2: Ahasiban naasu any yutrakooo any yaqoolooo aamannaa wa hum la yuftanoon
ayahs.3: Wa laqad fatannal lazeena min qablihim fala ya'lamannal laahul lazeena sadaqoo wa la
ayahs.4: Am hasibal lazeena ya'maloonas sayyiaati any yasbiqoonaa; saaa'a maa yahkumoon
ayahs.5: Man kaana yarjoo liqaaa 'allaahi fa inna ajalal laahi la'aat; wa Huwass Sameeul 'Aleem
ayahs.6: Wa man jaahada fainnamaa yujaahidu linafsih; innal laaha laghaniyyun 'anil 'aalameen
ayahs.7: Wallazeena aamanoo wa 'amilus saalihaati lanukaf firanna 'anhum saiyiaatihim wa
ayahs.8: Wa wassainal insaana biwaalidaihi husnanw wa in jaahadaaka litushrika bee maa laisa laka
ayahs.9: Wallazeena aamanoo wa'amilus saalihaati lanudkhilan nahum fis saaliheen
ayahs.10: Wa minan naasi many yaqoolu aamannaa billaahi faizaaa ooziya fil laahi ja'ala fitnatan naasi
ayahs.11: Wa la ya'lamannal laahul lazeena aamanoo wa la ya'lamannal munaafiqeen
ayahs.12: Wa qaalal lazeena kafaroo lillazeena aamanut tabi'oo sabeelanaa walnahmil khataayaakum wa
ayahs.13: Wa la yahmilunna asqaa lahum wa asqaalam ma'a asqaalihim wa la yus'alunna Yawmal
ayahs.14: Wa laqad arsalnaa Noohan ilaa qawmihee falabisa feehim alfa sanatin illaa khamseena 'aaman
ayahs.15: Fa anjainaahu wa as haabas safeenati wa ja'alnaahaaa Aayatal lil'aalameen
ayahs.16: Wa Ibraheema iz qaala liqawmihi' budul laaha wattaqoohu zaalikum khayrul lakum in kuntum
ayahs.17: Innamaa ta'budoona min doonil laahi awsaananw-wa takhluqoona ifkaa; innal lazeena
ayahs.18: Wa in tukazziboo faqad kazzaba umamum min qablikum wa maa'alar Rasooli illal balaaghul
ayahs.19: Awa lam yaraw kaifa yubdi'ul laahul khalqa summa yu'eeduh; inna zaalika 'alal laahi yaseer
ayahs.20: Qul seeroo fil ardi fanzuroo kaifa bada al khalqa thumm Allahu yunshi''un nash atal Aakhirah;
ayahs.21: Yu'azzibu many yashaaa'u wa yarhamu many yashaaa'; wa ilaihi tuqlaboon
ayahs.22: Wa maaa antum bimu'jizeena fil ardi wa laa fissamaaa'i wa maa lakum min doonil laahi minw
ayahs.23: Wallazeena kafaroo bi Aayaatil laahi wa liqaaa'iheee ulaaa'ika ya'isoo mir rahmatee wa ulaaa'ika
ayahs.24: Famaa kaana jawaaba qawmiheee illaaa an qaaluqtuloohu aw harriqoohu fa anjaahul laahu
ayahs.25: Wa qaala innamat takhaz tum min doonil laahi awsaanam mawaddata bainikum fil hayaatid
ayahs.26: Fa aamana lahoo Loot; wa qaala innee muhajirun ilaa Rabbee innahoo Huwal 'Azeezul Hakeem
ayahs.27: Wa wahabnaa lahoo Ishaaqa wa Ya'Qooba wa ja'alnaa fee zurriyyatihin Nubuwwata wal Kitaaba
ayahs.28: Wa Lootan iz qaala liqawmiheee innakum la ta'toonal faahishata maa sabaqakum bihaa min
ayahs.29: A'innakum la ta'toonar rijaala wa taqta'oonas sabeela wa ta'toona fee naadeekumul munkara

30.name: Fa zooqoo falan-nazee dakum ill-laa azaaba
30.title: section 1

ayahs.31: Inna lil mutta qeena mafaaza
ayahs.32: Hadaa-iqa wa a'anaa ba
ayahs.33: Wa kaawa 'iba at raaba
ayahs.34: Wa ka'san di haaqa
ayahs.35: Laa yasma'oona fiha lagh waw walaa kizzaba
ayahs.36: Jazaa-am mir-rabbika ataa-an hisaaba
ayahs.37: Rabbis samaa waati wal ardi wa maa baina humar rahmaani laa yam likoona minhu khitaaba
ayahs.38: Yauma yaqoo mur roohu wal malaa-ikatu saf-fal laa yatakallamoona ill-laa man azina lahur
ayahs.39: Zaalikal yaumul haqqu faman shaa-at ta khaaza ill-laa rabbihi ma-aaba
ayahs.40: In naa anzar naakum azaaban qareebaiy-yauma yan zurul marr-u maa qaddamat yadaahu wa

31.name: Summa innakum Yawmal Qiyaamati 'inda Rabbikum takhtasimoon
31.title: section 3

ayahs.32: Faman azlamu mimman kazaba 'alal laahi wa kazzaba bissidqi iz jaaa'ah; alaisa fee Jahannama
ayahs.33: Wallazee jaaa'a bissidqi wa saddaqa biheee ulaaa'ika humul muttaqoon
ayahs.34: Lahum maa yashaaa'oona 'inda Rabbihim; zaalika jazaaa'ul muhsineen
ayahs.35: Liyukaf firal laahu 'anhum aswa allazee 'amiloo wa yajziyahum ajrahum bi ahsanil lazee kaano
ayahs.36: Alaisal laahu bikaafin 'abdahoo wa yukhawwi foonaka billazeena min doonih; wa mai yudlilil
ayahs.37: Wa mai yahdil laahu famaa lahoo min mudil; alai sal laahu bi'azeezin zin tiqaam
ayahs.38: Wa la'in sa altahum man khalaqas samaawaati wal arda la yaqoolunal laah; qul afara'aitum maa
ayahs.39: Qul yaa qawmi'maloo 'alaa makaanatikum innee 'aamilun fasawfa ta'lamoon
ayahs.40: Mai yaateehi 'azaabuny yukhzeehi wa yahillu 'alaihi 'azaabum muqeem
ayahs.41: Innaa anzalnaa 'alaikal Kitaaba linnaasi bilhaqq; famanih tadaa falinafsihee wa man dalla fa
ayahs.42: Allaahu yatawaf fal anfusa heena mawtihaa wallatee lam tamut fee manaamihaa fa yumsikul
ayahs.43: Amit takhazoo min doonillaahi shufa'aaa'; qul awalaw kaanoo laa yamlikoona shai'aw wa laa
ayahs.44: Qul lillaahish shafaa'atu jamee'aa; lahoo mulkus samaawaati wal ardi summa ilaihi turja'oon
ayahs.45: Wa izaa zukiral laahu wahdahush ma azzat quloobul lazeena laa yu'minoona bil Aakhirati wa
ayahs.46: Qulil laahumma faatiras samaawaati wal ardi 'Aalimal Ghaibi washshahaadati Anta tahkumu
ayahs.47: Wa law anna lillazeena zalamoo maa fil ardi jamee'anw wa mislahoo ma'ahoo laftadaw bihee
ayahs.48: Wa badaa lahum saiyiaatu maa kasaboo wa haaqa bihim maa kaanoo bihee yastahzi'oon
ayahs.49: Fa izaa massal insaana durrun da'aanaa summa izaa khawwalnaahu ni'matam minna qaala
ayahs.50: Qad qaalahal lazeena min qablihim famaaa aghnaa 'anhum maa kaanoo yaksiboon
ayahs.51: Fa asaabahum saiyi aatu maa kasaboo; wallazeena zalamoo min haaa'ulaaa'i sa yuseebuhum
ayahs.52: Awalam ya'lamooo annal laaha yabsutur rizqa limai yashaaa'u wa yaqdir; inna fee zaalika la
ayahs.53: Qul yaa'ibaadiyal lazeena asrafoo 'alaaa anfusihim laa taqnatoo mirrahmatil laah; innal laaha
ayahs.54: Wa aneebooo ilaa Rabbikum wa aslimoo lahoo min qabli any yaatiyakumul 'azaabu summa laa
ayahs.55: Wattabi'ooo ahsana maaa unzila ilaikum mir Rabbikum min qabli aiyaatiyakumal 'azaabu
ayahs.56: An taqoola nafsuny yaahasrataa 'alaa maa farrattu fee jambil laahi wa in kuntu laminas
ayahs.57: Aw taqoola law annal laaha hadaanee lakuntu minal muttaqeen
ayahs.58: Aw taqoola heena taral 'azaaba law anna lee karratan fa akoona minal muhsineen
ayahs.59: Balaa qad jaaa'atka aayaatee fa kazzabta bihaa wa stakbarta wa kunta minal kaafireen
ayahs.60: Wa Yawmal Qiyaamati taral lazeena kazaboo 'alallaahi wujoohuhum muswaddah; alaisa fee
ayahs.61: Wa yunajjil laahul lazee nat taqaw bimafaazatihim laa yamassuhumus sooo'u wa laa hum
ayahs.62: Allaahu khaaliqu kulli shai'inw wa Huwa 'alaa kulli shai'inw W akeel
ayahs.63: Lahoo maqaaleedus sa maawaati wal ard; wallazeena kafaroo bi ayaatil laahi ulaaa'ika humul
ayahs.64: Qul afaghairal laahi taamurooonneee a'budu ayyuhal jaahiloon
ayahs.65: Wa laqad oohiya ilaika wa ilal lazeena min qablika la in ashrakta la yahbatanna 'amalu ka wa
ayahs.66: Balil laahha fa'bud wa kum minash shaakireen
ayahs.67: Wa maa qadarul laaha haqqa qadrihee wal ardu jamee 'an qabdatuhoo Yawmal Qiyaamati
ayahs.68: Wa nufikha fis Soori fasa'iqa man fis samaawaati wa man fil ardi illaa man shaa'al lahu summa
ayahs.69: Wa ashraqatil ardu binoori Rabbihaa wa wudi'al Kitaabu wa jeee'a bin nabiyyeena wash

ayahs.33: Wa man ahsanu qawlam mimman da'aaa ilal laahi wa 'amila saalihanw wa qaala innanee minal
ayahs.34: Wa laa tastawil hasanatu wa las saiyi'ah; idfa' billatee hiya ahsanu fa'izal lazee bainaka wa
ayahs.35: Wa maa yulaqqaahaaa illal lazeena sabaroo wa maa yulaqqaahaaa illaa zoo hazzin 'azeem
ayahs.36: Wa immaa yanzaghannaka minash Shaitaani nazghun fasta'iz billaahi innahoo Huwas Samee'ul
ayahs.37: Wa min Aayaatihil lailu wannahaaru washshamsu walqamar; laa tasjudoo lishshamsi wa laa
ayahs.38: Fa inis-takbaroo fallazee na 'inda Rabbika yusabbihoona lahoo billaili wannnahaari wa hum laa
ayahs.39: Wa min Aayaatiheee annaka taral arda khaashi'atan fa izaaa anzalna 'alaihal maaa'ah tazzat wa
ayahs.40: Innal lazeena yulhidoona feee Aayaatina laa yakhfawna 'alainaa' afamai yulqaa fin Naari
ayahs.41: Innal Lazeena kafaroo biz Zikri lammaa jaa'ahum wa innahoo la Kitaabun 'Azeez
ayahs.42: Laa yaateehil baatilu mim baini yadaihi wa laa min khalfihee tanzeelum min Hakeemin Hameed
ayahs.43: Maa yuqaalu laka illaa maa qad qeela lir Rusuli min qablik; inna Rabbaka lazoo maghfiratinw wa
ayahs.44: Wa law ja'alnaahu Qur-aanan A'jamiyyal laqaaloo law laa fussilat Aayaatuhoo 'a A'jamiyyunw wa
ayahs.45: Wa laqad aatainaa Moosal Kitaaba fakhtulifa fee; wa lawlaa Kalimatun sabaqat mir Rabbika
ayahs.46: Man 'amila salihan falinafsihee wa man asaaa'a fa'alaihaa; wamaa rabbuka bizallaamil lil 'abeed
ayahs.47: Ilaihi yuraddu 'ilmus Saaa'ah; wa maa takhruju min samaraatim min akmaamihaa wa maa
ayahs.48: Wa dalla 'anhum maa kaanoo yad'oona min qablu wa zannoo maa lahum mim mahees
ayahs.49: Laa yas'amul insaanu min du'aaa'il khairi wa im massa hush sharru fa ya'oosun qanoot
ayahs.50: Wa la in azaqnaahu rahmatam minnaa mim ba'di dar raaa'a massat hu la yaqoolanna haazaa
ayahs.51: Wa izaaa an'amnaa 'alal insaani a'rada wa na-aa bijaani bihee wa izaa massahush sharru fazoo
ayahs.52: Qul araaitum in kaana min 'indil laahi summa kafar tum bihee man adallu mimman huwa fee
ayahs.53: Sanureehim Aayaatinaa fil aafaaqi wa feee anfusihim hattaa yatabaiyana lahum annahul haqq;
ayahs.54: Alaaa innahum fee miryatim mil liqaaa'i Rabbihim; alaaa innahoo bikulli shai'im muheet (section

ayahs.1: Yaa aiyuhan Nabiyyut taqil laaha wa laa tuti'il kaafireena wal munaafiqeen; innal laaha kaana
ayahs.2: Wattabi' maa yoohaaa ilaika mir Rabbik; innal laaha kaana bimaa ta'maloona Khabeera
ayahs.3: Wa tawakkal 'alal laah; wa kafaa billaahi W akeelaa
ayahs.4: Maa ja'alal laahu lirajulim min qalbaini fee jawfih; wa maa ja'ala azwaajakumul laaa'ee
ayahs.5: Ud'oohum li aabaaa'ihim huwa aqsatu 'indal laah; fa illam ta'lamooo aabaaa'ahum fa
ayahs.6: An-Nabiyyu awlaa bil mu'mineena min anfusihim wa azwaajuhoo ummahatuhum wa ulul
ayahs.7: Wa iz akhaznaa minan Nabiyyeena meesaaqahum wa minka wa min Noohinw wa Ibraaheema

ayahs.1: Alhamdu lillaahil lazee lahoo maa fis samaawaati wa maa fil ardi wa lahul hamdu fil aakhirah; wa
ayahs.2: Ya'lamu maa yaliju fil ardi wa maa yakhruju minhaa wa maa yanzilu minas samaaa'i wa maa
ayahs.3: Wa qaalal lazeena kafaroo laa taateenas Saa'ah; qul balaa wa Rabbee lataatiyannakum 'Aalimul
ayahs.4: Liyajziyal lazeena aamanoo wa 'amilus saalihaat; ulaaa'ika lahum maghfiratunw wa rizqun
ayahs.5: Wallazeena sa'aw feee aayaatinaa mu'aajizeena ulaaa 'ika lahum 'azaabum mir rijzin aleem
ayahs.6: Wa yaral lazeena ootul 'ilmal lazeee unzila ilaika mir Rabbika huwal haqqa wa yahdeee ilaaa
ayahs.7: Wa qaalal lazeena kafaroo hal nadullukum 'alaa rajuliny yunabbi 'ukum izaa muzziqtum kulla
ayahs.8: Aftaraa 'alal laahi kaziban am bihee jinnah; balil lazeena laa yu'minoona bil Aakhirati fil'azaabi
ayahs.9: Afalam yaraw ilaa maa baina aydeehim wa maa khalfahum minas samaaa'i wal ard; in nashad
ayahs.10: Wa laqad aatainaa Daawooda minnaa fadlany yaa jibaalu awwibee ma'ahoo wattaira wa
ayahs.11: Ani'mal saabighaatinw wa qaddir fis sardi wa'maloo saalihan innee bimaa ta'maloona Baseer
ayahs.12: Wa li-Sulaimaanar reeha ghuduwwuhaa shahrunw wa ra-waahuhaa shahrunw wa asalnaa lahoo
ayahs.13: Ya'maloona lahoo ma yashaaa'u mim mahaareeba wa tamaaseela wa jifaanin kaljawaabi wa
ayahs.14: Falammaa qadainaa 'alaihil mawta ma dallahum 'alaa mawtiheee illaa daaabbatul ardi taakulu
ayahs.15: Laqad kaana li Saba-in fee maskanihim Aayatun jannataani 'any yameeninw wa shimaalin kuloo
ayahs.16: Fa a'radoo fa-arsalnaa 'alaihim Sailal 'Arimi wa baddalnaahum bijannataihim jannataini zawaatai
ayahs.17: Zaalika jazainaahum bimaa kafaroo wa hal nujaazeee illal kafoor
ayahs.18: Wa ja'alnaa bainahum wa bainal qural latee baaraknaa feehaa quran zaahiratanw wa qaddarnaa
ayahs.19: Faqaaloo Rabbanaa baa'id baina asfaarinaa wa zalamooo anfusahum faja'alnaahum ahaadeesa
ayahs.20: Wa laqad saddaq 'alaihim Ibleesu zannahoo fattaba'oohu illaa fareeqam minal mu'mineen
ayahs.21: Wa maa kaana lahoo 'alaihim min sultaanin illaa lina'lama mai yu minu bil Aakhirati mimman
ayahs.22: Qulid 'ul lazeena za'amtum min doonil laahi laa yamlikoona misqaala zarratin fissamaawaati wa
ayahs.23: Wa laa tanfa'ush shafaa'atu 'indahooo illaa liman azina lah; hattaaa izaa fuzzi'a 'an quloobihim
ayahs.24: Qul mai yarzuqukum minas samaawaati wal ardi qulil laahu wa innaaa aw iyyaakum la'alaa
ayahs.26: Qul yajma'u bainanaa Rabbunaa summa yaftahu bainanaa bilhaqq; wa Huwal Fattaahul 'Aleem
ayahs.27: Qul arooniyal lazeena alhaqtum bihee shurakaaa'a kallaa; bal Huwal Laahul 'Azeezul Hakeem
ayahs.28: Wa maaa arsalnaaka illaa kaaf fatal linnaasi basheeranw wa nazeeranw wa laakinna aksaran
ayahs.29: Wa yaqooloona mataa haazal wa'du in kuntum saadiqeen

ayahs.1: Alhamdu lillaahi faatiris samaawaati wal ardi jaa'ilil malaaa'ikati rusulan uleee ajnihatim masnaa
ayahs.2: Maa yaftahil laahu linnaaasi mir rahmatin falaa mumsika lahaa wa maa yumsik falaa mursila
ayahs.3: Yaaa ayyuhan naasuzkuroo ni'matal laahi 'alaikum; hal min khaaliqin ghairul laahi yarzuqukum
ayahs.4: Wa iny yukazzibooka faqad kuzzibat Rusulum min qablik; wa ilal laahi turja'ul umoor
ayahs.5: Yaaa ayyuhan naasu inna wa'dal laahi haqqun falaa taghurrannakumul hayaatud dunyaa; wa laa
ayahs.6: Innash shaitaana lakum 'aduwwun fattakhizoohu 'aduwwaa; innamaa yad'oo hizbahoo
ayahs.7: Allazeena kafaroo lahum 'azaabun shadeed; wallazeena aamanoo wa 'amilus saalihaati lahum
ayahs.8: Afaman zuyyina lahoo sooo'u 'amalihee fara aahu hasanaa; fa innal laaha yudillu mai yashaaa'u
ayahs.9: Wallaahul lazeee arsalar riyaaha fatuseeru sa haaban fasuqnaahu ilaa baladim maiyitin fa
ayahs.10: Man kaana yureedul 'izzata falillaahil 'izzatu jamee'aa; ilaihi yas'adul kalimut taiyibu wal'amalus
ayahs.11: Wallaahu khalaqakum min turaabin summa min nutfatin summa ja'alakum azwaajaa; wa maa
ayahs.12: Wa maa yastawil bahraani haaza 'azbun furaatun saaa'ighun sharaabuhoo wa haazaa milhun
ayahs.13: Yoolijul laila fin nahaari wa yoolijun nahaara fil laili wa sakhkharash shamsa wal qamara kulluny
ayahs.14: In tad'oohum laa yasma'oo du'aaa'akum wa law sami'oo mas tajaaboo lakum; wa Yawmal
ayahs.15: Yaaa ayyunhan naasu antumul fuqaraaa'u ilallaahi wallaahu Huwal Ghaniyyul Hameed
ayahs.16: Iny yasha' yuzhibkum wa ya'ti bikhalqin jadeed
ayahs.17: Wa maa zaalika 'alal laahi bi'azeez
ayahs.18: Wa laa taziru waaziratun wizra ukhraa; wa in tad'u musqalatun ilaa himlihaa laa yuhmal minhu
ayahs.19: Wa maa yastawil a'maa wal baseer
ayahs.20: Wa laz zulumaatu wa lan noor
ayahs.21: Wa laz zillu wa lal haroor
ayahs.22: Wa maa yastawil ahyaaa'u wa lal amwaat; innal laaha yusmi'u mai yashaaa'u wa maaa anta bi
ayahs.23: In anta illaa nazeer
ayahs.24: Innaa arsalnaaka bil haqqi basheeranw wa nazeeraa; wa im min ummatin illaa khalaa feehaa
ayahs.25: Wa iny yukazzibooka faqad kazzabal lazeena min qablihim jaaa'at hum Rusuluhum bilbaiyinaati
ayahs.27: Alam tara annal laaha anzala minas samaaa'i maaa'an fa akhrajnaa bihee samaraatim
ayahs.28: Wa minan naasi wadda waaabbi wal an'aami mukhtalifun alwaanuhoo kazalik; innamaa
ayahs.29: Innal lazeena yatloona Kitabbal laahi wa aqaamus Salaata wa anfaqoo mimmaa razaqnaahum
ayahs.30: Liyuwaf fiyahum ujoorahum wa yazeedahum min fadlih; innahoo Ghafoorun Shakoor
ayahs.31: Wallazeee awhainaaa ilaika minal Kitaabi huwal haqqu musaddiqal limaa baina yadayh; innal
ayahs.32: Summa awrasnal Kitaaballazeenas tafainaa min 'ibaadinaa faminhum zaalimul linafsihee wa
ayahs.33: Jannaatu 'adniny yad khuloonahaa yuhallawna feeha min asaawira min zahabinw wa lu'lu'anw
ayahs.34: Wa qaalul hamdu lillaahil lazeee azhaba 'annal hazan; inna Rabbanaa la Ghafoorun Shakoor
ayahs.35: Allazeee ahallanaa daaral muqaamati min fadlihee laa yamassunaa feehaa nasabunw wa laa
ayahs.36: Wallazeena kafaroo lahum naaru Jahannama laa yuqdaa 'alaihim fa yamootoo wa laa yukhaf fafu
ayahs.37: Wa hum yastarikhoona feehaa Rabbanaa akhrijnaa na'mal saalihan ghairal lazee kunnaa
ayahs.38: Innal laaha 'aalimu ghaibis samaawaati wal ard; innahoo 'aleemum bizaatis sudoor
ayahs.39: Huwal lazee ja'alakum khalaaa'ifa fil ard; faman kafara fa'alaihi kufruhoo; wa laa yazeedul
ayahs.40: Qul ara'aytum shurakaaa'a kumul lazeena tad'oona min doonil laahi; aroonee maazaa khalaqoo
ayahs.41: Innal laaha yumsikus samaawaati wal arda an tazoolaaa; wa la'in zaalataaa in amsa kahumaa
ayahs.42: Wa aqsamoo billaahi jahda aymaanihim la'in jaaa'ahum nazeerul layakoonunna ahdaa min ihdal
ayahs.43: Istikbaaran fil ardi wa makras sayyi'; wa laa yaheequl makrus sayyi'u illaa bi ahlih; fahal
ayahs.44: Awalam yaseeroo fil ardi fa yanzuroo kaifa kaana 'aaqibatul lazeena min Qablihim wa kaanoo
ayahs.45: Wa law yu'aakhizul laahun naasa bima kasaboo maa taraka 'alaa zahrihaa min daaabbatinw wa

ayahs.3: Innaka laminal mursaleen
ayahs.4: 'Alaa Siraatim Mustaqeem
ayahs.5: Tanzeelal 'Azeezir Raheem
ayahs.6: Litunzira qawmam maaa unzira aabaaa'uhum fahum ghaafiloon
ayahs.7: Laqad haqqal qawlu 'alaaa aksarihim fahum laa yu'minoon
ayahs.8: Innaa ja'alnaa feee a'naaqihim aghlaalan fahiya ilal azqaani fahum muqmahoon
ayahs.9: Wa ja'alnaa min baini aydeehim saddanw-wa min khalfihim saddan fa aghshai naahum fahum
ayahs.10: Wa sawaaa'un 'alaihim 'a-anzartahum am lam tunzirhum laa yu'minoon
ayahs.11: Innamaa tunziru manit taba 'az-Zikra wa khashiyar Rahmaana bilghaib, fabashshirhu
ayahs.12: Innaa Nahnu nuhyil mawtaa wa naktubu maa qaddamoo wa aasaarahum; wa kulla shai'in
ayahs.13: Wadrib lahum masalan Ashaabal Qaryatih; iz jaaa'ahal mursaloon
ayahs.14: Iz arsalnaaa ilaihimusnaini fakazzaboohumaa fa'azzaznaa bisaalisin faqaalooo innaaa ilaikum
ayahs.15: Qaaloo maaa antum illaa basharum mislunaa wa maaa anzalar Rahmaanu min shai'in in antum
ayahs.16: Qaaloo Rabbunaa ya'lamu innaaa ilaikum lamursaloon
ayahs.17: Wa maa 'alainaaa illal balaaghul mubeen
ayahs.18: Qaaloo innaa tataiyarnaa bikum la'il-lam tantahoo lanar jumannakum wa la-yamassan nakum
ayahs.19: Qaaloo taaa'irukum ma'akum; a'in zukkirtum; bal antum qawmum musrifoon
ayahs.20: Wa jaaa'a min aqsal madeenati rajuluny yas'aa qaala yaa qawmit tabi'ul mursaleen
ayahs.21: Ittabi'oo mal-laa yas'alukum ajranw-wa hum muhtadoon
ayahs.22: Wa maa liya laaa a'budul lazee fataranee wa ilaihi turja'oon
ayahs.23: 'A-attakhizu min dooniheee aalihatan iny-yuridnir Rahmaanu bidurril-laa tughni 'annee shafaa
ayahs.24: Inneee izal-lafee dalaa-lim-mubeen
ayahs.25: Inneee aamantu bi Rabbikum fasma'oon
ayahs.26: Qeelad khulil Jannnah; qaala yaa laita qawmee ya'lamoon

ayahs.3: Fattaaliyaati Zikra
ayahs.4: Inna Illaahakum la W aahid
ayahs.5: Rabbus samaawaati wal ardi wa maa bainahumaa wa Rabbul mashaariq
ayahs.6: Innaa zaiyannas samaaa 'ad dunyaa bizeenatinil kawaakib
ayahs.7: Wa hifzam min kulli Shaitaanim maarid
ayahs.8: Laa yassamma 'oona ilal mala 'il a'alaa wa yuqzafoona min kulli jaanib
ayahs.9: Duhooranw wa lahum 'azaabunw waasib
ayahs.10: Illaa man khatifal khatfata fa atba'ahoo shihaabun saaqib
ayahs.11: Fastaftihim ahum ashaddu khalqan am man khalaqnaa; innaa khalaqnaahum min teenil laazib
ayahs.12: Bal'ajibta wa yaskharoon
ayahs.13: Wa izaa zukkiroo laa yazkuroon
ayahs.14: Wa izaa ra aw Aayatany yastaskhiroon
ayahs.15: Wa qaalooo in haazaa illaa sihrum mubeen
ayahs.16: 'A-izaa mitnaa wa kunnaa turaabanw wa 'izaaman 'a innaa lamab'oosoon
ayahs.17: Awa aabaa'unal awwaloon
ayahs.18: Qul na'am wa antum daakhiroon
ayahs.19: Fa innamaa hiya zajra tunw waahidatun fa izaa hum yanzuroon
ayahs.20: Wa qaaloo yaa wailanaa haazaa Yawmud-Deen

ayahs.2: Balil lazeena kafaroo fee 'izzatinw wa shiqaaq
ayahs.3: Kam ahlaknaa min qablihim min qarnin fanaadaw wa laata heena manaas
ayahs.4: Wa 'ajibooo an jaaa'a hum munzirum minhum wa qaalal kaafiroona haazaa saahirun kazzaab
ayahs.5: Aja'alal aalihata Ilaahanw W aahidan inna haazaa lashai'un 'ujaab
ayahs.6: Wantalaqal mala-u minhum anim shoo wasbiroo 'alaaa aalihatikum innna haazaa lashai 'uny
ayahs.7: Maa sami'naa bihaazaa fil millatil aakhirati in haazaaa illakh tilaaq
ayahs.8: 'A-unzila 'alaihiz zikru min baininaa; bal hum fee shakkin min Zikree bal lammaa yazooqoo
ayahs.9: Am'indahum khazaaa 'inu rahmati Rabbikal 'Azeezil W ahhab
ayahs.10: Am lahum mulkus samaawaati wal ardi wa maa bainahumaa falyartaqoo fil asbaab
ayahs.11: Jundum maa hunaalika mahzoomum minal Ahzaab
ayahs.12: Kazzabat qablahum qawmu Noohinw wa 'Aadunw wa Fir'awnu zul awtaad
ayahs.13: Wa Samoodu wa qawmu Lootinw wa Ashaabul 'A ykah; ulaaa'ikal Ahzaab

ayahs.2: Innaaa anzalnaaa ilaikal Kitaaba bilhaqqi fa'budil laaha mukhlisal lahud deen
ayahs.3: Alaa lillaahid deenul khaalis; wallazeenat takhazoo min dooniheee awliyaaa'a maa na'buduhum
ayahs.4: Law araadal laahu aiyattakhiza waladal lastafaa mimmaa yakhluqu maa yashaaa';
ayahs.5: Khalaqas samaawaati wal arda bilhaqq; yukawwirul laila 'alan nahaari wa yukawwirun nahaara
ayahs.6: Khalaqakum min nafsinw waahidatin summa ja'ala minhaa zawjahaa wa anzala lakum minal-
ayahs.7: In takfuroo fa innal laaha ghaniyyun 'ankum; wa laa yardaa li'ibaadihil kufra wa in tashkuroo
ayahs.8: Wa izaa massal insaana durrun da'aa Rabbahoo muneeban ilaihi summa izaa khawwalahoo
ayahs.9: Amman huwa qaanitun aanaaa'al laili saajidanw wa qaaa'imai yahzarul Aakhirata wa yarjoo
ayahs.10: Qul yaa 'ibaadil lazeena aamanut taqoo Rabbakum; lillazeena ahsanoo fee haazihid dunyaa
ayahs.11: Qul inneee umirtu an a'budal laaha mukhlisal lahud deen
ayahs.12: Wa umirtu li an akoona awwalal muslimeen
ayahs.13: Qul inneee akhaafu in 'asaitu Rabbee 'azaaba Yawmin 'azeem
ayahs.14: Qulil laaha a'budu mukhlisal lahoo deenee
ayahs.15: Fa'budoo maa shi'tum min doonih; qul innal khaasireenal lazeena khasirooo anfusahum wa
ayahs.16: Lahum min fawqihim zulalum minan Naari wa min tahtihim zulal; zaalika yukhaw wiful laahu
ayahs.17: Wallazeenaj tanabut Taaghoota ai ya'budoohaa wa anaabooo ilal laahi lahumul bushraa;
ayahs.18: Allazeena yastami'oonal qawla fayattabi'oona ahsanah; ulaaa'ikal lazeena hadaahumul laahu wa
ayahs.19: Afaman haqqa 'alaihi kalimatul 'azaab; afa anta tunqizu man fin Naar
ayahs.20: Laakinil lazeenat taqaw Rabbahum lahum ghurafum min fawqihaa ghurafum mabniyyatun tajree
ayahs.21: Alam tara annal laaha anzala minas samaaa'i maaa'an fasalakahoo yanaabee'a fil ardi summa
ayahs.22: Afaman sharahal laahu sadrahoo lil Islaami fahuwa 'alaa noorim mir Rabbih; fa wailul lilqaasiyati
ayahs.23: Allahu nazzala ahsanal hadeesi Kitaabam mutashaa biham masaaniy taqsha'irru minhu juloodul
ayahs.24: Afamai yattaqee biwaj hihee sooo'al 'azaabi Yawmal Qiyaamah; wa qeela lizzaali meena zooqoo
ayahs.25: Kazzabal lazeena min qablihim fa ataahumul 'azaabu min haisu laa yash'uroon
ayahs.26: Fa azaaqahumul laahul khizya fil hayaatid dunyaa wa la'azaabul Aakhirati akbar; law kaanoo
ayahs.27: Wa laqad darabnaa linnaasi fee haazal Qur-aani min kulli masalil la'allahum yatazakkaroon
ayahs.28: Qur-aanan 'Arabiyyan ghaira zee 'iwajil la'allahum yattaqoon
ayahs.29: Darabal laahu masalar rajulan feehi shurakaaa'u mutashaakisoona wa rajulan salamal lirajulin
ayahs.30: Innaka maiyitunw wa inna hum maiyitoon

ayahs.3: Ghaafiriz zambi wa qaabilit tawbi shadeedil 'iqaabi zit tawli laaa ilaaha illaa Huwa ilaihil maseer
ayahs.4: Maa yujaadilu feee Aayaatil laahi illal lazeena kafaroo falaa yaghrurka taqallubuhum fil bilaad
ayahs.5: Kazzabat qablahum qawmu Noohinw wal Ahzaabu min ba'dihim wa hammat kullu ummatin bi
ayahs.6: Wa kazaalika haqqat Kalimatu Rabbika 'alal lazeena kafarooo annahum Ashaabun Naar
ayahs.7: Allazeena yahmiloonal 'Arsha wa man hawlahoo yusabbihoona bihamdi Rabbihim wa
ayahs.8: Rabbanaa wa adkhilhum Jannaati 'adninil latee wa'attahum wa man salaha min aabaaa'ihim wa
ayahs.9: Wa qihimus saiyi-aat; wa man taqis saiyi-aati Yawma'izin faqad rahimtah; wa zaalika huwal
ayahs.10: Innal lazeena kafaroo yunaadawna lamaqtul laahi akbaru mim maqtikum anfusakum iz tud'awna
ayahs.11: Qaaloo Rabbanaaa amat tanasnataini wa ahyaitanas nataini fa'tarafnaa bizunoo binaa fahal ilaa
ayahs.12: Zaalikum bi annahooo izaa du'iyal laahu wahdahoo kafartum wa iny yushrak bihee tu'minoo;
ayahs.13: Huwal lazee yureekum Aayaatihee wa yunazzilu lakum minas samaaa'i rizqaa; wa maa
ayahs.14: Fad'ul laaha mukhliseena lahud deena wa law karihal kaafiroon
ayahs.15: Rafee'ud darajaati zul 'Arshi yulqir rooha min amrihee 'alaa mai yashaaa'u min 'ibaadihee
ayahs.16: Yawma hum baarizoona laa yakhfaa 'alal laahi minhum shai; limanil mulkul Yawma lillaahil
ayahs.17: Al-Yawma tujzaa kullu nafsim bimaa kasabat; laa zulmal Yawm; innal laaha saree'ul hisaab
ayahs.18: Wa anzirhum yawmal aazifati izil quloobu ladal hanaajiri kaazimeen; maa lizzaalimeena min
ayahs.19: Ya'lamu khaaa'inatal a'yuni wa maa tukhfis sudoor
ayahs.20: Wallaahu yaqdee bilhaqq, wallazeena yad'oona min doonihee laa yaqdoona bishai'; innal laaha
ayahs.21: Awalam yaseeroo fil ardi fa yanzuroo kaifa kaana 'aaqibatul lazeena kaanoo min qablihim;
ayahs.22: Zaalika bi annahum kaanat taateehim Rusuluhum bilbaiyinaati fakafaroo fa akhazahumul laah;
ayahs.23: Wa laqad arsalnaa Moosaa bi Aayaatinaa wa sultaanim mubeen
ayahs.24: Ilaa Fir'awna wa Haamaana wa Qaaroona faqaaloo saahirun kazzaab
ayahs.25: Falamma jaaa'ahum bil haqqi min 'indinaa qaaluq tulooo abnaaa'al lazeena aamanoo ma'ahoo
ayahs.26: Wa qaala Fir'awnu zarooneee aqtul Moosaa walyad'u Rabbahoo inneee akhaafu ai yubaddila
ayahs.27: Wa qaala Moosaaaa innee 'uztu bi Rabbee wa Rabbikum min kulli mutakabbiril laayu'minu bi
ayahs.28: Wa qaala rajulum mu'minummin Aali Fir'awna yaktumu eemaanahooo ataqtuloona rajulan ai
ayahs.29: Yaa qawmi lakumul mulkul yawma zaahireena fil ardi famai yansurunaa mim baasil laahi in
ayahs.30: Wa qaalal lazee aamana yaa qawmi inneee akhaafu 'alaikum misla yawmil Ahzaab
ayahs.31: Misla daabi qawmi Noohinw wa 'aadinw wa Samooda wallazeena mim ba'dihim; wa mal laahu
ayahs.32: Wa yaa qawmi inneee akhaafu 'alaikum yawmat tanaad
ayahs.33: Yawma tuwalloona mud bireena maa lakum minal laahi min 'aasim; wa mai yudlilil laahu famaa
ayahs.34: Wa laqad jaaa'akum Yoosufu min qablu bil baiyinaati famaa ziltum fee shakkim mimmaa
ayahs.35: Allazeena yujaadiloona feee Aaayaatil laahi bighairi sultaanin ataahum kabura maqtan 'indal
ayahs.36: Wa qaala Fir'awnu yaa Haamaanub-ni lee sarhal la'alleee ablughul asbaab
ayahs.37: Asbaabas samaawaati faattali'a ilaaa ilaahi Moosaa wa innee la azunnuhoo kaazibaa; wa
ayahs.38: Wa qaalal lazeee aamana yaa qawmit tabi'ooni ahdikum sabeelar rashaad
ayahs.39: Yaa qawmi innamaa haazihil hayaatud dunyaa mataa'unw wa innal Aakhirata hiya daarul qaraar
ayahs.40: Man 'amila saiyi'atan falaa yujzaaa illaa mislahaa wa man 'amila saaliham min zakarin aw unsaa
ayahs.41: Wa yaa qawmi maa leee ad'ookum ilan najaati wa tad'oonaneee ilan Naar
ayahs.42: Tad'oonanee li-akfura billaahi wa ushrika bihee maa laisa lee bihee 'ilmunw wa ana ad'ookum
ayahs.43: Laa jarama annamaa tad'oonanee ilaihi laisa lahoo da'watun fid dunyaa wa laa fil Aakhirati wa
ayahs.44: Fasatazkuroona maaa aqoolu lakum; wa ufawwidu amreee ilal laah; innallaaha baseerum
ayahs.45: Fa waqaahul laahu saiyiaati maa makaroo wa haaqa bi Aali-Fir'awna sooo'ul 'azaab
ayahs.46: An Naaru yu'radoona 'alaihaa ghuduwwanw wa 'ashiyyanw wa Yawma taqoomus Saa'aatu
ayahs.47: Wa iz yatahaaajjoona fin Naari fa-yaqoolud du'afaaa'u lillazeenas takbarooo innaa kunnaa lakum
ayahs.48: Qaalal lazeenas takbarooo innaa kullun feehaaa innal laaha qad hakama baynal'ibaad
ayahs.49: Wa qaalal lazeena fin Naari likhazanati Jahannamad-'oo Rabbakum yukhaf fif 'annaa yawmam
ayahs.50: Qaalooo awalam taku taateekum Rusulukum bilbaiyinaati qaaloo balaa' qaaloo fad'oo; wa maa
ayahs.51: Innaa lanansuru Rusulanaa wallazeena aamanoo fil hayaatid dunyaa wa Yawma yaqoomul
ayahs.52: Yawma laa yanfa'uz zaalimeena ma'ziratuhum wa lahumul la'natu wa lahum soooud daar
ayahs.53: Wa laqad aatainaa Moosal hudaa wa awrasnaa Baneee Israaa 'eelal Kitaab
ayahs.54: Hudanw wa zikraa li ulil albaab
ayahs.55: Fasbir inna wa'dal laahi haqqunw wastaghfir lizambika wa sabbih bihamdi Rabbika bil'ashiyyi
ayahs.56: Innal lazeena yujaadi loona feee Aayaatil laahi bighairi sultaanin ataahum in fee sudoorihim illaa
ayahs.57: Lakhalqus samaawaati wal ardi akbaru min khalqin naasi wa laakinna aksaran naasi laa
ayahs.58: Wa maa yastawil a'maa walbaseeru wallazeena aamanoo wa 'amilus saalihaati wa lal museee';
ayahs.59: Innas Saa'ata la aatiyatul laa raiba feehaa wa laakinna aksaran naasi laa yu'minoon
ayahs.60: Wa qaala Rabbukumud 'ooneee astajib lakum; innal lazeena yastakbiroona an 'ibaadatee sa
ayahs.61: Allaahul lazee ja'ala lakumul laila littaskunoo feehi wannahaara mubsiraa; innal laaha lazoo
ayahs.62: Zaalikumul laahu Rabbukum khaaliqu kulli shai'in; laaa ilaaha illaa Huwa fa annaa tu'fakoon
ayahs.63: Kazaalika yu'fakul lazeena kaanoo bi Aayaatil laahi yajhadoon
ayahs.64: Allaahul lazee ja'ala lakumul arda qaraaranw wassa maaa'a binaaa'anw wa sawwarakum fa
ayahs.65: Huwal Hayyu laaa ilaaha illaa Huwa fad'oohu mukh liseena lahud-deen; alhamdu lillaahi Rabbil
ayahs.66: Qul innee nuheetu an a'budal lazeena tad'oona min doonil laahi lammaa jaaa'a niyal baiyinaatu
ayahs.67: Huwal lazee khalaqakum min turaabin summa min nutfatin summa min 'alaqatin summa
ayahs.68: Huwal lazee yuhyee wa yumeetu fa izaa qadaaa amran fa innamaa yaqoolu lahoo kun fa yakoon
ayahs.69: Alam tara ilal lazeena yujaadiloona feee Aayaatil laahi annaa yusrafoon
ayahs.70: Allazeena kazzaboo bil Kitaabi wa bimaa arsalnaa bihee Rusulanaa fasawfa ya'lamoon
ayahs.71: Izil aghlaalu feee a'naaqi-him wassalaasilu yushaboon
ayahs.72: Fil hameemi summa fin Naari Yasjaroon
ayahs.73: Summaa qeela lahum ayna maa kuntum tushrikoon
ayahs.74: Min doonil laahi qaaloo dalloo 'annaa bal lam nakun nad'oo min qablu shai'aa; kazaalika yudillul
ayahs.75: Zaalikum bimaa kuntum tafrahoona fil ardi bighairil haqqi wa bimaa kuntum tamrahoon
ayahs.76: Udkhulooo abwaaba Jahannama khaalideena feehaa fabi'sa maswal mutakabbireen
ayahs.77: Fasbir inna wa'dal laahi haqq; fa immaa nuriyannak ba'dal lazee na'i duhum aw
ayahs.78: Wa laqad arsalnaa Rusulam min qablika minhum man qasasnaa 'alaika wa minhum mal lam
ayahs.79: Allaahul lazee ja'ala lakumul an'aama litarkaboo minhaa wa minhaa taakuloon
ayahs.80: Wa lakum feehaa manaafi'u wa litablughoo 'alaihaa haajatan fee sudoorikum wa 'alaihaa wa 'alal
ayahs.81: Wa yureekum Aayaatihee fa ayya Aayaatil laahi tunkiroon
ayahs.82: Afalam yaseeroo fil ardi fa yanzuroo kaifa kaana 'aaqibatul lazeena min qablihim; kaanoo aksara
ayahs.83: Falammaa jaaa'at hum Rusuluhum bilbaiyinaati farihoo bimaa 'indahum minal 'ilmi wa haaqa
ayahs.84: Falammaa ra aw baasanaa qaalooo aamannaa billaahi wahdahoo wa kafarnaa bimaa kunnaa
ayahs.85: Falam yaku yanfa 'uhum eemaanuhum lammaa ra-aw ba'sana sunnatal laahil latee qad khalat

ayahs.3: Kitaabun fussilat Aayaatuhoo Qur-aanan 'Arabiyyal liqawminy ya'lamoon
ayahs.4: Basheeranw wa nazeeran fa-a'rada aksaruhum fahum laa yasma'oon
ayahs.5: Wa qaaloo quloobunaa feee akinnatim mimmaa tad'oonaaa ilaihi wa feee aazaaninaa waqrunw
ayahs.6: Qul innamaaa ana basharum mislukum yoohaaa ilaiya annamaaa ilaahukum Ilaahunw
ayahs.7: Allazeena laa yu'toonaz Zakaata wa hum bil-Aakhiratihum kaafiroon

ayahs.3: Kazaalika yooheee ilaika wa ilal lazeena min qablikal laahul 'Azeezul Hakeem
ayahs.4: Lahoo maa fis samaa waati wa maa fil ardi wa Huwal 'Aliyul 'Azeem
ayahs.5: Takaadus samaawaatu yatafattarna min fawqihinn; walmalaaa'ikatu yusabbihoona bihamdi
ayahs.6: Wallazeenat takhazoo min dooniheee awliyaaa'al laahu hafeezun 'alaihim wa maaa anta 'alaihim
ayahs.7: Wa kazaalika awhainaaa llaika Qur-aanan 'Arabiyyal litunzira Ummal Quraa wa man hawlahaa
ayahs.8: Wa law shaaa'al laahu laja'alahum ummatanw waahi datanw walaakiny yudkhilumany yashaaa'u
ayahs.9: Amit takhazoo min dooniheee awliyaaa'a fallaahu Huwal W aliyyu wa Huwa yuhyil mawtaa wa
ayahs.10: Wa makh-talaftum feehi min shai'in fahukmuhooo ilallaah; zaalikumul laahu Rabbee 'alaihi
ayahs.11: Faatirus samaawaati wal ard; ja'ala lakum min anfusikum azwaajanw wa minal an'aami azwaajai
ayahs.12: Lahoo maqaaleedus samaawaati wal ardi yabsutur rizqa limai yashaaa'u wa yaqdir; innahoo
ayahs.13: Shara'a lakum minad deeni maa wassaa bihee Noohanw wallazeee awhainaaa ilaika wa maa
ayahs.14: Wa maa tafarraqooo illaa mim ba'di maa jaaa'ahumul 'ilmu baghyam bainahum; wa law laa
ayahs.15: Falizaalika fad'u wastaqim kamaaa umirta wa laa tattabi' ahwaaa'ahum wa qul aamantu bimaaa
ayahs.16: Wallazeena yuhaaajjoona fil laahi mim ba'di mastujeeba lahoo hujjatuhum daahidatun 'inda
ayahs.17: Allahul lazeee anzalal Kitaaba bilhaqqi wal Meezaan; wa ma yudreeka la'allas Saa'ata qareeb
ayahs.18: Yasta'jilu bihal lazeena laa yu'minoona bihaa wallazeena aamanoo mushfiqoona minhaa wa

ayahs.3: Innaa ja'alnaahu Quraanan 'Arabiyyal la'allakum ta'qiloon
ayahs.4: Wa innahoo feee Ummil Kitaabi Ladainaa la'aliyyun hakeem
ayahs.5: Afa nadribu 'ankumuz Zikra safhan an kuntum qawman musrifeen
ayahs.6: Wa kam arsalnaa min Nabiyyin fil awwaleen
ayahs.7: Wa maa yaateehim min Nabiyyin illaa kaanoo bihee yastahzi'oon
ayahs.8: Fa ahlaknaaa ashadda minhum batshanw wa madaa masalul awwaleen
ayahs.9: Wa la'in sa altahum man khalaqas samaawaati wal arda la yaqoolunna khalaqa hunnal 'Azeezul
ayahs.10: Allazee ja'ala lakumul arda mahdanw wa ja'ala lakum feehaa subulan la'allakum tahtadoon
ayahs.11: Wallazee nazzala minas samaaa'i maaa'am biqadarin fa ansharnaa bihee baldatam maitaa'
ayahs.12: Wallazee khalaqal azwaaja kullahaa wa ja'ala lakum minal fulki wal-an'aami maa tarkaboon
ayahs.13: Litastawoo 'alaa zuhoorihee summa tazkuroo ni'mata Rabbikum izastawaitum 'alaihi wa
ayahs.14: Wa innaaa ilaa Rabbinaa lamunqaliboon

ayahs.3: Innaaa anzalnaahu fee lailatim mubaarakah; innaa kunnaa munzireen
ayahs.4: Feehaa yufraqu kullu amrin hakeem
ayahs.5: Amram min 'indinaaa; innaa kunnaa mursileen
ayahs.6: Rahmatam mir rabbik; innahoo Huwas Samee'ul 'Aleem
ayahs.7: Rabbis samaawaati wal ardi wa maa bainahumaa; in kuntum mooqineen
ayahs.8: Laaa ilaaha illaa Huwa yuhyee wa yumeetu Rabbukum wa Rabbu aabaaa'ikumul awwaleen
ayahs.9: Bal hum fee shakkiny yal'aboon
ayahs.10: Fartaqib Yawma ta'tis samaaa'u bi dukhaanin mubeen
ayahs.11: Yaghshan naasa haazaa 'azaabun aleem
ayahs.12: Rabbanak shif 'annal 'azaaba innaa mu'minoon
ayahs.13: Annaa lahumuz zikraa wa qad jaaa'ahum Rasoolum mubeen
ayahs.14: Summaa tawallaw 'anhu wa qaaloo mu'allamum majnoon
ayahs.15: Innaa kaashiful 'azaabi qaleelaa; innakum 'aaa'idoon
ayahs.16: Yawma nabtishul batsha tal kubraa innaa muntaqimoon
ayahs.17: Wa laqad fatannaa qablahum qawma Fir'awna wa jaaa'ahum Rasoolun kareem
ayahs.18: An addooo ilaiya 'ibaadal laahi innee lakum Rasoolun ameen
ayahs.19: Wa al laa ta'loo 'alal laahi innee aateekum bisultaanim mubeen
ayahs.20: Wa innee 'uztu bi Rabbee wa rabbikum an tarjumoon
ayahs.21: Wa il lam tu'minoo lee fa'taziloon
ayahs.22: Fada'aa rabbahooo anna haaa'ulaaa'i qawmum mujrimoon
ayahs.23: Fa asri bi'ibaadee lailan innakum muttaba'oon
ayahs.24: Watrukil bahra rahwan innahum jundum mughraqoon
ayahs.25: Kam tarakoo min jannaatinw wa 'uyoon
ayahs.26: Wa zuroo'inw wa maqaa min kareem
ayahs.27: Wa na'matin kaanoo feehaa faakiheen
ayahs.28: Kazaalika wa awrasnaahaa qawman aakhareen
ayahs.29: Famaa bakat 'alaihimus samaaa'u wal ardu wa maa kaanoo munzareen
ayahs.30: Wa laqad najjainaa Baneee Israaa'eela minal'azaabil muheen
ayahs.31: Min Fir'awn; innahoo kaana 'aaliyam minal musrifeen
ayahs.32: Wa laqadikh tarnaahum 'alaa 'ilmin 'alal 'aalameen
ayahs.33: Wa aatainaahum minal aayaati maa feehi balaaa'um mubeen
ayahs.34: Inna haaa'ulaaa'i la yaqooloon
ayahs.35: In hiya illaa mawtatunal oolaa wa maa nahnu bimun shareen
ayahs.36: Fa'too bi aabaaa'inaaa inkuntum saadiqeen
ayahs.37: Ahum khayrun am qawmu Tubba'inw wallazeena min qablihim; ahlaknaahum innahum kaanoo
ayahs.38: Wa maa khalaqnas samaawaati wal arda wa maa baina humaa laa'ibeen
ayahs.39: Maa khalaqnaahumaaa illaa bilhaqqi wa laakinna aksarahum laa ya'lamoon
ayahs.40: Inna yawmal fasli meeqaatuhum ajma'een
ayahs.41: Yawma laa yughnee mawlan 'am mawlan shai'anw wa laa hum yunsaroon
ayahs.42: Illaa mar rahimal laah' innahoo huwal 'azeezur raheem
ayahs.43: Inna shajarataz zaqqoom
ayahs.44: Ta'aamul aseem
ayahs.45: Kalmuhli yaghlee filbutoon
ayahs.46: Kaghalyil hameem
ayahs.47: Khuzoohu fa'tiloohu ilaa sawaaa'il Jaheem
ayahs.50: Inna haazaa maa kuntum bihee tamtaroon
ayahs.51: Innal muttaqeena fee maqaamin ameen
ayahs.53: Yalbasoona min sundusinw wa istabraqim mutaqaabileen
ayahs.56: Laa yazooqoona feehal mawtaa illal mawtatal oolaa wa waqaahum 'azaabal jaheem
ayahs.57: Fadlam mir rabbik; zaalika huwal fawzul 'azeem
ayahs.58: Fa innamaa yassarnaahu bilisaanika la'allahum yatazakkaroon

ayahs.3: Innaa fis samaawaati wal ardi la Aayaatil lilmu'mineen
ayahs.4: Wa fee khalaqikum wa maa yabussu min daaabbatin Aayaatul liqawminy-yooqinoon
ayahs.5: Wakhtilaafil laili wannahaari wa maaa anzalal laahu minas samaaa'i mir rizqin fa ahyaa bihil arda
ayahs.6: Tilka Aayatul laahi natloohaa 'alaika bil haqq, fabiayyi hadeesim ba'dal laahi wa Aayaatihee
ayahs.7: Wailul likulli af faakin aseem
ayahs.8: Yasma'u Aayaatil laahi tutlaa 'alaihi summa yusirru mustakbiran ka-al lam yasma'haa
ayahs.9: Wa izaa 'alima min Aayaatinaa shai' 'anit takhazahaa huzuwaa; ulaaa'ika lahum 'azaabum
ayahs.10: Minw waraaa'ihim Jahannamu wa laa yughnee 'anhum maa kasaboo shai'anw wa laa mat
ayahs.11: Haazaa hudaa; wal lazeena kafaroo bi aayaati Rabbihim lahum 'azaabum mir rijzin 'aleem
ayahs.12: Allaahul lazee sahkhara lakumul bahra litajriyal fulku feehi bi amrihee wa litabtaghoo min
ayahs.13: Wa sakhkhara lakum maa fis samaawaati wa maa fil ardi jamee'am minhu; inna feezaalika la
ayahs.14: Qul lillazeena aamanoo yaghfiroo lillazeena laa yarjoona ayyaamal laahi liyajziya qawmam
ayahs.15: Man 'amila saalihan falinafsihee wa man asaaa'a fa'alaihaa summa ilaa Rabbikum turja'oon
ayahs.16: Wa laqad aatainaa Baneee Israaa'eelal Kitaaba walhukma wan Nubuwwata wa razaqnaahum
ayahs.17: Wa aatainaahum baiyinaatim minal amri famakh talafooo illaa mim ba'di maa jaaa'ahumul 'ilmu
ayahs.18: Summa ja'alnaaka 'alaa sharee'atim minal amri fattabi'haa wa laa tattabi'ahwaaa'al-lazeena laa
ayahs.19: Innahum lany yughnoo 'anka minal laahi shai'aa; wa innaz zaalimeena ba'duhum awliyaaa'u
ayahs.20: Haazaa basaaa'iru linnaasi wa hudanw wa rahmatul liqawminy yooqinoon
ayahs.21: Am hasibal lazeenaj tarahus saiyiaati an naj'alahum kallazeena aamanoo wa 'amilu saalihaati
ayahs.22: Wa khalaqal laahus samaawaati wal arda bilhaqqi wa litujzaa kullu nafsim bimaa kasabat wa
ayahs.23: Afara'ayta manit takhaza ilaahahoo hawaahu wa adal lahul laahu 'alaa 'ilminw wa khatama 'alaa
ayahs.24: Wa qaaloo maa hiya illaa hayaatunad dunyaa namootu wa nahyaa wa maa yuhlikunaaa illad
ayahs.25: Wa izaa tutlaa 'alaihim aayaatuna baiyinaatim maa kaana hujjatahum illaaa an qaalu'too bi
ayahs.26: Qulil laahu yuhyeekum summa yumeetukum summa yajma'ukum ilaa Yawmil Qiyaamati laa
ayahs.27: Wa lillaahi mulkus samaawaati wal ard; wa Yawma taqoomus Saa'atu Yawma 'iziny yakhsarul
ayahs.28: Wa taraa kulla ummatin jaasiyah; kullu ummatin tud'aaa ilaa kitaabihaa al Yawma tujzawna maa
ayahs.29: Haazaa kitaabunaa yantiqu 'alaikum bilhaqq; innaa kunnaa nastansikhu maa kuntum ta'maloon
ayahs.30: Fa ammal lazeena aamaanoo wa 'amilus saalihaati fayudkhiluhum Rabbuhum fee rahmatih;
ayahs.31: Wa ammal lazeena kafarooo afalam takun Aayaatee tutlaa 'alaikum fastakbartum wa kuntum
ayahs.32: Wa izaa qeela inna wa'dallaahi haqqunw was Saa'atu laa raiba feehaa qultum maa nadree mas
ayahs.33: Wa badaa lahum saiyiaatu maa 'amiloo wa haaqa bihim maa kaanoo bihee yastahzi'oon
ayahs.34: Wa qeelal yawma nansaakum kamaa naseetum liqaaa'a yawmikum haazaa wa maawaakumun
ayahs.35: Zaalikum bi annakumut takhaztum aayaatil laahi huzuwanw wa gharratkumul hayaatud dunyaa;
ayahs.36: Falillaahil hamdu Rabbis samaawaati wa Rabbil ardi Rabbil-'aalameen

ayahs.3: Maa khalaqnas samaawaati wal arda wa maa bainahumaaa illaa bilhaqqi wa ajalim musammaa;
ayahs.4: Qul ara'aytum maa tad'oona min doonil laahi aroonee maazaa khalaqoo minal ardi am lahum
ayahs.5: Wa man adallu mimmany yad'oo min doonil laahi mallaa yastajeebu lahooo ilaa Yawmil
ayahs.6: Wa izaa hushiran naasu kaanoo lahum a'daaa'anw wa kaanoo bi'ibaadatihim kaafireen
ayahs.7: Wa izaa tutlaa 'alaihim Aayaatunaa baiyinaatin qaalal lazeena kafaroo lilhaqqi lammaa
ayahs.8: Am yaqooloonaf taraahu qul inif taraituhoo falaa tamlikoona lee minal laahi shai'an Huwa a'lamu
ayahs.9: Qul maa kuntu bid'am minal Rusuli wa maaa adreee ma yuf'alu bee wa laa bikum in attabi'u illaa
ayahs.10: Qul ara'aytum in kaana min 'indil laahi wa kafartum bihee wa shahida shaahidum mim Banee
ayahs.11: Wa qaalal lazeena kafaroo lillazeena aamanoo law kaana khairam maa sabaqoonaaa ilyh; wa iz
ayahs.12: Wa min qablihee kitaabu Moosaaa imaamanw-wa rahmah; wa haazaa Kitaabum musad diqul
ayahs.13: Innal lazeena qaaloo Rabbunal laahu summas taqaamoo falaa khawfun 'alaihim wa laahum
ayahs.14: Ulaaa'ika Ashabul Jannati khaalideena feehaa jazaaa'am bimaa kaano ya'maloon
ayahs.15: Wa wassainal insaana biwaalidaihi ihsaana; hamalat hu ummuhoo kurhanw-wa wada'at hu
ayahs.16: Ulaaa'ikal lazeena nata qabbalu 'anhum ahsana maa 'amiloo wa natajaawazu 'an saiyiaatihim
ayahs.17: Wallazee qaala liwaali daihi uf fil lakumaaa ata'idanineee an ukhraja wa qad khalatil quroonu min
ayahs.18: Ulaaa'ikal lazeena haqqa 'alaihimul qawlu feee umamin qad khalat min qablihim minal jinni wal
ayahs.19: Wa likullin darajaatum mimmaa 'amiloo wa liyuwaf fiyahum a'maalahum wa hum laa yuzlamoon
ayahs.20: Wa Yawma yu'radul lazeena kafaroo 'alan Naari azhabtum taiyibaatikum fee hayaatikumud
ayahs.21: Wazkur akhaa � Aadin iz anzara qawmahoo bil Ahqaafi wa qad khalatin nuzuru mim baini
ayahs.22: Qaaloo aji'tanaa li taa fikanaa 'an aalihatinaa fa'tinaa bimaa ta'idunaaa in kunta minas saadiqeen
ayahs.23: Qaala innamal 'ilmu indal laahi wa uballighukum maaa ursiltu bihee wa laakinneee araakum
ayahs.24: Falammaa ra awhu 'aaridam mustaqbila awdiyatihim qaaloo haazaa 'aaridum mumtirunaa; bal
ayahs.25: Tudammiru kulla shai'im bi-amri Rabbihaa fa asbahoo laa yuraaa illaa masaakinuhum; kazaalika
ayahs.26: Wa laqad makkannaahum feemaaa im makkannaakum feehi waj'alnaa lahum sam'anw wa
ayahs.27: Wa laqad ahlaknaa ma hawlakum minal quraa wa sarrafnal Aayaati la'allahum yarji'oon
ayahs.28: Falaw laa nasarahumul lazeenat takhazoo min doonil laahi qurbaanan aalihatam bal dalloo
ayahs.29: Wa iz sarafinaaa ilaika nafaram minal jinni yastami'oonal Quraana falammaa hadaroohu qaalooo
ayahs.30: Qaaloo yaa qawmanaaa innaa sami'naa Kitaaban unzila mim ba'di Moosa musaddiqal limaa
ayahs.31: Yaa qawmanaaa ajeeboo daa'iyal laahi wa aaminoo bihee yaghfir lakum min zunoobikum wa
ayahs.32: Wa mal laa yujib daa'iyal laahi falaisa bimu'jizin fil ardi wa laisa lahoo min dooniheee awliyaaa';
ayahs.33: Awalam yaraw annal laahal lazee khalaqas samaawaati wal arda wa lam ya'ya bikhal qihinna
ayahs.34: Wa Yawma yu'radul lazeena kafaroo 'alan naari alaisa haaza bil haqq; qaaloo balaa wa
ayahs.35: Fasbir kamaa sabara ulul 'azmi minar Rusuli wa laa tasta'jil lahum; ka annahum Yawma yarawna

ayahs.2: Liyaghfira lakal laahu maa taqaddama min zambika wa maa ta akhkhara wa yutimma
ayahs.3: Wa yansurakal laahu nasran 'azeezaa
ayahs.4: Huwal lazeee anzalas sakeenata fee quloobil mu'mineena liyazdaadooo eemaanamma'a
ayahs.5: Liyudkhilal mu'mineena walmu'minaati jannaatin tajree min tahtihal anhaaru khaalideena feehaa
ayahs.6: Wa yu'azzibal munaafiqeena walmunaafiqaati wal mushrikeena walmushrikaatiz zaaanneena
ayahs.7: Wa lillaahi junoodus samaawaati wal ard; wa kaanal laahu 'azeezan hakeema
ayahs.8: Innaaa arsalnaaka shaahi danw wa mubashshiranw wa nazeera
ayahs.9: Litu minoo billaahi wa Rasoolihee wa tu'azziroohu watuwaqqiroohu watusabbi hoohu bukratanw
ayahs.10: Innal lazeena yubaayi'oonaka innamaa yubaayi'oonal laaha yadul laahi fawqa aydeehim; faman
ayahs.11: Sa yaqoolu lakal mukhal lafoona minal-A'raabi shaighalatnaaa amwaalunaa wa ahloonaa
ayahs.12: Bal zanantum al lany yanqalibar Rasoolu walmu'minoona ilaaa ahleehim abadanw wa zuyyina
ayahs.13: Wa mal lam yu'mim billaahi wa Rasoolihee fainnaaa a'tadnaa lilkaafireena sa'eeraa
ayahs.14: Wa lillaahii mulkus samaawaati wal ard; yaghfiru limany yashaaa'u wa yu'azzibu many yashaaa';
ayahs.15: Sa yaqoolul mukhalla foona izan talaqtum ilaa maghaanima litaakhuzoohaa zaroonaa
ayahs.16: Qul lilmukhallafeena minal A'raabi satud'awna ilaa qawmin ulee baasin shadeedin tuqaati
ayahs.17: Laisa 'alal a'maa harajunw wa laa 'alal a'raji harajunw wa laa 'alal mareedi haraj' wa many yutil'il
ayahs.18: Laqad radiyal laahu 'anil mu'mineena iz yubaayi 'oonaka tahtash shajarati fa'alima maa fee
ayahs.19: Wa maghaanima kaseera tany yaakhuzoonahaa; wa kaanal laahu 'Azeezan Hakeemaa
ayahs.20: Wa'adakumul laahu ma ghaanima kaseeratan taakhuzoo nahaa fa'ajjala lakum haazihee wa
ayahs.21: Wa ukhraa lam taqdiroo 'alaihaa qad ahaatal laahu bihaa; wa kaanal laahu 'alaa kulli shai'in
ayahs.22: Wa law qaatalakumul lazeena kafaroo la wallawul adbaara summa laa yajidoona waliyanw-wa
ayahs.23: Sunnatal laahil latee qad khalat min qablu wa lan tajida lisunnatil laahi tabdeelaa
ayahs.24: Wa Huwal lazee kaf fa aydiyahum 'ankum wa aydiyakum 'anhum bibatni Makkata mim ba'di an
ayahs.25: Humul lazeena kafaroo wa saddookum 'anil-Masjidil-Haraami walhadya ma'koofan any yablugha
ayahs.26: Iz ja'alal lazeena kafaroo fee quloobihimul hamiyyata hamiyyatal jaahiliyyati fa anzalal laahu
ayahs.27: Laqad sadaqal laahu Rasoolahur ru'yaa bilhaqq, latadkhulunnal Masjidal-Haraama in shaaa'al
ayahs.28: Huwal lazeee arsala Rasoolahoo bilhudaa wa deenil haqqi liyuzhirahoo 'alad deeni kullih; wa
ayahs.29: Muhammadur Rasoolul laah; wallazeena ma'ahooo ashiddaaa'u 'alal kuf faaari ruhamaaa'u

ayahs.1: Yaa ayyuhal lazeena aamanoo la tuqaddimoo baina yada yil laahi wa Rasoolihee wattaqul laah;
ayahs.2: Yaa ayyuhal lazeena aamanoo laa tarfa'ooo aswaatakum fawqa sawtin Nabiyi wa laa tajharoo
ayahs.3: Innal lazeena yaghud doona aswaatahum 'inda Rasoolil laahi ulaaa'ikal lazeenam tah anal laahu
ayahs.4: Innal lazeena yunaadoo naka minw waraaa'il hujuraati aksaruhum laa ya'qiloon
ayahs.5: Wa law annahum sabaroo hatta takhruja ilaihim lakaana khairal lahum; wallaahu Ghafoorur
ayahs.6: Yaaa ayyuhal lazeena aamanoo in jaaa'akum faasiqum binaba in fatabaiyanooo an tuseeboo
ayahs.7: Wa'lamooo anna feekum Rasoolal laah; law yutee'ukum fee kaseerim minal amrila'anittum wa
ayahs.8: Fadlam minal laahi wa ni'mah; wallaahu 'Aleemun Hakeem
ayahs.9: Wa in taaa'ifataani minal mu'mineena naqtataloo fa aslihoo bainahumaa; fa-im baghat
ayahs.10: Innamal mu'minoona ikhwatun fa aslihoo baina akhawaykum wattaqul laaha la'allakum
ayahs.11: Yaaa ayyuhal lazeena aamanoo laa yaskhar qawmum min qawmin 'asaaa anyyakoonoo khairam
ayahs.12: Yaaa ayyuhal lazeena aamanuj taniboo kaseeram minaz zanni inna ba'daz zanniismunw wa laa
ayahs.13: Yaaa ayyuhan naasu innaa khalaqnaakum min zakarinw wa unsaa wa ja'alnaakum shu'oobanw
ayahs.14: Qaalatil-A  'raabu aamannaa qul lam tu'minoo wa laakin qoolooo aslamnaa wa lamma yadkhulil
ayahs.15: Innamal muu'minoonal lazeena aamanoo billaahi wa Rasoolihee summa lam yartaaboo wa
ayahs.16: Qul atu'allimoonal laaha bideenikum wallaahu ya'lamu maa fis samaawaati wa maa fil ard;
ayahs.17: Yamunnoona 'alaika an aslamoo qul laa tamunnoo 'alaiya Islaamakum balillaahu yamunnu
ayahs.18: Innal laaha ya'lamu ghaibas samaawaati wal ard; wallaahu baseerum bimaa ta'maloon (section

ayahs.2: Bal 'ajibooo an jaa'ahum munzirum minhum faqaalal kaafiroona haazaa shai'un 'ajeeb
ayahs.3: 'A-izaa mitnaa wa kunnaa turaaban zaalika raj'um ba'eed
ayahs.4: Qad 'alimnaa maa tanqu-sul-ardu minhum wa 'indanaa Kitaabun Hafeez
ayahs.5: Bal kazzaboo bilhaqqi lammaa jaaa'ahum fahum feee amrim mareej
ayahs.6: Afalam yanzurooo ilas samaaa'i fawqahum kaifa banainaahaa wa zaiyannaahaa wa maa lahaa
ayahs.7: Wal arda madadnaahaa wa alqainaa feehaa rawaasiya wa ambatnaa feehaa min kulli zawjim
ayahs.8: Tabsiratanw wa zikraa likulli 'abdim muneeb
ayahs.9: Wa nazzalnaa minas samaaa'i maaa'am mubaarakan fa ambatnaa bihee jannaatinw wa habbal
ayahs.10: Wannakhla baasiqaatil laha tal'un nadeed
ayahs.11: Rizqal lil'ibaad, wa ahyainaa bihee baldatam maitaa; kazaalikal khurooj
ayahs.12: Kazzabat qablahum qawmu Noohinw wa Ashaabur Rassi wa Samood
ayahs.13: Wa 'Aadunw wa Fir'awnu wa ikhwaanu loot
ayahs.14: Wa Ashaabul Aykati wa qawmu Tubba'; kullun kazzabar Rusula fahaqqa wa'eed
ayahs.15: Afa'a yeenaa bilkhalqil awwal; bal hum fee labsim min khalqin jadeed
ayahs.16: Wa laqad khalaqnal insaana wa na'lamu maa tuwaswisu bihee nafsuhoo wa Nahnu aqrabu ilaihi
ayahs.17: 'Iz yatalaqqal mutalaqqi yaani 'anil yameeni wa 'anish shimaali qa'eed
ayahs.18: Maa yalfizu min qawlin illaa ladaihi raqeebun 'ateed
ayahs.19: Wa jaaa'at sakratul mawti bilhaqq; zaalika maa kunta minhu taheed
ayahs.20: Wa nufikha fis Soor; zaalika yawmul wa'eed
ayahs.21: Wa jaaa'at kullu nafsim ma'ahaa saaa'iqunw wa shaheed
ayahs.22: Laqad kunta fee ghaf latim min haazaa fakashafnaa 'anka ghitaaa'aka fabasarukal yawma
ayahs.23: Wa qaala qareenuhoo haazaa maa ladaiya 'ateed
ayahs.24: Alqiyaa fee Jahannama kulla kaf faarin 'aneed
ayahs.25: Mannaa'il lilkhayri mu'tadim mureeb
ayahs.26: Allazee ja'ala ma'al laahi ilaahan aakhara fa alqiyaahu fil'azaabish shadeed
ayahs.27: Qaala qareenuhoo Rabbanaa maaa atghaituhoo wa laakin kaana fee dalaalin ba'eed
ayahs.28: Qaala laa takhtasimoo ladaayya wa qad qaddamtu ilaikum bilwa'eed
ayahs.29: Maa yubaddalul qawlu ladaiya wa maaa ana bizal laamil lil'abeed
ayahs.30: Yawma naqoolu li'jahannama halim talaati wa taqoolu hal mim mazeed
ayahs.31: Wa uzlifatil jannatu lil muttaqeena ghaira ba'eed
ayahs.32: Haaza maa too'adoona likulli awwaabin hafeez
ayahs.33: Man khashiyar Rahmaana bilghaibi wa jaaa'a biqalbim muneeb
ayahs.34: Udkhuloohaa bisalaamin zaalika yawmul khulood
ayahs.35: Lahum maa yashaaa'oona feehaa wa ladainaa mazeed
ayahs.36: Wa kam ahlaknaa qablahum min qarnin hum ashaddu minhum batshan fanaqqaboo fil bilaad,
ayahs.37: Inna fee zaalika lazikraa liman kaana lahoo qalbun aw alqas sam'a wa huwa shaheed
ayahs.38: Wa laqad khalaqnas samaawaati wal arda wa maa bainahumaa fee sittati ayyaamin wa maa
ayahs.39: Fasbir 'alaa maa yaqooloona wa sabbih bihamdi Rabbika qabla tuloo'ish shamsi wa qablal
ayahs.40: Wa minal laili fasabbih hu wa adbaaras sujood
ayahs.42: Yawma yasmaoonas sai hata bilhaqq zaalika yawmul khurooj
ayahs.43: Innaa Nahnu nuhyee wa numeetu wa ilainal maseer
ayahs.44: Yawma tashaqqaqul ardu 'anhum siraa'aa; zaalika hashrun 'alainaa yaseer
ayahs.45: Nahnu a'lamu bimaa yaqooloona wa maaa anta 'alaihim bijabbaarin fazakkir bil quraani many

ayahs.3: Faljaariyaati yusraa

ayahs.18: Wa bil as haari hum yastaghfiroon

ayahs.20: Wa fil ardi aayaatul lilmooqineen

ayahs.24: Hal ataaka hadeesu daifi Ibraaheemal mukrameen

ayahs.26: Faraagha ilaaa ahlihee fajaaa'a bi'ijlin sameen

ayahs.28: Fa awjasa minhum khee fatan qaaloo laa takhaf wa bashsharoohu bighulaamin 'aleem
ayahs.29: Fa aqbalatim ra-atuhoo fee sarratin fasakkat wajhahaa wa qaalat 'ajoozun 'aqeem

ayahs.3: Fee raqqim manshoor
ayahs.4: Wal baitil ma'moor
ayahs.5: Wassaqfil marfoo'
ayahs.6: Wal bahril masjoor
ayahs.7: Inna 'azaaba Rabbika lawaaqi'
ayahs.8: Maa lahoo min daafi'
ayahs.9: Yawma tamoorus samaaa'u mawraa
ayahs.10: Wa taseerul jibaalu sairaa
ayahs.11: Fawailuny yawma 'izil lil mukaazzibeen
ayahs.12: Allazeena hum fee khawdiny yal'aboon
ayahs.13: Yawma yuda'-'oona ilaa naari jahannama da'-'aa
ayahs.14: Haazihin naarul latee kuntum bihaa tukazziboon
ayahs.15: Afasihrun haazaaaa am antum laa tubsiroon
ayahs.16: Islawhaa fasbirooo aw laa tasbiroo sawaaa'un 'alaikum innamaa tujzawna maa kuntum

ayahs.18: Faakiheena bimaaa aataahum rabbuhum wa waqaahum rabbuhum 'azaabal jaheem

ayahs.20: Muttaki'eena 'alaa sururim masfoofatinw wa zawwaj naahum bihoorin 'een
ayahs.21: Wallazeena aamanoo wattaba'at hum zurriyyatuhum bieemaanin alhaqnaa bihim zurriyyatahum

ayahs.23: Yatanaaza'oona feehaa kaasal laa laghwun feehaa wa laa taaseem
ayahs.24: Wa yatoofu 'alaihim ghilmaanul lahum ka annahum lu'lu'um maknoon
ayahs.25: Wa aqbala ba'duhum 'alaa ba'diny yatasaaa'aloon
ayahs.26: Qaalooo innaa kunnaa qablu feee ahlinaa mushfiqeen
ayahs.27: Famannnal laahu 'alainaa wa waqaanaa 'azaabas samoom
ayahs.28: Innaa kunnaa min qablu nad'oohu innahoo huwal barrur raheem
ayahs.29: Fazakkir famaaa anta bini'mati rabbika bikaahininw wa laa majnoon
ayahs.30: Am yaqooloona shaa'irun natarabbasu bihee raibal manoon
ayahs.31: Qul tarabbasoo fa innee ma'akum minal mutarabbiseen
ayahs.32: Am taamuruhum ahlaamuhum bihaazaaa am hum qawmun taaghoon
ayahs.33: Am yaqooloona taqawwalah; bal laa yu'minoon
ayahs.34: Falyaatoo bihadeesim misliheee in kaanoo saadiqeen
ayahs.35: Am khuliqoo min ghairi shai'in am humul khaaliqoon
ayahs.36: Am khalaqus samaawaati wal ard; bal laa yooqinoon
ayahs.37: Am'indahum khazaaa'inu rabbika am humul musaitiroon
ayahs.38: Am lahum sullamuny yastami'oona feehi falyaati mustami'uhum bisultaanim mubeen
ayahs.39: Am lahul banaatu wa lakumul banoon
ayahs.40: Am tas'aluhum ajran fahum mim maghramim musqaloon
ayahs.41: Am 'indahumul ghaibu fahum yaktuboon
ayahs.42: Am yureedoona kaidan fallazeena kafaroo humul makeedoon
ayahs.43: Am lahum ilaahun ghairul laa; subhaanal laahi 'ammaa yushrikoon
ayahs.44: Wa iny yaraw kisfam minas samaaa'i saaqitany yaqooloo sahaabum markoom
ayahs.45: Fazarhum hatta yulaaqoo yawmahumul lazee feehi yus'aqoon
ayahs.46: Yawma laa yughnee 'anhum kaiduhum shai'anw wa laa hum yunsaroon
ayahs.48: Wasbir lihukmi rabbika fa innaka bi-a'yuninaa wa sabbih bihamdi rabbika heena taqoom

ayahs.2: Maa dalla saahibukum wa maa ghawaa

ayahs.23: In hiya illaaa asmaaa'un sammaitumoohaaa antum wa aabaaa'ukum maaa anzalal laahu bihaa
ayahs.24: Am lil insaani maa taman naa
ayahs.25: Falillaahil aakhiratu wal oolaa
ayahs.26: Wa kam mim malakin fissamaawaati laa tughnee shafaa'atuhum shai'an illaa mim ba'di
ayahs.27: Innal lazeena laa yu'minoona bil aakhirati la yusammoonal malaaa'ikata tasmiyatal unsaa
ayahs.28: Wa maa lahum bihee min 'ilmin iny yattabi'oona illaz zanna wa innaz zanna laa yughnee minal
ayahs.29: Fa a'rid 'am man tawallaa 'an zikrinaa wa lam yurid illal hayaatad dunyaa
ayahs.30: Zalika mablaghuhum minal 'ilm; inna rabbaka huwa a'lamu biman dalla 'an sabee lihee wa huwa
ayahs.31: Wa lillaahi maa fis samaawaati wa maa fil ardi liyajziyal lazeena asaaa'oo bimaa 'amiloo wa
ayahs.32: Allazeena yajtaniboona kabaaa'iral ismi walfawaa hisha illal lamam; inna rabbaka waasi'ul
ayahs.33: Afara'ayatal lazee tawallaa

ayahs.1: Sabbaha lillaahi maa fissamaawaati wal ard; wa Huwal 'Azeezul Hakeem
ayahs.2: Lahoo mulkus samaawaati wal ard; yuhyee wa yumeet; wa Huwa 'alaa kulli shai'in Qadeer
ayahs.3: Huwal Awwalu wal'Aakhiru waz Zaahiru wal Baatinu wa huwa bikulli shai'in Aleem
ayahs.4: Huwal lazee khalaqas samaawaati wal arda fee sittati ayyaamin summas tawaa 'alal 'Arsh;
ayahs.5: Lahoo mulkus samaawaati wal ard; wa ilal laahi turja'ul umoor
ayahs.6: Yoolijul laila fin nahaari wa yoolijun nahaara fil lail; wa Huwa 'Aleemum bizaatis sudoor
ayahs.7: Aaaminoo billaahi wa Rasoolihee wa anfiqoo mimmaa ja'alakum mustakh lafeena feehi
ayahs.8: Wa maa lakum laa tu'minoona billaahi war Rasoolu yad'ookum li tu'minoo bi Rabbikum wa qad
ayahs.9: Huwal lazee yunazzilu 'alaa 'abdiheee Aayaatim baiyinaatil liyukhrijakum minaz zulumaati ilan
ayahs.10: Wa maa lakum allaa tunfiqoo fee sabeelil laahi wa lillaahi meeraasus samaawaati wal-ard; laa
ayahs.11: Man zal lazee yuqridul laaha qardan hasanan fa yudaa'ifahoo lahoo wa lahooo ajrun kareem
ayahs.12: Yawma taral mu'mineena walmu'minaati yas'aa nooruhum baina aydeehim wa bi aymaanihim
ayahs.13: Yawma yaqoolul munaafiqoona walmunaafiqaatu lil lazeena aamanu unzuroonaa naqtabis min
ayahs.14: Yunaadoonahum alam nakum ma'akum qaaloo balaa wa laakinnakum fatantum anfusakum wa
ayahs.15: Fal Yawma laa yu'khazu minkum fidyatunw wa laa minal lazeena kafaroo; ma'waakumun Naaru
ayahs.16: Alam ya'ni lil lazeena aamanooo an takhsha'a quloobuhum lizikril laahi wa maa nazala minal
ayahs.17: I'lamooo annal laaha yuhyil arda ba'da mawtihaa; qad baiyannaa lakumul Aayaati la'allakum
ayahs.18: Innal mussaddiqeena wal mussaddiqaati wa aqradul laaha qardan hassanany yudaa'afu lahum
ayahs.19: Wallazeena aamanoo billaahi wa Rusuliheee ulaaa'ika humus siddeeqoon; wash shuhadaaa'u
ayahs.20: I'lamooo annamal hayaa tud dunyaa la'ibunw wa lahwunw wa zeenatunw wa tafaakhurum
ayahs.21: Saabiqooo ilaa maghfiratim mir Rabbikum wa jannatin 'arduhaa ka-'ardis samaaa'i wal ardi
ayahs.22: Maaa asaaba min museebatin fil ardi wa laa feee anfusikum illaa fee kitaabim min qabli an nabra
ayahs.23: Likailaa ta'saw 'alaa maa faatakum wa laa tafrahoo bimaaa aataakum; wallaahu laa yuhibbu
ayahs.24: Allazeeena yabkhaloona wa yaamuroonan naasa bil bukhl; wa many yatawalla fa innal laaha
ayahs.25: Laqad arsalnaa Rusulanaa bilbaiyinaati wa anzalnaa ma'ahumul Kitaaba wal Meezaana
ayahs.26: Wa laqad arsalnaa Noohanw wa Ibraaheema wa ja'alnaa fee zurriyyatihiman nubuwwata wal
ayahs.27: Summa qaf fainaa 'alaa aasaarihim bi Rusulinaa wa qaf fainaa bi 'Eesab ni Maryama wa

ayahs.29: Li'alla ya'lama Ahlul kitaabi allaa yaqdiroona 'alaa shai'in min fadlil laahi wa annal fadla bi Yadil

ayahs.1: Qad sami'al laahu qawlal latee tujaadiluka fee zawjihaa wa tashtakeee ilal laahi wallaahu

ayahs.14: Alam tara ilal lazeena tawallaw qawman ghadibal laahu 'alaihim maa hum minkum wa laa

ayahs.18: Yawma yab'asuhumul laahujamee'an fa yahlifoona lahoo kamaa yahlifoona lakum wa
ayahs.19: Istahwaza 'alaihimush shaitaanu fa ansaahum zikral laah; ulaaa'ika hizbush shaitaaan; alaaa
ayahs.20: Innal lazeena yuhaaaddoonal laaha wa Rasoolahooo ulaaa'ika fil azalleen

ayahs.1: Sabbaha lillaahi maa fissamaawaati wa maa fil ardi wa Huwal 'Azeezul Hakeem

ayahs.13: La antum ashaddu rahbatan fee sudoorihim minal laah; zaalika bi annahum qawmul laa
ayahs.14: Laa yuqaatiloonakum jamee'an illaa fee quram muhas sanatin aw minw waraaa'i judur;
ayahs.15: Kamasalil lazeena min qablihim qareeban zaaqoo wabaala amrihim wa lahum 'azaabun aleem
ayahs.16: Kamasalish shaitaani izqaala lil insaanik fur falammaa kafara qaala innee bareee'um minka
ayahs.17: Fakaana 'aaqibatahumaaa annahumaa fin naari khaalidaini feehaa; wa zaalika jazaaa'uz
ayahs.18: Yaaa ayyuhal lazeena aamanut taqul-laaha; waltanzur nafsum maa qaddamat lighadiw wattaqul
ayahs.19: Wa laa takoonoo kallazeena nasul laaha fa ansaahum anfusahum; ulaaa'ika humul faasiqoon
ayahs.20: Laa yastaweee as-haabun naari wa ashaabul jannah; as haabul jannati humul faaa'izoon
ayahs.21: Law anzalnaa haazal quraana 'alaa jabilil lara aytahoo khaashi'am muta saddi'am min
ayahs.22: Huwal-laahul-lazee laaa Ilaaha illaa Huwa 'Aalimul Ghaibi wash-shahaada; Huwar Rahmaanur-
