ayahs.24: Huwal Laahul Khaaliqul Baari 'ul Musawwir; lahul Asmaaa'ul Husnaa; yusabbihu lahoo maa fis

ayahs.1: Yaa ayyuhal lazeena aamanoo laa tattakhizoo 'aduwwee wa 'aduwaakum awliyaaa'a tulqoona
ayahs.2: Iny yasqafookum yakoonoo lakum a'daaa'anw wa yabsutooo ilaikum aydiyahum wa alsinatahum
ayahs.3: Lan tanfa'akum arhaamukum wa laaa awlaadukum; yawmal qiyaamati yafsilu bainakum;
ayahs.4: Qad kaanat lakum uswatun hasanatun feee Ibraaheema wallazeena ma'ahoo iz qaaloo
ayahs.5: Rabbana laa taj'alnaa fitnatal lillazeena kafaroo waghfir lanaa rabbanaa innaka antal azeezul
ayahs.6: Laqad kaana lakum feehim uswatunhasanatul liman kaana yarjul laaha wal yawmal aakhir; wa
ayahs.7: Asal laahu any yaj'ala bainakum wa bainal lazeena 'aadaitum minhum mawaddah; wallahu
ayahs.8: Laa yanhaakumul laahu 'anil lazeena lam yuqaatilookum fid deeni wa lam yukhrijookum min
ayahs.9: Innamaa yanhaakumul laahu 'anil lazeena qaatalookum fid deeni wa akhrajookum min
ayahs.10: Yaaa ayyuhal lazeena aamanoo izaa jaaa'akumul mu'minaatu muhaajiraatin famtahinoo hunn;
ayahs.11: Wa in faatakum shai'un min azwaajikum ilal kuf faari fa 'aaqabtum fa aatul lazeena zahabat
ayahs.12: Yaaa ayyuhan nabbiyyu izaa jaaa'akal mu'minaatu yubaayigh'naka 'alaaa allaa yushrikna billaahi
ayahs.13: Yaaa ayyuhal lazeena amanoo laa tatawallaw qawman ghadibal laahu 'alaihim qad ya'isoo minal

ayahs.1: Sabbaha lillaahi maa fisamaawaati wa maa fil ardi wa huwal 'Azeezul Hakeem
ayahs.2: Yaa ayyuhal lazeena aamanoo lima taqooloona maa laa taf'aloon
ayahs.3: Kabura maqtan 'indal laahi an taqooloo maa laa taf'aloon
ayahs.4: Innal laaha yuhibbul lazeena yuqaatiloona fee sabeelihee saf fan ka annahum bunyaanum
ayahs.5: Wa iz qaala Moosa liqawmihee yaa qawmi lima tu'zoonanee wa qat ta'lamoona annee Rasoolul
ayahs.6: Wa iz qaala 'Eesab-nu-Maryama yaa Banee Israaa'eela innee Rasoolul laahi ilaikum musaddiqal
ayahs.7: Wa man azlamu mimma nif taraa 'alal laahil kaziba wa huwa yud'aaa ilal Islaam; wallaahu laa
ayahs.8: Yureedoona liyutfi'oo nooral laahi bi afwaahihim wallaahu mutimmu noorihee wa law karihal
ayahs.9: Huwal lazee arsala Rasoolahoo bilhudaa wa deenil haqqi liyuzhirahoo 'alad deeni kullihee wa
ayahs.10: Yaaa ayyuhal lazeena aamanoo hal adullukum 'alaa tijaaratin tunjeekum min 'azaabin aleem
ayahs.11: Tu'minoona billaahi wa Rasoolihee wa tujaahidoona fee sabeelil laahi bi amwaalikum wa
ayahs.12: Yaghfir lakum zunoobakum wa yudkhilkum Jannaatin tajree min tahtihal anhaaru wa masaakina
ayahs.13: Wa ukhraa tuhibboonahaa nasrum minal laahi wa fat hun qareeb; wa bashshiril mu 'mineen
ayahs.14: Yaaa ayyuhal lazeena aamanoo koonooo ansaaral laahi kamaa qaala 'Eesab-nu-Maryama lil

ayahs.1: Yusabbihu lilaahi maa fis samaawaati wa maa fil ardil Malikil Quddoosil 'Azeezil Hakeem
ayahs.2: Huwal lazee ba'asa fil ummiyyeena Rasoolam min hum yatloo 'alaihim aayaatihee wa
ayahs.3: Wa aakhareena minhum lammaa yalhaqoo bihim wa huwal 'azeezul hakeem
ayahs.4: Zaalika fadlul laahi yu'teehi many-yashaaa; wallaahu zul fadlil 'azeem
ayahs.5: Masalul lazeena hum milut tawraata summa lam yahmiloohaa kamasalil himaari yah milu
ayahs.6: Qul yaaa ayyuhal lazeena haadoo in za'amtum annakum awliyaaa'u lillaahi min doonin naasi
ayahs.7: Wa laa yatamannaw nahooo abadam bimaa qaddamat aydeehim; wallaahu 'aleemum biz
ayahs.8: Qul innal mawtal lazee tafirroona minhu fa innahoo mulaaqeekum summa turaddoona ilaa
ayahs.9: Yaaa ayyuhal lazeena aamanoo izaa noodiya lis-Salaati miny yawmil Jumu'ati fas'aw ilaa zikril
ayahs.10: Fa-izaa qudiyatis Salaatu fantashiroo fil ardi wabtaghoo min fadlil laahi wazkurul laaha kaseeral
ayahs.11: Wa izaa ra'aw tijaaratan aw lahwanin faddooo ilaihaa wa tarakooka qaaa'imaa; qul maa 'indal

ayahs.1: Izaa jaaa'akal munaafiqoona qaaloo nashhadu innaka la rasoolul laah; wallaahu ya'lamu innaka
ayahs.2: Ittakhazoo aymaanahum junnatan fasaddoo 'an sabeelil laah; innahum saaa'a maa kaanoo
ayahs.3: Zaalika bi annahum aamanoo summa kafaroo fatubi'a 'alaa quloobihim fahum laa yafqahoon
ayahs.4: Wa izaa ra aytahum tu'jibuka ajsaamuhum wa iny yaqooloo tasma' liqawlihim ka'annahum
ayahs.5: Wa izaa qeela lahum ta'aalaw yastaghfir lakum rasoolul laahi lawwaw ru'oo sahum wa ra
ayahs.6: Sawaaa'un 'alaihim as taghfarta lahum am lam tastaghfir lahum lany yaghfiral laahu lahum; innal
ayahs.7: Humul lazeena yaqooloona laa tunfiqoo 'alaa man inda Rasoolil laahi hatta yanfaddoo; wa
ayahs.8: Yaqooloona la'ir raja'naaa ilal madeenati la yukhrijannal a'azzu minhal azall; wa lillaahil 'izzatu
ayahs.9: Yaaa ayyuhal lazeena aamanoo la tulhikum amwaalukum wa laa awlaadukum 'anzikril laah; wa
ayahs.10: Wa anfiqoo mim maa razaqnaakum min qabli any-ya'tiya ahadakumul mawtu fa yaqoola rabbi

ayahs.1: Yusabbihu lillaahi maa fis samaawaati wa maa fil ardi lahul mulku wa lahul hamd, wa Huwa 'alaa
ayahs.2: Huwal lazee khalaqakum faminkum kaafirunw wa min kum mu'min ; wallaahu bimaa ta'maloona
ayahs.3: Khalaqas samaawaati wal arda bilhaqqi wa sawwarakum fa ahsana suwarakum wa ilaihil
ayahs.4: Ya'lamu maa fis samaawaati wal ardi wa ya'lamu maa tusirroona wa maa tu'linoon; wallaahu
ayahs.5: Alam ya'tikum naba'ul lazeena kafaroo min qablu fazaaqoo wabaala amrihim wa lahum 'azaabun
ayahs.6: Zaalika bi annahoo kaanat ta'teehim Rusuluhum bilbaiyinaati faqaaloo a basharuny
ayahs.7: Za'amal lazeena kafarooo al-lany yub'asoo; qul balaa wa rabbee latub'asunna summa
ayahs.8: Fa-aaminoo billaahi wa rasoolihee wannooril lazeee anzalnaa; wallaahu bima ta'maloona
ayahs.9: Yawma yajma'ukum li yawmil jam'i zaalika yawmut taghaabun; wa many-yumim billaahi wa
ayahs.10: Wallazeena kafaroo wa kazzaboo bi aayaaatinaaa ulaaa'ika ashaabun naari khaalideena feehaa
ayahs.11: Maaa asaaba mim musee batin illaa bi-iznil laah; wa many yu'mim billaahi yahdi qalbah;
ayahs.12: Wa atee'ul laaha wa atee'ur Rasool; fa in tawallaitum fa innamaa 'alaa Rasoolinal balaaghul
ayahs.13: Allaahu laaa ilaaha illaa Hoo; wa 'alal laahi falyata wakkalil mu'minoon
ayahs.14: Yaaa ayyuhal lazeena aamanooo inna min azwaaji kum wa awlaadikum 'aduwwal lakum
ayahs.15: Innamaa amwaalukum wa awlaadukum fitnah; wallaahu 'indahooo ajrun 'azeem
ayahs.16: Fattaqul laaha mastata'tum wasma'oo wa atee'oo wa anfiqoo khairal li anfusikum; wa many-
ayahs.17: In tuqridul laaha qardan hasanany yudaaifhu lakum wa yaghfir lakum; wallaahu Shakoorun

ayahs.1: Yaaa ayyuhan nabiyyu izaa tallaqtummun nisaaa'a fatalliqoohunna li'iddatihinna wa ahsul'iddata
ayahs.2: Fa izaa balaghna ajalahunna fa amsikoohunna bima'roofin aw faariqoohunna bima'roofinw wa
ayahs.3: Wa yarzuqhu min haisu laa yahtasib; wa many yatawakkal 'alal laahi fahuwa hasbuh; innal laaha
ayahs.4: Wallaaa'ee ya'isna minal maheedi min nisaaa 'ikum inir tabtum fa'iddatuhunna salaasatu
ayahs.5: Zaalika amrul laahi anzalahoo ilaikum; wa many yattaqil laaha yukaf fir 'anhu saiyi aatihee wa
ayahs.6: Askinoohunna min haisu sakantum minw wujdikum wa laa tudaaarroohunna litudaiyiqoo
ayahs.7: Liyunfiq zoo sa'atim min sa'atih; wa man qudira 'alaihi rizquhoo falyunfiq mimmaaa aataahul
ayahs.8: Wa ka ayyim min qaryatin 'atat 'an amri Rabbihaa wa Rusulihee fahaasabnaahaa hisaaban
ayahs.9: Fazaaqat wabbala amrihaa wa kaana 'aaqibatu amrihaa khusraa
ayahs.10: A'addal laahu lahum 'azaaban shadeeda; fattaqul laaha yaaa ulil albaab illazeena aammanoo;
ayahs.11: Rasoolany yatloo 'alaikum aayaatil laahi mubaiyinaatil liyukhrijal lazeena aamanoo wa 'amilus
ayahs.12: Allaahul lazee khalaqa Sab'a Samaawaatinw wa minal ardi mislahunna yatanazzalul amru

ayahs.1: Yaaa ayyuhan nabiyyu lima tuharrimu maaa ahallal laahu laka tabtaghee mardaata azwaajik;
ayahs.2: Qad faradal laahu lakum tahillata aymaanikum; wallaahu mawlaakum wa huwal 'aleemul
ayahs.3: Wa iz asarran nabiyyu ilaa ba'di azwaajihee hadeesan falammaa nabba at bihee wa azharahul
ayahs.4: In tatoobaaa ilal laahi faqad saghat quloobukumaa wa in tazaaharaa 'alaihi fa innal laaha huwa
ayahs.5: 'Asaa rabbuhooo in tallaqakunna anyyubdilahooo azwaajan khairam minkunna muslimaatim
ayahs.6: Yaaa ayyuhal lazeena aamanoo qooo anfusakum wa ahleekum naaranw waqoodu han naasu
ayahs.7: Yaaa ayyuhal lazeena kafaroo la ta'tazirul yawma innamaa tujzawna maa kuntum ta'maloon
ayahs.8: Yaaa ayyuhal lazeena aamanoo toobooo ilal laahi tawbatan nasoohan 'asaa rabbukum any-
ayahs.9: Yaaa ayyuhan nabiyyu jaahidil kuf faara walmunaa-fiqeena waghluz 'alaihim; wa ma'waahum
ayahs.10: Darabal laahu masalal lillazeena kafarum ra ata Noohinw wamra ata Loot, kaanataa tahta
ayahs.11: Wa darabal laahu masalal lil lezeena aamanumra ata Fir'awn; iz qaalat rab bibni lee 'indaka
ayahs.12: Wa Maryamab nata 'Imraanal lateee ahsanat farjahaa fanafakhnaa feehee mir roohinaa wa

ayahs.1: Tabaarakal lazee biyadihil mulku wa huwa 'alaa kulli shai-in qadeer
ayahs.2: Allazee khalaqal mawta walhayaata liyabluwakum ayyukum ahsanu 'amalaa; wa huwal 'azeezul
ayahs.3: Allazee khalaqa sab'a samaawaatin tibaaqa; maa taraa fee khalqir rahmaani min tafaawut farji'il
ayahs.4: Summar ji'il basara karrataini yanqalib ilaikal basaru khaasi'anw wa huwa haseer
ayahs.5: Wa laqad zaiyannas samaaa'ad dunyaa bimasaa beeha wa ja'alnaahaa rujoomal lish
ayahs.6: Wa lillazeena kafaroo bi rabbihim 'azaabu jahannama wa bi'sal maseer
ayahs.7: Izaaa ulqoo feehaa sami'oo lahaa shaheeqanw wa hiya tafoor
ayahs.8: Takaadu tamayyazu minal ghaizz kullamaaa ulqiya feehaa fawjun sa alahum khazanatuhaaa
ayahs.9: Qaaloo balaa qad jaaa'anaa nazeerun fakazzabnaa wa qulnaa maa nazzalal laahu min shai in in
ayahs.10: Wa qaaloo law kunnaa nasma'u awna'qilu maa kunnaa feee as haabis sa'eer
ayahs.11: Fa'tarafoo bizambihim fasuhqal li as haabis sa'eer
ayahs.12: Innal lazeena yakhshawna rabbahum bilghaibi lahum maghfiratunw wa ajrun kabeer
ayahs.13: Wa asirroo qawlakum awijharoo bih; innahoo 'aleemum bizaatis sudoor
ayahs.14: Alaa ya'lamu man khalaqa wa huwal lateeful khabeer
ayahs.15: Huwal lazee ja'ala lakumul arda zaloolan famshoo fee manaakibihaa wa kuloo mir rizqih; wa
ayahs.16: 'A-amintum man fissamaaa'i aiyakhsifa bi kumul arda fa izaa hiya tamoor
ayahs.17: Am amintum man fissamaaa'i ai yursila 'alaikum haasiban fasata'lamoona kaifa nazeer
ayahs.18: Wa laqad kazzabal lazeena min qablihim fakaifa kaana nakeer
ayahs.19: Awalam yaraw ilat tairi fawqahum saaaf faatinw wa yaqbidn; maa yumsikuhunna il'lar rahmaan;
ayahs.20: Amman haazal lazee huwa jundul lakum yansurukum min doonir rahmaan; inilkaafiroona illaa
ayahs.21: Amman haazal lazee yarzuqukum in amsaka rizqah; bal lajjoo fee 'utuwwinw wa nufoor
ayahs.22: Afamai yamshee mukibban 'alaa wajhihee ahdaaa ammany yamshee sawiyyan 'alaa siratim
ayahs.23: Qul huwal lazee ansha akum wa ja'ala lakumus sam'a wal absaara wal af'idata qaleelam maa
ayahs.24: Qul huwal lazee zara akum fil ardi wa ilaihi tuhsharoon
ayahs.25: Wa yaqooloona mataa haazal wa'du in kuntum saadiqeen
ayahs.26: Qul innamal 'ilmu 'indallaahi wa innamaaa ana nazeerum mubeen
ayahs.27: Falammaa ra-awhu zulfatan seee'at wujoohul lazeena kafaroo wa qeela haazal lazee kuntum
ayahs.28: Qul ara'aytum in ahlaka niyal laahu wa mam ma'iya aw rahimanaa famai-yujeerul kaafireena min
ayahs.29: Qul huwar rahmaanu aamannaa bihee wa 'alaihi tawakkalnaa fasata'lamoona man huwa fee

ayahs.3: Wa inna laka la ajran ghaira mamnoon
ayahs.4: Wa innaka la'alaa khuluqin 'azeem
ayahs.5: Fasatubsiru wa yubsiroon
ayahs.6: Bi ayyikumul maftoon
ayahs.7: Innaa Rabbaka Huwa a'lamu biman dalla 'an sabeelihee wa Huwa a'lamu bilmuhtadeen
ayahs.8: Falaa tuti'il mukazzibeen
ayahs.9: Waddoo law tudhinu fa-yudhinoon
ayahs.10: Wa laa tuti' kulla hallaa fim maheen
ayahs.11: Hammaazim mash shaaa'im binameem
ayahs.12: Mannaa'il lilkhairi mu'tadin aseem
ayahs.13: 'Utullim ba'da zaalika zaneem
ayahs.14: An kaana zaa maalinw-wa baneen
ayahs.15: Izaa tutlaa 'alaihi aayaatunaa qaala asaateerul awwaleen
ayahs.16: Sanasimuhoo 'alal khurtoom
ayahs.17: Innaa balawnaahum kamaa balawnaaa As-haabal jannati iz 'aqsamoo la-yasri munnahaa
ayahs.18: Wa laa yastasnoon
ayahs.19: Fataafa 'alaihaa taaa'i fum mir rabbika wa hum naaa'imoon
ayahs.20: Fa asbahat kassareem
ayahs.21: Fatanaadaw musbiheen
ayahs.22: Anighdoo 'alaa harsikum in kuntum saarimeen
ayahs.23: Fantalaqoo wa hum yatakhaafatoon
ayahs.24: Al laa yadkhulannahal yawma 'alaikum miskeen
ayahs.25: Wa ghadaw 'alaa hardin qaadireen
ayahs.26: Falammaa ra awhaa qaalooo innaa ladaaalloon
ayahs.27: Bal nahnu mahroomoon
ayahs.28: Qaala awsatuhum alam aqul lakum law laa tusabbihoon
ayahs.29: Qaaloo subhaana rabbinaaa innaa kunnaa zaalimeen
ayahs.30: Fa aqbala ba'duhum 'alaa ba'diny yatalaawamoon
ayahs.31: Qaaloo yaa wailanaaa innaa kunnaa taagheen
ayahs.32: 'Asaa rabbunaaa any yubdilanaa khairam minhaaa innaaa ilaa rabbinaa raaghiboon
ayahs.33: Kazaalikal azaab, wa la'azaabul aakhirati akbar; law kaanoo ya'lamoon
ayahs.34: Inna lilmuttaqeena 'inda rabbihim jannaatin na'eem
ayahs.35: Afanaj'alul muslimeena kalmujrimeen
ayahs.36: Maa lakum kaifa tahkumoon
ayahs.37: Am lakum kitaabun feehi tadrusoon
ayahs.38: Inna lakum feehi lamaa takhaiyaroon
ayahs.39: Am lakum aymaanun 'alainaa baalighatun ilaa yawmil qiyaamati inna lakum lamaa tahkumoon
ayahs.40: Salhum ayyuhum bizaa lika za'eem
ayahs.41: Am lahum shurakaaa'u fal ya'too bishurakaaa 'ihim in kaanoo saadiqeen
ayahs.42: Yawma yukshafu 'an saaqinw wa yud'awna ilas sujoodi falaa yastatee'oon
ayahs.43: Khaashi'atan absaaruhum tarhaquhum zillatunw wa qad kaanoo yud'awna ilassujoodi wa hum
ayahs.44: Fazarnee wa many yukazzibu bihaazal hadeesi sanastad rijuhum min haisu laa ya'lamoon
ayahs.45: Wa umlee lahum; inna kaidee mateen
ayahs.46: Am tas'aluhum ajran fahum min maghramin musqaloon
ayahs.48: Fasbir lihukmi rabbika wa laa takun kasaahibil hoot; iz naadaa wa huwa makzoom
ayahs.49: Law laaa an tadaara kahoo ni'matum mir rabbihee lanubiza bil'araaa'i wa huwa mazmoom
ayahs.50: Fajtabaahu rabbuhoo faja'alahoo minas saaliheen
ayahs.51: Wa iny-yakaadul lazeena kafaroo la-yuzliqoonaka biabsaarihim lammaa sami'uz-Zikra wa

ayahs.3: Wa maaa adraaka mal haaaqqah
ayahs.4: Kazzabat samoodu wa 'Aadum bil qaari'ah
ayahs.5: Fa-ammaa Samoodu fa uhlikoo bittaaghiyah
ayahs.6: Wa ammaa 'Aadun fa uhlikoo bi reehin sarsarin 'aatiyah
ayahs.7: Sakkhara haa 'alaihim sab'a la yaalinw wa samaaniyata ayyaamin husooman fataral qawma
ayahs.8: Fahal taraa lahum min baaqiyah
ayahs.9: Wa jaaa'a Firawnu wa man qablahoo wal mu'tafikaatu bil khaati'ah
ayahs.10: Fa 'asaw Rasoola Rabbihim fa akhazahum akhzatar raabiyah
ayahs.11: Innaa lammaa taghal maaa'u hamalnaakum fil jaariyah
ayahs.12: Li naj'alahaa lakum tazki ratanw-wa ta'iyahaa uzununw waa'iyah
ayahs.13: Fa izaa nufikha fis soori nafkhatunw waahidah
ayahs.14: Wa humilatil ardu wal jibaalu fadukkataa dakkatanw waahidah
ayahs.15: Fa yawma'izinw waqa'atil waaqi'ah
ayahs.16: Wanshaqqatis samaaa'u fahiya yawma 'izinw-waahiyah
ayahs.17: Wal malaku 'alaaa arjaaa'ihaa; wa yahmilu 'Arsha Rabbika fawqahum yawma'izin samaaniyah
ayahs.18: Yawma'izin tu'radoona laa takhfaa min kum khaafiyah
ayahs.19: Fa ammaa man ootiya kitaabahoo biyameenihee fa yaqoolu haaa'umuq ra'oo kitaabiyah
ayahs.20: Innee zannantu annee mulaaqin hisaabiyah
ayahs.21: Fahuwa fee 'eeshatir raadiyah
ayahs.22: Fee jannnatin 'aaliyah
ayahs.23: Qutoofuhaa daaniyah
ayahs.24: Kuloo washraboo haneee'am bimaaa aslaftum fil ayyaamil khaliyah
ayahs.25: Wa ammaa man ootiya kitaabahoo bishimaalihee fa yaqoolu yaalaitanee lam oota kitaaabiyah
ayahs.26: Wa lam adri maa hisaabiyah
ayahs.27: Yaa laitahaa kaanatil qaadiyah
ayahs.28: Maaa aghnaa 'annee maaliyah
ayahs.29: Halaka 'annee sultaaniyah
ayahs.30: Khuzoohu faghullooh
ayahs.31: Summal Jaheema sallooh
ayahs.32: Summa fee silsilatin zar'uhaa sab'oona ziraa'an faslukooh
ayahs.33: Innahoo kaana laa yu'minu billaahil 'Azeem
ayahs.34: Wa laa yahuddu 'alaa ta'aamil miskeen
ayahs.35: Falaysa lahul yawma haahunaa hameem
ayahs.36: Wa laa ta'aamun illaa min ghisleen
ayahs.37: Laa ya'kuluhooo illal khaati'oon
ayahs.38: Falaaa uqsimu bimaa tubsiroon
ayahs.39: Wa maa laa tubsiroon
ayahs.40: Innahoo laqawlu Rasoolin kareem
ayahs.41: Wa maa huwa biqawli shaa'ir; qaleelan maa tu'minoon
ayahs.42: Wa laa biqawli kaahin; qaleelan maa tazakkaroon
ayahs.43: Tanzeelum mir rabbil 'aalameen
ayahs.44: Wa law taqawwala 'alainaa ba'dal aqaaweel
ayahs.45: La-akhaznaa minhu bilyameen
ayahs.46: Summa laqata'naa minhul wateen
ayahs.47: Famaa minkum min ahadin'anhu haajizeen
ayahs.49: Wa inna lana'lamu anna minkum mukazzibeen
ayahs.50: Wa innahu lahasratun 'alal kaafireen
ayahs.51: Wa innahoo lahaqqul yaqeen

ayahs.3: Minal laahi zil ma'aarij
ayahs.4: Ta'rujul malaaa'ikatu war Roohu ilaihi fee yawmin kaana miqdaaruhoo khamseena alfa sanah
ayahs.5: Fasbir sabran jameelaa
ayahs.6: Inaahum yarawnahoo ba'eedaa
ayahs.7: Wa naraahu qareebaa
ayahs.8: Yawma takoonus samaaa'u kalmuhl
ayahs.9: Wa takoonul jibaalu kal'ihn
ayahs.10: Wa laa yas'alu hameemun hameemaa
ayahs.11: Yubassaroonahum; ya waddul mujrimu law yaftadee min 'azaabi yawmi izin bibaneeh
ayahs.12: Wa saahibatihee wa akheeh
ayahs.13: Wa faseelathil latee tu'weeh
ayahs.14: Wa man fil ardi jamee'an summa yunjeeh
ayahs.15: Kallaa innahaa lazaa
ayahs.16: Nazzaa'atal lishshawaa
ayahs.17: Tad'oo man adbara wa tawallaa
ayahs.18: Wa jama'a fa aw'aa
ayahs.19: Innal insaana khuliqa haloo'aa
ayahs.20: Izaa massahush sharru jazoo'aa
ayahs.21: Wa izaa massahul khairu manoo'aa
ayahs.22: Illal musalleen
ayahs.23: Allazeena hum 'alaa Salaatihim daaa'imoon
ayahs.24: Wallazeena feee amwaalihim haqqun ma'loom
ayahs.25: Lissaaa 'ili walmahroom
ayahs.26: Wallazeena yusaddiqoona bi yawmid Deen
ayahs.27: Wallazeena hum min 'azaabi Rabbihim mushfiqoon
ayahs.28: Inna 'azaaba Rabbihim ghairu ma' moon
ayahs.29: Wallazeena hum li furoojihim haafizoon
ayahs.30: Illaa 'alaaa azwaajihim aw maa malakat aymaanuhum fa innahum ghairu maloomeen
ayahs.31: Famanib taghaa waraaa'a zaalika fa ulaaa'ika humul 'aadoon
ayahs.32: Wallazeena hum li amaanaatihim wa 'ahdihim raa'oon
ayahs.33: Wallazeena hum bi shahaadaatihim qaaa'imoon
ayahs.34: Wallazeena hum 'alaa salaatihim yuhaafizoon
ayahs.35: Ulaaa'ika fee jannaatim mukramoon
ayahs.36: Famaa lil lazeena kafaroo qibalaka muhti'een
ayahs.37: 'Anil yameeni wa 'anish shimaali 'izeen
ayahs.38: Ayatma'u kullum ri'im minhum anyyudkhala jannata Na'eem
ayahs.39: Kallaaa innaa khalaq nahum mimmaa ya'lamoon
ayahs.40: Falaaa uqsimu bi Rabbil mashaariqi wal maghaaribi innaa laqaadiroon
ayahs.41: 'Alaaa an nubaddila khairan minhum wa maa nahnu bi masbooqeen
ayahs.42: Fazarhum yakhoodoo wa yal'aboo hattaa yulaaqoo yawma humul lazee yoo'adoon
ayahs.43: Yawma yakhrujoona minal ajdaasi siraa'an ka anna hum ilaa nusubiny yoofidoon

ayahs.1: Innaaa arsalnaa Noohan ilaa qawmihee an anzir qawmaka min qabli any yaatiyahum 'azaabun
ayahs.2: Qaala yaa qawmi innee lakum nazeerum mubeen
ayahs.3: Ani'-budul laaha watta qoohu wa atee'oon
ayahs.4: Yaghfir lakum min zunoobikum wa yu'akhkhirkum ilaaa ajalim musammaa; innaa ajalal laahi izaa
ayahs.5: Qaala rabbi innee da'awtu qawmee lailanw wa naharaa
ayahs.6: Falam yazid hum du'aaa 'eee illaa firaaraa
ayahs.7: Wa inee kullamaa da'awtuhum litaghfira lahum ja'alooo asaabi'ahum fee aazaanihim
ayahs.8: Summa innee da'aw tuhum jihaara
ayahs.9: Summaa inneee a'lantu lahum wa asrartu lahum israaraa
ayahs.10: Faqultus taghfiroo Rabbakum innahoo kaana Ghaf faaraa
ayahs.11: Yursilis samaaa'a 'alaikum midraaraa
ayahs.12: Wa yumdidkum bi am waalinw wa baneena wa yaj'al lakum Jannaatinw wa yaj'al lakum
ayahs.13: Maa lakum laa tarjoona lillaahi waqaaraa
ayahs.14: Wa qad khalaqakum at waaraa
ayahs.15: Alam taraw kaifa khalaqal laahu sab'a samaawaatin tibaaqaa
ayahs.16: Wa ja'alal qamara feehinna nooranw wa ja'alash shamsa siraajaa
ayahs.17: Wallaahu ambatakum minal ardi nabaataa
ayahs.18: Summa yu'eedukum feehaa wa yukhrijukum ikhraajaa
ayahs.19: Wallaahu ja'ala lakumul arda bisaataa
ayahs.20: Litaslukoo minhaa subulan fijaajaa
ayahs.21: Qaala Noohur Rabbi innahum 'asawnee wattaba'oo mal lam yazid hu maaluhoo wa waladuhooo
ayahs.22: Wa makaroo makran kubbaaraa
ayahs.23: Wa qaaloo laa tazarunna aalihatakum wa laa tazarunna W addanw wa laa Suwaa'anw wa laa
ayahs.24: Wa qad adalloo kaseera; wa laa tazidiz zaalimeena illaa dalaalaa
ayahs.25: Mimmaa khateee' aatihim ughriqoo fa udkhiloo Naaran falam yajidoo lahum min doonil laahi
ayahs.26: Wa qaala Noohur Rabbi laa tazar 'alal ardi minal kaafireena daiyaaraa
ayahs.27: Innaka in tazarhum yudil loo 'ibaadaka wa laa yalidooo illaa faajiran kaf faaraa
ayahs.28: Rabbigh fir lee wa liwaa lidaiya wa liman dakhala baitiya mu'minanw wa lil mu'mineena wal

ayahs.1: Qul oohiya ilaiya annna hustama'a nafarum minal jinni faqaalooo innaa sami'naa quraanan ajaba
ayahs.2: Yahdeee ilar rushdi fa aamannaa bihee wa lan nushrika bi rabbinaaa 'ahada
ayahs.3: Wa annahoo Ta'aalaa jaddu Rabbinaa mat'takhaza saahibatanw wa laa walada
ayahs.4: Wa annahoo kaana yaqoolu safeehunaa 'al allahi shatata
ayahs.5: Wa annaa zanannaaa al lan taqoolal insu wal jinnu 'al allahi kaziba
ayahs.6: Wa annahoo kaana rijaalum minal insi ya'oozoona bi rijaalim minal jinni fa zaadoohum rahaqa
ayahs.7: Wa annahum zannoo kamaa zanantum al lany yab'asal laahu 'ahada
ayahs.8: Wa annaa lamasnas samaaa'a fa wajadnaahaa muli'at harasan shadeedanw wa shuhuba
ayahs.9: Wa annaa kunnaa naq'udu minhaa maqaa'ida lis'sam'i famany yastami'il 'aana yajid lahoo
ayahs.10: Wa annaa laa nadreee asharrun ureeda biman fil ardi 'am 'araada bihim rabbuhum rashada
ayahs.11: Wa annaa minnas saalihoona wa minnaa doona zaalika kunnaa taraaa'iqa qidada
ayahs.12: Wa annaa zanan naaa al lan nu'jizal laaha fil ardi wa lan nu'jizahoo haraba
ayahs.13: Wa annaa lammaa sami'nal hudaaa aamannaa bihee famany yu'min bi rabbihee falaa yakhaafu
ayahs.14: Wa annaa minnal muslimoona wa minnal qaasitoona faman aslama fa ulaaa'ika taharraw
ayahs.15: Wa ammal qaasitoona fa kaanoo li jahannama hataba
ayahs.16: Wa alla wis taqaamoo 'alat tareeqati la asqaynaahum maa'an ghadaqa
ayahs.17: Linaftinahum feeh; wa many yu'rid 'an zikri rabbihee yasluk hu 'azaaban sa'ada
ayahs.18: Wa annal masaajida lil laahi falaa tad'oo ma'al laahi 'ahada
ayahs.19: Wa annahoo lammaa qaama 'abdul laahi yad'oohu kaadoo yakoonoona 'alaihi libada
ayahs.20: Qul innamaaa ad'oo rabbee wa laaa ushriku biheee 'ahada
ayahs.21: Qul innee laaa amliku lakum darranw wa laa rashada
ayahs.22: Qul innee lany yujeeranee minal laahi 'ahadunw , wa lan ajida min doonihee multahada
ayahs.23: Illaa balaagham minal laahi wa risaalaatih; wa many ya'sil laaha wa rasoolahoo fa inna lahoo
ayahs.24: Hattaaa izaa ra aw maa yoo'adoona fasaya'lamoona man ad'afu naasiranw wa aqallu 'adada
ayahs.25: Qul in adreee a qareebum maa too'adoona am yaj'alu lahoo rabbeee 'amada
ayahs.26: 'Aalimul ghaibi falaa yuzhiru alaa ghaibiheee 'ahada
ayahs.27: Illaa manir tadaa mir rasoolin fa innahoo yasluku min baini yadaihi wa min khalfihee rasada
ayahs.28: Liya'lama an qad ablaghoo risaalaati rabbihim wa ahaata bi maa ladaihim wa ahsaa kulla shai'in

ayahs.3: Nisfahooo awinqus minhu qaleelaa
ayahs.4: Aw zid 'alaihi wa rattilil Qur'aana tarteela
ayahs.5: Innaa sanulqee 'alaika qawlan saqeelaa

ayahs.15: Innaa arsalnaaa ilaikum rasoolan shaahidan 'aleykum kamaaa arsalnaaa ilaa Fir'awna rasoolaa

ayahs.18: Assamaaa'u munfatirum bih; kaana wa'duhoo maf'oola
ayahs.19: Inna haazihee tazkira; fa man shaaa'at takhaza ilaa Rabbihee sabeelaa
ayahs.20: Inna Rabbaka ya'lamu annaka taqoomu adnaa min sulusa yil laili wa nisfahoo wa sulusahoo wa

ayahs.1: Hal ataa 'alal insaani heenum minad dahri lam yakun shai'am mazkooraa
ayahs.2: Innaa khalaqnal insaana min nutfatin amshaajin nabta leehi faja'alnaahu samee'am baseeraa
ayahs.3: Innaa hadainaahus sabeela immaa shaakiranw wa immaa kafoora
ayahs.4: Innaaa a'tadnaa lilkaa fireena salaasila wa aghlaalanw wa sa'eeraa
ayahs.5: Innal abraara yashra boona min kaasin kaana mizaa juhaa kaafooraa
ayahs.6: 'Aynany yashrabu bihaa 'ibaadul laahi yufajjiroonahaa tafjeeraa
ayahs.7: Yoofoona binnazri wa yakhaafoona yawman kaana sharruhoo mustateeraa
ayahs.8: Wa yut''imoonat ta'aama 'alaa hubbihee miskeenanw wa yateemanw wa aseeraa
ayahs.9: Innaamaa nut'imukum li wajhil laahi laa nureedu minkum jazaaa'anw wa laa shukooraa
ayahs.10: Innaa nakhaafu mir Rabbinna Yawman 'aboosan qamtareeraa
ayahs.11: Fa waqaahumul laahu sharra zaalikal yawmi wa laqqaahum nadratanw wa surooraa
ayahs.12: Wa jazaahum bimaa sabaroo jannatanw wa hareeraa
ayahs.13: Muttaki'eena feeha 'alal araaa 'iki laa yarawna feehaa shamsanw wa laa zamhareeraa
ayahs.14: Wa daaniyatan 'alaihim zilaaluhaa wa zullilat qutoofu haa tazleela
ayahs.15: Wa yutaafu 'alaihim bi aaniyatim min fiddatinw wa akwaabin kaanat qawaareeraa
ayahs.16: Qawaareera min fiddatin qaddaroohaa taqdeeraa
ayahs.17: Wa yuskawna feehaa ka'asan kaana mizaajuhaa zanjabeelaa
ayahs.18: 'Aynan feeha tusammaa salsabeelaa
ayahs.19: Wa yatoofu 'alaihim wildaanum mukhalladoona izaa ra aytahum hasibtahum lu'lu 'am mansoora
ayahs.20: Wa izaa ra ayta samma ra ayta na'eemanw wa mulkan kabeera
ayahs.21: 'Aaliyahum siyaabu sundusin khudrunw wa istabraq, wa hullooo asaawira min fiddatinw wa
ayahs.22: Innaa haazaa kaana lakum jazaa 'anw wa kaana sa'yukum mashkooraa
ayahs.23: Innaa nahnu nazzalnaa 'alaikal quraana tanzeelaa
ayahs.24: Fasbir lihukmi Rabbika wa laa tuti' minhum aasiman aw kafooraa
ayahs.25: Wazkuris ma Rabbika bukratanw wa aseelaa
ayahs.26: Wa minal laili fasjud lahoo wa sabbihhu lailan taweelaa
ayahs.27: Inna haaa'ulaa'i yuhibboona 'aajilata wa yazaroona waraaa'ahum yawman saqeelaa
ayahs.28: Nahnu khalaqnaahum wa shadadnaaa asrahum wa izaa shi'naa baddalnaaa amsaala hum
ayahs.29: Inna haazihee tazkiratun fa man shaaa'at takhaza ilaa rabbihee sabeela
ayahs.30: Wa maa tashaaa'oona illaa anyyashaaa'al laah; innal laahaa kaana'Aleeman Hakeema

ayahs.2: Alam yaj'al kai dahum fee tad leel
ayahs.3: Wa arsala 'alaihim tairan abaabeel
ayahs.4: Tar meehim bi hi jaaratim min sij jeel

ayahs.3: Faly'abudoo rabba haazal-bait
Wa la yahuddu 'alaa ta'aamil miskeen
ayahs.4: Fa wailul-lil musalleen
ayahs.5: Allazeena hum 'an salaatihim saahoon
ayahs.6: Allazeena hum yuraaa'oon

ayahs.3: Wa laaa antum 'aabidoona maaa a'bud
ayahs.4: Wa laaa ana 'abidum maa 'abattum
ayahs.5: Wa laaa antum 'aabidoona maaa a'bud

ayahs.2: Wa ra-aitan naasa yadkhuloona fee deenil laahi afwajaa
Maa aghnaa 'anhu maaluhoo wa ma kasab
ayahs.3: Sa-yaslaa naaran zaata lahab
ayahs.4: Wamra-atuhoo hammaa latal-hatab

ayahs.3: Lam yalid wa lam yoolad
Wa min sharri ghaasiqin izaa waqab
ayahs.4: Wa min sharrin-naf faa-saati fil 'uqad

147.name: Alhaqqu mir Rabbika falaa takoonana minal mumtareen
147.title: section 17

ayahs.148: Wa likullinw wijhatun huwa muwalleehaa fastabiqul khairaat; ayna maa takoonoo yaati
ayahs.149: Wa min haisu kharajta fawalli wajhaka shatral Masjidil Haraam; wa innahoo lalhaqqu mir Rabbik;
ayahs.150: Wa min haisu kharajta fawalli wajhaka shatral Masjidil Haraam; wa haisu maa kuntum fawalloo
ayahs.151: Kamaaa arsalnaa feekum Rasoolam minkum yatloo 'alaikum aayaatina wa yuzakkeekum wa

152.name: Fazkurooneee azkurkum washkuroo lee wa laa takfuroon
152.title: section 18

ayahs.153: Yaaa ayyuhal laazeena aamanus ta'eenoo bissabri was Salaah; innal laaha ma'as-saabireen
ayahs.154: Wa laa taqooloo limai yuqtalu fee sabeelil laahi amwaat; bal ahyaaa'unw wa laakil laa tash'uroon
ayahs.155: Wa lanablu wannakum bishai'im minal khawfi waljoo'i wa naqsim minal amwaali wal anfusi was
ayahs.156: Allazeena izaaa asaabathum museebatun qaalooo innaa lillaahi wa innaaa ilaihi raaji'oon
ayahs.157: Ulaaa'ika 'alaihim salawaatun mir Rabbihim wa rahma; wa ulaaa'ika humul muhtadoon
ayahs.158: Innas Safaa wal-Marwata min sha'aaa'iril laahi faman hajjal Baita awi'tamara falaa junaaha
ayahs.159: Innal lazeena yaktumoona maaa anzalnaa minal baiyinaati walhudaa mim ba'di maa
ayahs.160: Illal lazeena taaboo wa aslahoo wa baiyanoo fa ulaaa'ika atoobu 'alaihim; wa Anat Tawwaabur
ayahs.161: Innal lazeena kafaroo wamaa too wa hum kuf faarun ulaaa'ika 'alaihim la 'natul laahi
ayahs.162: khaalideena feeha laa yukhaf fafu 'anhumul 'azaabu wa laa hum yunzaroon

163.name: Wa ilaahukum illaahunw waahid, laaa ilaaha illaa Huwar Rahmaanur Raheem
163.title: section 19

ayahs.164: Inna fee khalqis samaawaati wal ardi wakhtilaafil laili wannahaari walfulkil latee tajree fil bahri
ayahs.165: Wa minan naasi mai yattakhizu min doonil laahi andaadai yuhibboonahum kahubbil laahi
ayahs.166: Iz tabarra al lazeenat tubi'oo minal lazeenattaba'oo wa ra awul 'azaaba wa taqatta'at bihimul
ayahs.167: Wa qaalal lazeenat taba'oo law anna lanaa karratan fanatabarra a minhum kamaa tabarra'oo
ayahs.168: Yaaa ayyuhan naasu kuloo mimmaa fil ardi halaalan taiyibanw wa laa tattabi'oo khutu waatish
ayahs.169: Innamaa yaamurukum bissooo'i walfahshaaa'i wa an taqooloo alal laahi maa laa ta'lamoon
ayahs.170: Wa izaa qeela lahumuttabi'oo maaa anzalal laahu qaaloo bal nattabi'u maaa alfainaa 'alaihi
ayahs.171: Wa masalul lazeena kafaroo kamasalil lazee yan'iqu bimaa laa yasma'u illaa du'aaa'anw wa
ayahs.172: Yaaa ayyuhal lazeena aamanoo kuloo min taiyibaati maa razaqnaakum washkuroo lillaahi in
ayahs.173: Innamaa harrama 'alaikumul maitata waddama wa lahmal khinzeeri wa maaa uhilla bihee
ayahs.174: Innal lazeena yaktumoona maaa anzalal laahu minal kitaabi wa yashtaroona bihee samanan
ayahs.175: Ulaaa'ikal lazeenash tarawud dalaalata bilhudaa wal'azaaba bilmaghfirah; famaaa asbarahum
ayahs.176: Zaalika bi annal laaha nazzalal kitaaba bilhaqq; wa innal lazeenakh talafoo fil kitaabi lafee
ayahs.177: Laisal birra an tuwalloo wujoohakum qibalal mashriqi walmaghribi wa laakinnal birra man
ayahs.178: Yaaa ayyuhal lazeena aamanoo kutiba alaikumul qisaasu fil qatlaa alhurru bilhurri wal'abdu
ayahs.179: Wa lakum fil qisaasi hayaatuny yaaa ulil albaabi la 'allakum tattaqoon
ayahs.180: Kutiba 'alaikum izaa hadara ahadakumul mawtu in taraka khairanil wasiyyatu lilwaalidaini wal
ayahs.181: Famam baddalahoo ba'da maa sami'ahoo fa innamaaa ismuhoo 'alallazeena yubaddi loonah;
ayahs.182: Faman khaafa mim moosin janafan aw isman fa aslaha bainahum falaaa ismaa 'alayh; innal
ayahs.183: Yaa ayyuhal lazeena aamanoo kutiba 'alaikumus Siyaamu kamaa kutiba 'alal lazeena min
ayahs.184: Ayyaamam ma'doodaat; faman kaana minkum mareedan aw'alaa safarin fa'iddatum min
ayahs.185: Shahru Ramadaanallazeee unzila feehil Qur'aanu hudal linnaasi wa baiyinaatim minal hudaa
ayahs.186: Wa izaa sa alaka 'ibaadee 'annnee fa innee qareebun ujeebu da'wataddaa'i izaa da'aani
ayahs.187: Uhilla lakum laylatas Siyaamir rafasu ilaa nisaaa'ikum; hunna libaasullakum wa antum
ayahs.188: Wa laa taakuloo amwaalakum bainakum bilbaatili wa tudloo bihaaa ilal hukkaami litaakuloo
ayahs.189: Yas'aloonaka 'anil ahillati qul hiya mawaaqeetu linnaasi wal Hajj; wa laisal birru bi an ta'tul
ayahs.190: Wa qaatiloo fee sabeelillaahil lazeena yuqaatiloonakum wa laa ta'tadooo; innal laaha laa
ayahs.191: Waqtuloohum haisu saqif tumoohum wa akhrijoohum min haisu akhrajookum; walfitnatu
ayahs.192: Fa ininn-tahaw fa innal laaha Ghafoorur Raheem
ayahs.193: Wa qaatiloohum hatta laa takoona fitnatunw wa yakoonad deenu lillaahi fa-inin tahaw falaa
ayahs.194: Ash Shahrul Haraamu bish Shahril Haraami wal hurumaatu qisaas; famani'tadaa 'alaikum
ayahs.195: Wa anfiqoo fee sabeelil laahi wa laa tulqoo bi aydeekum ilat tahlukati wa ahsinoo; innal laaha
ayahs.196: Wa atimmul Hajja wal Umarata lillaah; fain uhsirtum famas taisara minal hadyi walaa tahliqoo
ayahs.197: Al-Hajju ashhurum ma'-loomaat; faman farada feehinnal hajja falaa rafasa wa laa fusooqa wa
ayahs.198: Laisa 'alaikum junaahun an tabtaghoo fad lam mir rabbikum; fa izaaa afadtum min 'Arafaatin
ayahs.199: Summa afeedoo min haisu afaadan naasu wastagh firullaah; innal laaha Ghafoor ur-Raheem
ayahs.200: Fa-iza qadaitum manaa sikakum fazkurul laaha kazikrikum aabaaa'akum aw ashadda zikraa;
ayahs.201: Wa minhum mai yaqoolu rabbanaaa aatina fid dunyaa hasanatanw wa fil aakhirati hasanatanw
ayahs.202: Ulaaa'ika lahum naseebum mimmaa kasaboo; wal laahu saree'ul hisaab
ayahs.203: Wazkurul laaha feee ayyaamin ma'doodaatin; faman ta'ajjala fee yawmaini falaaa ismaa 'alaihi
ayahs.204: Wa minan naasi mai yu'jibuka qawluhoo fil hayaatid dunyaa wa yushhidul laaha 'alaa maa fee
ayahs.205: Wa izaa tawallaa sa'aa fil ardi liyufsida feeha wa yuhlikal harsa wannasl; wallaahu laa yuhibbul
ayahs.206: Wa izaa qeela lahuttaqil laaha akhazathul izzatu bil-ism; fahasbuhoo jahannam; wa labi'sal
ayahs.207: Wa minan naasi mai yashree nafsahub tighaaa'a mardaatil laah; wallaahu ra'oofum bil'ibaad
ayahs.208: Yaaa ayyuhal lazeena aamanud khuloo fis silmi kaaaf fatanw wa laa tattabi'oo khutuwaatish
ayahs.209: Fa in zalaltum minba'di maa jaaa'atkumul baiyinaatu fa'lamoo annallaaha 'Azeezun hakeem
ayahs.210: Hal yanzuroona illaaa ai ya'tiya humul laahu fee zulalim minal ghamaami walmalaaa'ikatu wa
ayahs.211: Sal Banee Israaa'eela kam aatainaahum min aayatim baiyinah; wa mai yubaddil ni'matal laahi
ayahs.212: Zuyyina lillazeena kafarul hayaatud dunyaa wa yaskharoona minal lazeena aamanoo;
ayahs.213: Kaanan naasu ummatanw waahidatan fab'asal laahun Nabiyyeena mubashshireena wa
ayahs.214: Am hasibtum an tadkhulul jannata wa lammaa yaa-tikum masalul lazeena khalaw min qablikum
ayahs.215: Yas'aloonaka maazaa yunfiqoona qul maaa anfaqtum min khairin falil waalidaini wal aqrabeena
ayahs.216: Kutiba alaikumulqitaalu wa huwa kurhullakum wa 'asaaa an takrahoo shai'anw wa huwa
ayahs.217: Yas'aloonaka 'anish Shahril Haraami qitaalin feehi qul qitaalun feehi kabeerunw wa saddun 'an
ayahs.218: Innal lazeena aamanoo wallazeena haajaroo wa jaahadoo fee sabeelil laahi ulaaa'ika yarjoona
ayahs.219: Yas'aloonaka 'anilkhamri walmaisiri qul feehimaaa ismun kabeerunw wa manaafi'u linnaasi wa
ayahs.220: Fid dunyaa wal aakhirah; wa yas'aloonaka 'anil yataamaa qul islaahullahum khayr , wa in
ayahs.221: Wa laatankihul mushrikaati hattaa yu'minn; wa la amatum mu'minatun khairum mim
ayahs.222: Wa yas'aloonaka 'anil maheedi qul huwa azan fa'tazilun nisaaa'a fil maheedi wa laa taqraboo
ayahs.223: Nisaaa'ukum harsullakum faatoo harsakum annaa shi'tum wa qaddimoo li anfusikum; wattaqul
ayahs.224: Wa laa taj'alul laaha 'urdatal li aymaanikum an tabarroo wa tattaqoo wa tuslihoo bainan naas;
ayahs.225: Laa yu'aakhi zukumul laahu billaghwi feee aymaa nikum wa laakiny yu'aakhi zukum bimaa
ayahs.226: Lillazeena yu'loona min nisaaa'ihim tarabbusu arba'ati ashhurin fain faaa'oo fa innal laaha
ayahs.227: Wa in 'azamut talaaqa fa innal laaha Samee'un 'Aleem
ayahs.228: Walmutallaqaatu yatarab basna bi anfusihinna salaasata qurooo'; wa laa yahillu lahunna ai
ayahs.229: Attalaaqu marrataani fa imsaakum bima'roofin aw tasreehum bi ihsaan; wa laa yahillu lakum an
ayahs.230: Fa in tallaqahaa falaa tahillu lahoo mim ba'du hattaa tankiha zawjan ghairah; fa in tallaqahaa
ayahs.231: Wa izaa tallaqtumun nisaaa'a fabalaghna ajala hunna fa amsikoohunna bima'roofin law sarrihoo
ayahs.232: Wa izaa tallaqtumun nisaaa'a fabalaghna ajalahunna falaa ta'duloo hunna ai yankihna azwaaja
ayahs.233: Walwaa lidaatu yurdi'na awlaada hunna hawlaini kaamilaini liman araada ai yutimmar radaa'ah;
ayahs.234: Wallazeena yutawaf fawna minkum wa yazaroona azwaajai yatarabbasna bi anfusihinna arba'ata
ayahs.235: Wa laa junaaha 'alaikum feema 'arradtum bihee min khitbatin nisaaa'i aw aknantum feee
ayahs.236: Laa junaaha 'alaikum in tallaqtumun nisaaa'a maa lam tamassoohunna aw tafridoo lahunna
ayahs.237: Wa in tallaqtumoohunna min qabli an tamassoohunna wa qad farad tum lahunna fareedatan
ayahs.238: Haafizoo 'alas salawaati was Salaatil W ustaa wa qoomoo lillaahi qaaniteen
ayahs.239: Fa in khiftum farijaalan aw rukbaanan fa izaaa amintum fazkurul laaha kamaa 'allamakum maa
ayahs.240: Wallazeena yutawaf fawna minkum wa yazaroona azwaajanw wasiyyatal li azwaajihim mataa'an
ayahs.241: Wa lilmutallaqaati mataa'um bilma'roofi haqqan 'alal muttaqeen

242.name: Kazaalika yubaiyinul laahu lakum aayaatihee la'allakum ta'qiloon
242.title: section 31

ayahs.243: Alam tara ilal lazeena kharajoo min diyaarihim wa hum uloofun hazaral mawti faqaaala lahumul
ayahs.244: Wa qaatiloo fee sabeelil laahi wa'lamooo annal laaha Samee'un 'Aleem
ayahs.245: Man zal lazee yuqridul laaha qardan hasanan fayudaa 'ifahoo lahoo ad'aafan kaseerah;
ayahs.246: Alam tara ilal malai mim Baneee Israaa'eela mim ba'di Moosaaa iz qaaloo li Nabiyyil lahumub
ayahs.247: Wa qaala lahum Nabiy yuhum innal laaha qad ba'asa lakum Taaloota malikaa; qaalooo annaa
ayahs.248: Wa qaala lahum Nabiyyuhum inna Aayata mulkiheee ai yaatiyakumut Taabootu feehi
ayahs.249: Falammaa fasala Taalootu biljunoodi qaala innal laaha mubtaleekum binaharin faman shariba
ayahs.250: Wa lammaa barazoo liJaaloota wa junoodihee qaaloo Rabbanaaa afrigh 'alainaa sabranw wa
ayahs.251: Fahazamoohum bi iznillaahi wa qatala Daawoodu jaaloota wa aataahul laahulmulka W al

252.name: Tilka Aayaatul laahi natloohaa 'alaika bilhaqq; wa innaka laminal mursaleen
252.title: End Juz 2

ayahs.253: Tilkar Rusulu faddalnaa ba'dahum 'alaa ba'd; minhum man kallamal laahu wa rafa'a ba'dahum
ayahs.254: Yaa ayyuhal lazeena aamanoo anfiqoo mimmaa razaqnaakum min qabli ai yaatiya yawmul laa
ayahs.255: Allahu laaa ilaaha illaa Huwal Haiyul Qaiyoom; laa taakhuzuhoo sinatunw wa laa nawm; lahoo
ayahs.256: Laaa ikraaha fid deeni qat tabaiyanar rushdu minal ghayy; famai yakfur bit Taaghooti wa yu'mim
ayahs.257: Allaahu waliyyul lazeena aamanoo yukhrijuhum minaz zulumaati ilan noori wallazeena kafarooo
ayahs.258: Alam tara ilal lazee Haaajja Ibraaheema fee Rabbiheee an aataahullaahul mulka iz qaala
ayahs.259: Aw kallazee marra 'alaa qaryatinw wa hiya khaawiyatun 'alaa 'urooshihaa qaala annaa yuhyee
ayahs.260: Wa iz qaala Ibraaheemu Rabbi arinee kaifa tuhyil mawtaa qaala awa lam tu'min qaala balaa wa
ayahs.261: Masalul lazeena yunfiqoona amwaalahum fee sabeelil laahi kamasali habbatin ambatat sab'a
ayahs.262: Allazeena yunfiqoona amwaalahum fee sabeelillaahi summa laa yutbi'oona maaa anfaqoo
ayahs.263: Qawlum ma'roofunw wa maghfiratun khairum min sadaqatiny yatba'uhaaa azaa; wallaahu
ayahs.264: Yaaa ayyuhal lazeena aamanoo laa tubtiloo sadaqaatikum bilmanni wal azaa kallazee yunfiqu
ayahs.265: Wa masalul lazeena yunfiqoona amwaalahu mubtighaaa'a mardaatil laahi wa tasbeetam min
ayahs.266: Ayawaddu ahadukum an takoona lahoo jannatum min nakheelinw wa a'naabin tajree min
ayahs.267: Yaaa 'ayyuhal lazeena aamanooo anfiqoo min taiyibaati maa kasabtum wa mimmaaa akhrajna
ayahs.268: Ash Shaitaanu ya'idukumul faqra wa ya'murukum bilfahshaaa'i wallaahu ya'idukum maghfiratam
ayahs.269: Yu'til Hikmata mai yashaaa'; wa mai yu'tal Hikmata faqad ootiya khairan kaseeraa; wa maa
ayahs.270: Wa maaa anfaqtum min nafaqatin aw nazartum min nazrin fa innal laaha ya'lamuh; wa maa
ayahs.271: In tubdus sadaqaati fani'immaa hiya wa in tukhfoohaa wa tu'toohal fuqaraaa'a fahuwa khayrul
ayahs.272: Laisa 'alaika hudaahum wa laakinnal laaha yahdee mai yashaaa'; wa maa tunfiqoo min khairin
ayahs.273: Lilfuqaraaa'il lazeena uhsiroo fee sabeelil laahi laa yastatee'oona darban fil ardi yah sabuhumul
ayahs.274: Allazeena yunfiqoona amwaalahum billaili wan nahaari sirranw wa 'alaaniyatan falahum ajruhum
ayahs.275: Allazeena yaakuloonar ribaa laa yaqoomoona illaa kamaa yaqoomul lazee yatakhabbatuhush
ayahs.276: Yamhaqul laahur ribaa wa yurbis sadaqaat; wallaahu laa yuhibbu kulla kaf faarin aseem
ayahs.277: Innal lazeena aamanoo wa amilus saalihaati wa aqaamus salaata wa aatawuz zakaata lahum
ayahs.278: Yaaa ayyuhal lazeena aamanut taqul laaha wa zaroo maa baqiya minar ribaaa in kuntum
ayahs.279: Fail lam taf'aloo faazanoo biharbim minal laahi wa Rasoolihee wa in tubtum falakum ru'oosu
ayahs.280: Wa in kaana zoo 'usratin fanaziratun ilaa maisarah; wa an tasaddaqoo khairul lakum in kuntum
ayahs.281: Wattaqoo yawman turja'oona feehi ilal laahi summa tuwaf faa kullu nafsim maa kasabat wa hum
ayahs.282: Yaa ayyuhal lazeena aamanoo izaa tadaayantum bidaiynin ilaa ajalimmusamman faktubooh;
ayahs.283: Wa in kuntum 'alaa safarinw wa lam tajidoo kaatiban farihaanum maqboodatun fa in amina
ayahs.284: Lillaahi maa fissamaawaati wa maa fil ard; wa in tubdoo maa feee anfusikum aw tukhfoohu
ayahs.285: Aamanar-Rasoolu bimaaa unzila ilaihi mir-Rabbihee walmu'minoon; kullun aamana billaahi wa
ayahs.286: Laa yukalliful-laahu nafsan illaa wus'ahaa; lahaa maa kasabat wa 'alaihaa maktasabat;

189.name: Wa lillaahi mulkus samaawaati wal ard; wallaahu 'alaa kulli shai'in Qadeer
189.title: section 19

ayahs.190: Inna fee khalqis samaawaati wal ardi wakhtilaafil laili wannahaari la Aayaatil liulil albaab
ayahs.191: Allazeena yazkuroonal laaha qiyaamanw-wa qu'oodanw-wa 'alaa juno obihim wa
ayahs.192: Rabbanaaa innaka man tudkhilin Naara faqad akhzai tahoo wa maa lizzaalimeena min ansaar
ayahs.193: Rabbanaaa innanaa sami'naa munaadiyai yunaadee lil eemaani an aaminoo bi Rabbikum fa
ayahs.194: Rabbanaa wa aatinaa maa wa'attanaa 'alaa Rusulika wa laa tukhzinaa Yawmal Qiyaamah;
ayahs.195: Fastajaaba lahum Rabbuhum annee laaa Udee'u 'amala 'aamilim minkum min zakarin aw unsaa
ayahs.196: Laa yaghurrannaka taqal lubul lazeena kafaroo fil bilaad
ayahs.197: Mataa'un qaleelun summa ma'waahum Jahannam; wa bi'sal mihaad
ayahs.198: Laakinil lazeenat taqaw Rabbahum lahum Jannnaatun tajree min tahtihal anhaaru khaalideena
ayahs.199: Wa inna min Ahlil Kitaabi lamai yu'minu billaahi wa maaa unzila ilaikum wa maaa unzila ilaihim
ayahs.200: Yaaa aiyuhal lazeena aamanus biroo wa saabiroo wa raabitoo wattaqul laaha la'allakum

129.name: Wa kazaalika nuwallee ba'daz zaalimeena ba'dam bimaa kaanoo yaksiboon
129.title: section 15

ayahs.130: Yaa ma'sharal jinni wal insi alam ya'tikum Rusulum minkum yaqussoona 'alaikum Aayaatee wa
ayahs.131: Zaalika al lam yakkur Rabbuka muhlikal quraa bizulminw wa ahluhaa ghaafiloon
ayahs.132: Wa likullin darajaatum mimmaa 'amiloo; wa maa Rabbuka bighaafilin 'ammaa ya'maloon
ayahs.133: Wa Rabbukal ghaniyyu zur rahmah; iny yasha' yuz hibkum wa yastakhlif mim ba'dikum maa
ayahs.134: Inna maa too'adoona la aatinw wa maaa antum bimu'jizeen
ayahs.135: Qul yaa qawmi' maloo 'alaa makaanatikum innee 'aamilun fasawfa ta'lamoona man takoonu
ayahs.136: Wa ja'aloo lillaahi mimmaa zara-a minal harsi walan'aami naseeban faqaaloo haazaa lillaahi
ayahs.137: Wa kazaalika zaiyana likaseerim minal mushrikeena qatla awlaadihim shurakaaa'uhum
ayahs.138: Wa qaaloo haaziheee an'aamunw wa harsun hijrun laa yat'amuhaaa illaa man nashaaa'u
ayahs.139: Wa qaaloo maa fee butooni haazihil an'aami khaalisatul lizukoorinaa wa muharramun 'alaaa
ayahs.140: Qad khasiral lazeena qatalooo awlaadahum safaham bighairi 'ilminw wa harramoo maa
ayahs.141: Wa Huwal lazee ansha-a jannaatim ma'rooshaatinw wa ghaira ma'rooshaatinw wan nakhla
ayahs.142: Wa minal an'aami hamoolatanw wa farshaa; kuloo mimmaa razaqakumul laahu wa laa tattabi'oo
ayahs.143: Samaaniyata azwaajim minad da'nisnaini wa minal ma'zis nain; qul 'aaazzaka raini harrama amil
ayahs.144: Wa minal ibilis naini wa minal baqaris nain; qul 'aaazzakaraini harrama amil unsayaini ammash
ayahs.145: Qul laaa ajidu fee maaa oohiya ilaiya muharraman 'alaa taa'iminy yat'amuhooo illaaa ai yakoona
ayahs.146: Wa 'alal lazeena haadoo harramnaa kulla zee zufurinw wa minal baqari walghanami harramnaa
ayahs.147: Fa in kazzabooka faqur Rabbukum zoo rahmatinw waasi'atinw wa laa yuraddu ba'suhoo 'anil
ayahs.148: Sayaqoolul lazeena ashrakoo law shaaa'al laahu maaa ashraknaa wa laaa aabaaa'unaa wa laa
ayahs.149: Qul falillaahil hujjatul baalighatu falaw shaaa'a lahadaakum ajma'een
ayahs.150: Qul halumma shuhadaaa'akumul lazeena yash hadoona annal laaha harrama haazaa fa in
ayahs.151: Qul ta'aalaw atlu maa harrama Rabbukum 'alaikum allaa tushrikoo bihee shai'anw wa
ayahs.152: Wa laa taqraboo maalal yateemi illaa billatee hiyaa ahsanu hattaa yablugha ashuddahoo wa
ayahs.153: Wa annna haazaa Siraatee mustaqeeman fattabi'oohu wa laa tattabi'us subula fatafarraqa
ayahs.154: Summa aatainaa Moosal Kitaaba tammaaman 'alal lazeee ahsana wa tafseelal likulli shai'inw wa
ayahs.155: Wa haazaa Kitaabun anzalnaahu Mubaarakun fattabi'oohu wattaqoo la'al lakum turhamoon
ayahs.156: An taqooloo inna maaa unzilal Kitaabu 'alaa taaa'ifataini min qablinaa wa in kunnaa 'an
ayahs.157: Aw taqooloo law annaaa unzila 'alainal kitaabu lakunnaaa ahdaa minhum; faqad jaaa'akum
ayahs.158: Hal yanzuroona illaaa an ta'tiyahumul malaaa'ikatu aw ya'tiya Rabbuka aw ya'tiya ba'du Aayaati
ayahs.159: Innal lazeena farraqoo deenahum wa kaanoo shiya'allasta minhum fee shaiyy'; innamaaa
ayahs.160: Man jaaa'a bilhasanati falahoo 'ashru amsaalihaa wa man jaaa'a bissaiyi'ati falaa yujzaaa illaa
ayahs.161: Qul innanee hadaanee Rabbeee ilaa Siraatim Mustaqeemin deenan qiyamam Millata
ayahs.162: Qul inna Salaatee wa nusukee wa mahyaaya wa mamaatee lillaahi Rabbil 'aalameen
ayahs.163: Laa shareeka lahoo wa bizaalika umirtu wa ana awwalul muslimeen
ayahs.164: Qul aghairal laahi abghee Rabbanw wa Huwa Rabbu kulli shaiyy'; wa laa taksibu kullu nafsin
ayahs.165: Wa Huwal lazee ja'alakum khalaaa'ifal ardi wa rafa'a ba'dakum fawqa ba'din darajaatil

181.name: Wa mimman khalaqnaaa ummatuny yahdoona bilhaqqi wa bihee ya'diloon
181.title: section 22

ayahs.182: Wallazeena kazzaboo bi Aayaatinaa sanastadrijuhum min haisu laa ya'lamoon
ayahs.183: Wa umlee lahum; inna kaidee mateen
ayahs.185: Awalam yanzuroo fee malakootis samaawaati wal ardi wa maa khalaqal laahu min shai'inw wa
ayahs.186: Mai yudlil lillaahi falaa haadiya lah; wa yazaruhum fee tughyaanihim ya'mahoon
ayahs.187: Yas'aloonaka 'anis Saa'ati aiyaana mursaahaa qul innamaa 'ilmuhaa 'inda Rabbee laa
ayahs.188: Qul laaa amliku linafsee naf'anw wa laa darran illaa maa shaaa'al laah; wa law kuntu a'lamul
ayahs.189: Huwal lazee khalaqakum min nafsinw waahidatinw wa ja'ala minhaa zawjahaa liyas kuna ilaihaa
ayahs.190: Falammaaa aataahumaa saalihan ja'alaa lahoo shurakaaa'a feemaaa aataahumaa; fata'aalal
ayahs.191: A yushrikoona maa laa yakhluqu shai'anw wa hum yukhlaqoon
ayahs.192: Wa laa yastatee'oona lahum nasranw wa laaa anfusahum yansuroon
ayahs.193: Wa in tad'oohum ilalhudaa laa yattabi'ookum; sawaaa'un 'alaikum a-da'awtumoohum 'am antum
ayahs.194: Innal lazeena tad'oona min doonil laahi 'ibaadun amsaalukum fad'oohum fal yastajeeboo lakum
ayahs.195: 'A lahum arjuluny yamshoona bihaa 'am lahum 'aidiny yabtishoona bihaaa 'am lahum a'yunuy
ayahs.196: Inna waliyyial laahul lazee nazzalal Kitaaba wa Huwa yatawallas saaliheen
ayahs.197: Wallazeena tad'oona min doonihee laa yastatee'oona nasrakum wa laaa anfusahum yansuroon
ayahs.198: Wa in tad'oohum ilal hudaa laa yasma'oo wa taraahum yanzuroona ilaika wa hum laa yubsiroon
ayahs.199: Khuzil 'afwa wa mur bil'urfi wa A'rid 'anil jaahileen
ayahs.200: Wa immaa yanzaghannaka minash Shaitaani nazghun fasta'iz billaah; innahoo Samee'un Aleem
ayahs.201: Innal lazeenat taqaw izaa massahum taaa'ifun minash Shaitaani tazakkaroo fa izaa hum
ayahs.202: Wa ikhwaanuhum yamuddoonahum fil ghayyi thumma laa yuqsiroon
ayahs.203: Wa izaa lam ta'tihim bi aayatin qaaloo law lajtabai tahaa; qul innamaaa attabi'u maa yoohaaa
ayahs.204: Wa izaa quri'al Quraanu fastami'oo lahoo wa ansitoo la 'allakum turhamoon
ayahs.205: Wazkur Rabbaka fee nafsika tadarru'anw wa kheefatanw wa doonal jahri minal qawli
ayahs.206: Innal lazeena 'inda Rabbika laa yastakbiroona 'an 'ibaadatihee wa yusabbihoonahoo wa lahoo

115.name: Wa laqad 'ahidnaaa ilaaa Aadama min qablu fanasiya wa lam najid lahoo 'azmaa
115.title: section 6

ayahs.116: Wa iz qulnaa lilma laaa'ikatis judoo li Aadama fasajadooo illaaa Ibleesa; abaa
ayahs.117: Faqulnaa yaaa Aadamu inna haazaa 'aduwwul laka wa lizawjika falaa yukhrijan nakumaa minal
ayahs.118: Innaa laka allaa tajoo'a feeha wa laa ta'raa
ayahs.119: Wa annaka laa tazma'u feehaa wa laa tadhaa
ayahs.120: Fa waswasa ilaihish Shaitaanu qaala yaaa Aadamu hal adulluka 'alaa shajaratil khuldi wa mulkil
ayahs.121: Fa akalaa minhaa fabadat lahumaa saw aatuhumaa wa tafiqaa yakhsifaani 'alaihimaa minw
ayahs.122: Summaj tabbahu Rabbuhoo fataaba 'alaihi wa hadaa
ayahs.123: Qaalah bita minhaa jamee'am ba'dukum liba'din 'aduww; fa immaa ya'tiyannakum minnee hudan
ayahs.124: Wa man a'rada 'an Zikree fa inna lahoo ma'eeshatan dankanw wa nahshuruhoo Yawmal
ayahs.125: Qaala Rabbi lima hashar tanee a'maa wa qad kuntu baseeraa
ayahs.126: Qaala kazaalika atatka Aayaatunaa fanaseetahaa wa kazaalikal Yawma tunsaa
ayahs.127: Wa kazaalika najzee man asrafa wa lam yu'min bi Aayaati Rabbih; wa la'azaabul Aakhirati
ayahs.128: Afalam yahdi lahum kam ahlaknaa qablahum minal qurooni yamshoona fee masaakinihim; inna
ayahs.129: Wa law laa Kalimatun sabaqat mir Rabbika lakaana lizaamanw wa 'ajalun musammaa
ayahs.130: Fasbir 'alaa maa yaqooloona wa sabbih bihamdi Rabbika qabla tuloo'ish shamsi wa qabla
ayahs.131: Wa laa tamuddanna 'ainaika ilaa ma matta'na biheee azwajam minhum zahratal hayaatid dunya
ayahs.132: Wa'mur ahlaka bis Salaati wastabir 'alaihaa laa nas'aluka rizqaa; nahnu narzuquk; wal 'aaqibatu
ayahs.133: Wa qaaloo law laa ya'teenaa bi aayatin mir Rabbih; awa lam ta'tihim baiyinatu maa fis suhufil
ayahs.134: Wa law annaaa ahlaknaahum bi 'azaabin min qablihee laqaaloo Rabbanaa law laaa arsalta
ayahs.135: Qul kullum mutarabbisun fa tarabbasoo fa sa ta'lamoona man Ashaabus Siraatis Sawiyyi wa

122.name: Wa inna Rabbaka la huwal 'Azeezur Raheem
122.title: section 6

ayahs.124: Iz qaala lahum akhoohum Hoodun alaa tattaqoon
ayahs.127: Wa maa as'alukum 'alaihi min ajrin in ajriya illaa 'alaa Rabbil 'aalameen
ayahs.132: Wattaqul lazeee amad dakum bimaa ta'lamoon
ayahs.133: Amaddakum bi an'aa minw wa baneen
ayahs.136: Qaaloo sawaaa'un 'alainaaa awa 'azta am lam takum minal waa'izeen
ayahs.139: Fakazzaboohu fa ahlaknaahum; inna fee zaalika la aayah; wa maa kaana aksaruhum

140.name: Wa inna Rabbaka la huwal 'Azeezur Raheem
140.title: section 7

ayahs.142: Iz qaala lahum akhoohum Saalihun alaa tattaqoon
ayahs.145: Wa maaa as'alukum 'alaihi min ajrin in ajriya illaa 'alaa Rabbil 'aalameen
ayahs.148: Wa zuroo inw wa nakhlin tal 'uhaa hadeem
ayahs.149: Wa tanhitoona minal jibaali buyootan faariheen
ayahs.152: Allazeena yufsidoona fil ardi wa laa yuslihoon
ayahs.154: Maaa anta illaa basharum mislunaa faati bi Aayatin in kunta minas saadiqeen
ayahs.155: Qaala haazihee naaqatul lahaa shirbunw walakum shirbu yawmim ma'loom
ayahs.156: Wa laa tamassoohaa bisooo'in fa yaakhuzakum 'azaabu Yawmin 'Azeem
ayahs.158: Fa akhazahumul 'azaab; inna fee zaalika la Aayah; wa maa kaana aksaruhum mu'mineen

159.name: Wa inna Rabbaka la Huwal 'Azeezur Raheem
159.title: section 8

ayahs.161: Iz qaala lahum akhoohum Lootun alaa tattaqoon
ayahs.164: Wa maaa as'alukum 'alaihi min ajrin in ajriya illaa 'alaa Rabbil 'aalameen
ayahs.166: Wa tazaroona maa khalaqa lakum Rabbukum min azwaajikum; bal antum qawmun 'aadoon
ayahs.167: Qaloo la'il lam tantahi yaa Lootu latakoonanna minal mukhrajeen
ayahs.169: Rabbi najjjinee wa ahlee mimmmaa ya'maloon
ayahs.173: Wa amtarnaa 'alaihim mataran fasaaa'a matarul munzareen
ayahs.174: Inna fee zaalika la Aayah; wa maa kaana aksaruhum mu'mineen

175.name: Wa inna Rabbaka la Huwal 'Azeezur Raheem
175.title: section 9

ayahs.177: Iz qaala lahum Shu'aybun alaa tattaqoon
ayahs.180: Wa maaa as'alukum 'alaihi min ajrin in ajriya illaa 'alaa Rabbil 'aalameen
ayahs.181: Awful kaila wa laa takoonoo minal mukhsireen
ayahs.183: Wa laa tabkhasun naasa ashyaaa 'ahum wa laa ta'saw fil ardi mufsideen
ayahs.186: Wa maaa anta illaa basharum mislunaa wa innazunnuka laminal kaazibeen
ayahs.187: Fa asqit 'alainaa kisafam minas samaaa'i in kunta minas saadiqeen
ayahs.189: Fakazzaboohu fa akhazahum 'azaabu Yawmiz zullah; innahoo kaana 'azaaba Yawmin 'Azeem
ayahs.190: Inna fee zaalika la Aayah; wa maa kaana aksaruhum mu'mineen

191.name: Wa inna Rabbaka la huwal 'Azeezur Raheem
191.title: section 10

ayahs.197: Awalam yakul lahum Aayatan ai ya'lamahoo 'ulamaaa'u Baneee Israaa'eel
ayahs.199: Faqara ahoo 'alaihim maa kaanoo bihee mu'mineen
ayahs.201: Laa yu'minoona bihee hattaa yarawul 'azaabal aleem
ayahs.202: Fayaatiyahum baghtatanw wa hum laa yash'uroon
ayahs.208: Wa maaa ahlaknaa min qaryatin illaa lahaa munziroon
ayahs.211: Wa maa yambaghee lahum wa maa yastatee'oon
ayahs.213: Falaa tad'u ma'al laahi ilaahan aakhara fatakoona minal mu'azzabeen
ayahs.215: Wakhfid janaahaka limanit taba 'aka minal mu'mineen
ayahs.216: Fa in asawka faqul innee bareee'um mimmmaa ta'maloon
ayahs.225: Alam tara annahum fee kulli waadiny yaheemoon
ayahs.226: Wa annahum yaqooloona ma laa yaf'aloon
ayahs.227: Illal lazeena aamanoo wa 'amilus saalihaati wa zakarul laaha kaseeranw wantasaroo min ba'di

ayahs.140: Iz abaqa ilal fulkil mash hoon
ayahs.143: Falaw laaa annahoo kaana minal musabbiheen
ayahs.144: Lalabisa fee batniheee ilaa Yawmi yub'asoon
ayahs.147: Wa arsalnaahu ilaa mi'ati alfin aw yazeedoon
ayahs.148: Fa aamanoo famatta' naahum ilaa heen
ayahs.149: Fastaftihim ali Rabbikal banaatu wa lahumul banoon
ayahs.150: Am khalaqnal malaaa'i kata inaasanw wa hum shaahidoon
ayahs.151: Alaaa innahum min ifkihim la yaqooloon
ayahs.157: Faatoo bi Kitaabikum in kuntum saadiqeen
ayahs.158: Wa ja'aloo bainahoo wa bainal jinnati nasabaa; wa laqad 'alimatil jinnatu innahum lamuhdaroon
ayahs.164: Wa maa minnaaa illaa lahoo maqaamun ma'loom
ayahs.165: Wa innaa lanah nus saaf foon
ayahs.171: Wa laqad sabaqat Kalimatunaa li'ibaadinal mursa leen
ayahs.177: Fa izaa nazala bisaahatihim fasaaa'a sabaahul munzareen

ayahs.1: Allazeena kafaroo wa saddoo'an sabeelil laahi adalla a'maalahum
ayahs.2: Wallazeena aamanoo wa 'amilus saalihaati wa aamanoo bimaa nuzzila 'alaa Muhammadinw-wa
ayahs.3: Zaalika bi annal lazeena kafarut taba'ul baatila wa annal lazeena aamanut taba'ul haqqa mir
ayahs.4: Fa-izaa laqeetumul lazeena kafaroo fadarbar riqaabi, hattaaa izaa askhan tumoohum fashuddul
ayahs.5: Sa-yahdeehim wa yuslihu baalahum
ayahs.6: Wa yudkhiluhumul jannata 'arrafahaa lahum
ayahs.7: Yaaa ayyuhal lazeena aamanooo in tansurul laaha yansurkum wa yusabbit aqdaamakum
ayahs.8: Wallazeena kafaroo fata' sal lahum wa adalla a'maalahum
ayahs.9: Zaalika bi annahum karihoo maaa anzal allaahu fa ahbata a'maalahum
ayahs.10: Afalam yaseeroo fil ardi fayanzuroo kaifa kaana 'aaqibatul lazeena min qablihim; dammaral
ayahs.11: Zaalika bi annal laaha mawlal lazeena aamanoo wa annal kaafireena laa mawlaa lahum (section
ayahs.12: Innal-laaha yudkhilul lazeena aamanoo wa 'amilus saalihaati Jannaatin tajree min tahtihal
ayahs.13: Wa ka ayyim min qaryatin hiya ashaddu quwwatam min qaryatikal lateee akhrajatka
ayahs.14: Afaman kaana 'alaa baiyinatim mir Rabbihee kaman zuyyina lahoo sooo'u 'amalihee
ayahs.15: Masalul jannatil latee wu'idal muttaqoona feehaaa anhaarum min maaa'in ghayri aasininw wa
ayahs.16: Wa minhum mai yastami'u ilaika hattaaa izaa kharajoo min 'indika qaaloo lil lazeena ootul 'ilma
ayahs.17: Wallazeenah tadaw zaadahum hudanw wa aataahum taqwaahum
ayahs.18: Fahal yanzuroona illas Saa'ata an ta'tiyahum baghtatan faqad jaaa'a ashraatuhaa; fa annaa
ayahs.19: Fa'lam annahoo laaa ilaaha illal laahu wastaghfir lizambika wa lilmu'mineena walmu'minaat;
ayahs.20: Wa yaqoolul lazeena aamanoo law laa nuzzilat Sooratun fa izaaa unzilat Sooratum
ayahs.21: Taa'atunw wa qawlum ma'roof; fa izaa 'azamal amru falaw sadaqul laaha lakaana khairal lahum
ayahs.22: Fahal 'asaitum in tawallaitum an tufsidoo fil ardi wa tuqatti'ooo arhaamakum
ayahs.23: Ulaaa'ikal lazeena la'anahumul laahu fa asammahum wa a'maaa absaarahum
ayahs.24: Afalaa yatadabbaroonal Qur-aana am 'alaa quloobin aqfaaluhaa
ayahs.25: Innal lazeenar taddoo 'alaaa adbaarihim min ba'di maa tabaiyana lahumul hudash Shaitaanu
ayahs.26: Zaalika bi annahum qaaloo lillazeena karihoo maa nazzalal laahu sanutee'ukum fee ba'dil amri
ayahs.27: Fakaifa izaa tawaf fat humul malaaa'ikatu yadriboona wujoohahum wa adbaa rahum
ayahs.28: Zaalika bi annahumut taba'oo maaa askhatal laaha wa karihoo ridwaanahoo fa ahbata
ayahs.29: Am hasibal lazeena fee quloobihim maradun al lany yukhrijal laahu adghaanahum
ayahs.30: Wa law nashaaa'u la-arainaakahum fala 'araftahum bi seemaahum; wa lata'rifan nahum fee
ayahs.31: Wa lanabluwannakum hattaa na'lamal mujaahideena minkum wassaabireena wa nabluwa
ayahs.32: Innal lazeena kafaroo wa saddoo 'an sabeelil laahi wa shaaaqqur Rasoola min ba'di maa
ayahs.33: Yaaa ayyuhal lazeena aamanoo atee'ul laaha wa atee'ur Rasoola wa laa tubtilooo a'maalakum
ayahs.34: Innal lazeena kafaroo wa saddoo 'an sabeelil laahi summa maatoo wa hum kuf faarun falany
ayahs.35: Falaa tahinoo wa tad'ooo ilas salmi wa antumul a'lawna wallaahu ma'akum wa lany yatirakum
ayahs.36: Innamal hayaatud dunyaa la'ibunw wa lahw; wa in tu'minoo wa tattaqoo yu'tikum ujoorakum wa
ayahs.37: Iny yas'alkumoohaa fa yuhfikum tabkhaloo wa yukhrij adghaanakum
ayahs.38: Haaa antum haaa'ulaaa'i tud'awna litunfiqoo fee sabeelillaahi faminkum many yabkhalu wa

ayahs.3: Wa maa adraaka mal qaari'ah
ayahs.4: Yauma ya koonun naasu kal farashil mabthooth
ayahs.5: Wa ta koonul jibalu kal 'ihnil manfoosh
ayahs.6: Fa-amma man thaqulat mawa zeenuh
ayahs.7: Fahuwa fee 'ishatir raadiyah
ayahs.8: Wa amma man khaf fat mawa zeenuh
ayahs.9: Fa-ummuhu haawiyah
ayahs.10: Wa maa adraaka maa hiyah

ayahs.3: Ilaahin naas
ayahs.4: Min sharril waswaasil khannaas
ayahs.5: Allazee yuwaswisu fee sudoorin naas
